No insects inside the house and i appreciated that! facilities in the villa are in good condition such as the air conditioner is super cold! there was a short period of time that there was not hot water supply for the bedroom downstairs and the pool s light broke down but the hotel staff fixed it within hours. The staff are extremely nice and friendly, really helped us a lot especially the buggy car service! hotel breakfast was extremely good! lots of bread choices and selection of eggs was available and there is noodle station! really enjoyed our 5 nights stays there! will definitely recommend this villa to our family and friends!
Nói chung là tốt, nhân viên vui vẻ. Phòng ốc sạch sẽ

Khách sạn có bể bơi đẹp, dịch vụ tốt, thoải mái, bữa ăn sáng hơi ít món. Vị trí hơi xa biển, phải đi qua đường và quãng đường gần 1km mới tắm biển được. Xung quanh có nhiều nhà hàng, quán ăn thuận tiện. Nhân viên dọn vệ sinh hay tập hợp đồ dơ ở hành lang và nói chuyện to.
Wi-fi không ổn định lắm. Khách sạn sạch sẽ ăn sáng ổn

Mình ở tầng trệt, phòng standard 2 giường đơn, phòng nằm bên trong không cửa sổ. Ok, fine vì bọn mình đi cả ngày, nhưng 1 số điều không hài lòng ở đây là wifi tậm tịt (tạm cn được) nhưng nước nóng ở đây thì 30p mới có (không xài được), nhân viên giải thích do bên trên nước chảy xuống nóng không kịp đến phòng mình đã hết. Thực tế thì nước cũng không thể nóng hẳn mà chỉ hơi ấm nếu đợi lâu rất lâu. Còn 2 ngày nữa ở đây nhưng với 1 số tiền bỏ ra cũng không phải rẻ mà nhận lại dịch vụ như thế này thì mình thấy không đáng. À, bể bơi ở đây thực chất nằm ở khuôn viên khách sạn đông xuân hotel 81 trần hưng đạo nhé, vậy là 2 khách sạn chung 1 bể bơi, chắc ai cũng tắm biển hết nên bể bơi không quan trọng lắm, mình chỉ chia sẻ để mọi người cùng biết nhé. Bữa sáng thì tây nhiều món, việt nam chỉ có 4 món. Mình chọn 1 trong 4 món đó, tuy nhiên bánh kếp thì có thể mỗi người thêm đươc 1 phần nên hãy gọi 3 món còn lại, đồ uống của vn mình thì free có lipton, cafe, cacao, sữa nóng/lạnh. Cả vụ có lối ra biển nữa, thực tế sẽ đi qua đường, băng qua resort và tối ai có dự định ra biển thì sẽ không được nữa đâu vì đất của resort chứ không phải của khách sạn đâu nhé
Nhân viên vui vẻ nhiệt tình. Nước nóng không ổn định
Phòng dưới đất có muỗi, nhưng nhìn chung tất cả đều ok
Khách sạn hành lang sạch sẽ, tuy nhiên có nhiều côn trùng.
Khách sạn ok lắm! hồ bơi sạch đẹp lại gần trung tâm!
Tuyệt vời. Chỗ ăn sáng khách sạn view đẹp nhất vùng quanh đó. Bể bơi đẹp, không nặng mùi clo. Có phòng gym, bể sục, xông hơi miễn phí. Nhân viên thân thiện. Cảm thấy rất tuyệt.
Nhân viên thân thiện, phòng family sạch sẽ, rộng rãi
Bà chủ và nhân viên khách sạn không chia sẻ thông tin rõ ràng về giá cả khi ở lố thời gian check out, thái độ không tốt.
Tốt tuy nhiên hơi sâu trong hẻm
Khách sạn mới, bể bơi và bể sục rất sạch sẽ. Bữa trưa đặt ăn ở khách sạn nấu rất ngon, phòng ăn view biển thoáng đãng. Mùa này vắng khách nên ăn sáng hơi ít món
Dịch vụ không tốt,bao gồm không sạch sẽ,không dọn phòng cho ngày mới,phòng không cách âm,rất ồn ào,và có nhiều muỗi.
Nhân viên thân thiện, bữa sáng ngon...

Vị trí gần trung tâm tuy nhiên nằm khá sâu trong hẻm và gần một số bia mộ. Nó khá tối và đáng sợ vào ban đêm trên đường đến khách sạn. Một trong những chiếc khăn không sạch. Không có ánh sáng vào ban đêm trên hành lang vào phòng của chúng tôi. Khóa cửa ban công bị hỏng. Chủ sở hữu và nhân viên rất thân thiện và hữu ích.

Khách sạn không có sự linh động trong phần phụ thu ở thêm giờ. Chỉ có 1 giá 1, là trả phòng trước 18h thì 50 , trong khi nhu cầu của tôi chỉ ở thêm 1 tiếng thôi, thay vì khách sạn có thể báo là phụ thu 30 hoặc là thêm 1 tiếng thì bao nhiêu.
Bữa sáng ngon, lễ tân thân thiện dễ thương, dịch vụ tốt.
Hồ bơi rộng bữa sáng ngon phòng rộng rãi phục vụ chu đáo rất hài lòng
Khách sạn view đẹp. Ăn sáng tạm được

Phòng ốc sạch sẽ, nhân viên dễ thương, nhiệt tình, có hổ trợ cho khách trả phòng trễ. Ăn sáng tạm ổn, hồ bơi sạch, đi bộ ra biển cũng gần. Tuy nhiên có 2 phòng (402 403) tôi đặt sea view nhưng không thấy sea view chỉ có hướng ra bãi đất trống kế bên khách sạn, đường đi vào khách sạn nhỏ, vào tầm chiều người qua lại đông xe taxi đi vào hơi khó.
Khách sạn mới, đẹp, có hồ bơi, ăn sáng ngon, có xông hơi nhưng mình chưa dùng. Giá cả tuyệt vời
Khách sạn sạch, view biển mát nghe rõ tiếng sóng. Nhân viên nhiệt tình

Bữa sáng hơi ít món nhưng hợp khẩu vị. View khách sạn đẹp, phòng sạch sẽ, thoáng. Nhân viên khách sạn vui vẻ, phục vụ tốt. Giá cả tương đối hợp lý. Hạn chế duy nhất là đường vào khách sạn hơi nhỏ, nhiều lối rẽ, dễ nhầm đường nhưng đổi lại được cái là không gian yên tĩnh, thuận lợi khi đi nghỉ dưỡng. Địa điểm khá gần trung tâm ( 3km), gần sát bãi biển...
Kha ch sa n sa ch se , phu c vu chu đa o. Râ t ha i lo ng!
Khách sạn thoáng mát sạch sẽ. Nhân viên thân thiện. Bể bơi rất đẹp và sạch
Ok good !! sẽ giới thiệu bạn bè
Phục vụ chu đáo, nhân viên tận tình. Bữa ăn ngon. Good

hotelName: Bungalow Sang Tuoi Mountains Resort Phu Quoc
userCmt: Resort tiện nghi,thoải mái,có bể bơi nên bọn trẻ rất thích.nhân viên cực nhiệt tình và thân thiện.gđ mình đã có kỳ nghỉ tuyệt vời.

hotelName: Bungalow Sang Tuoi Mountains Resort Phu Quoc
userCmt: Tuyệt vời. Khách sạn đẹp, nhân viên thân thiện, mấy anh tài xế quá thân thiện

Phòng đẹp, view cũng oki lắm. Nhân viên gọi hỏi mình trước khi bay vào xem cần hỗ trợ gì k. Chỗ ở có máy giặt tiện cho mình chủ động và không lo phải mang đồ ướt về bị nặng hành lý. Nhà mình đi chơi đến 1h sáng mới về phòng nhưng không có nước tắm. Đêm rồi nên không tiện gọi nhân viên. Mọi người nhận phòng nên check trước nhé
Khách sạn nằm ở xóm chài nên theo mình thấy thì không được sạch phức tạp. Hơn nữa, với giá 800k mà cơ sở vật chất độ vệ sinh của phòng như vậy thì mình chưa hài lòng
Nhân viên hỗ trợ tận tình.phòng ok sạch sẽ.cảm ơn chill đã cho tụi mình những trải nghiệm tuyệt vời tại đây.
Đỉnh, view đẹp nhueng mỗi tội hơi nhiêu muỗi
Dịch vụ tốt, trang trí đẹp, có bể bơi chung. Dễ dàng đi đến bãi biển. Vị trí là một chút xa trung tâm thị trấn.

Biển ở chill ngắm hoàng hôn rất đẹp nhưng không tắm được. Phòng sạch sẽ thoải mái nhưng nhà vệ sinh hơi bí (không có quạt thông hơi). Vị trí tiện lợi, rất gần trung tâm nên có thể di chuyển đi đến các điểm nổi tiếng. Chill gần chợ nên có thể mua hải sản về tự nấu ăn

Phòng ở rất thoải mái cho 4 người, ngay sát cạnh biển team mình chưa bao giờ ở chỗ nào chill như vậy. Phòng đầy đủ đồ, có cả bếp nữa. Rất tiện để nấu nướng trong phòng lễ tân và phục vụ rất nice và thân thiện luôn ạ, mình quên ví còn được nhặt hộ mang trả cơ. Bọn mình rất hài lòng. Highly recommend cho mọi người tới với chill house ạ
Bị sự cố đền tiền nhưng giải quyết chưa thoả đáng.
Phòng nhỏ. Nóng và nhiều muỗi. Ở sâu trong hẻm. Tủ lạnh không có đồ. Máy điều hoà hoạt động kém.
Khách sạn đẹp nhiệt tình..... Mùa này có sứa
Book đc phòng có view siu mê, nằm cả ngày ở phòng cũng k chán lun
Phòng sạch sẽ thoáng mát view biển ngắm hoàng hôn đẹp cực kì

Phòng bị thấm nước nhỏ giọt như mưa từ cửa vào phòng lúc mưa lớn nhân viên chỉ vào lau và nói là mùa mưa nên vậy. Giá 880k 1 đêm thì so với mặt bằng chung k hề rẻ. Đường ở bên ngoài nhỏ và dơ rất nhiều nước bẩn. Phòng và trang thiết bị cũ có mùi hôi, chăn luôn trong tình trạng ẩm thấp ngủ rất khó chịu. Sẽ không quay lại đây, thuê xe máy rất cũ phanh thì hư và không có đèn xa đi đêm nguy hiểm.
Tuyệt vời, nhiệt tình chu đáo, đầy đủ tiện ích
Các bạn lễ tân rất nhiệt tình và thân thiện, phòng okie. Hôm đó cô dọn phòng còn cho vợ chồng mình đôi găng tay chống nắng nữa hihii
Nhân viên thân thiện và dễ chịu, hỗ trợ rất nhiệt tình, phòng mới, thơm và khá đẹp so với vị trí. Sáng và tối được ra ngoài nghe tiếng sóng biển và ngắm cảnh tàu ra khơi.

Lễ tân thân thiện. Support nhiệt tình. Homestay gần chợ, thích hợp cho các khách thích cảm giác hoà mình vào cuộc sống làng chài. Phòng có bếp và vườn rất xinh. Tuy nhiên điểm trừ là hơi nhiều muỗi và đường vào hơi khó cho taxi, nên cân nhắc cho các bạn nhỏ. Homestay xứng đáng 9đ

Mình đặt 2 đêm ( đã thanh toán đủ) nhưng chỉ ở 1 đêm nhưng khi đến nhận phòng ngày t2 thì phòng vẫn chưa ready. Mùi xịt phòng rất nặng. Ở đây bằng giá với 1 chỗ mình ở 2 đêm trước nhưng mình thấy phục vụ và tiện nghi khác hoàn toàn. 1 bên có bãi riêng và hồ bơi, buffet sáng một bên bằng giá phòng như 1 chiếc phòng trọ sinh viên. Mình thấy hụt hẫng khi nhận phòng. Sữa tắm và dầu gội đầu hết hạn. Bãi xe cho khách thì như cái chuồng gà vậy đó. Ở đây mình cảm thấy sự an toàn không được bảo đảm vì homestay dặn phải khoá cửa cẩn thận. Nhân viên thì có một bạn không biết phải chủ không nhưng bạn nước với khách mà ngoắc tay chỉ chỉ rồi còn kiểu cười cười như mình là em bạn ấy vậy đó. Mình đã theo dõi chill khá lâu, lần thư 4 đi phú quốc mình muốn trải nghiệm như local nhưng fail quá. Chắc sẽ không quay lại chill house. Hi vọng chill ghi nhận, nâng cấp và thay đổi thái độ phục vụ. Cảm ơn
Tôi đã có trải nghiệm thú vị ở đây! phòng sạch sẽ, nhân viên nhiệt tình! tuy nhiên hoi xa trung tâm
Phòng sạch sẽ gần biển quá tuyệt lun.ăn sáng sát bên phòng, có bếp nấu ăn luôn quá tiện ghi.kỳ nghỉ thật tuyệt vời với chillhouse ạ
Phòng rất rộng, có quạt, có máy lạnh, có bếp đầy đủ, mình ở khá thoải mái

The location of the apartment was very close to the ocean but the road leading to the apartment is very narrow and not central. We had problems finding a taxi or grab. When we first arrived, it was storming so water came through the doors and walls. Dripping into our living spaces. The staff provided us with towels but dropped the comment in the rainy season it always rains like this. This comment made me think then why did the hotel not seal up the doors and walls when they know about the issue. It was a lot of water and even dripped inside when their was barely any rain. The structure of the building is very outdated. Due to the condition of the apartment, bugs and animals were able to get inside. The lizard was fine but there were so many bugs everywhere even after we sprayed insect repellent. They were inside the toilet, on the walls, on the curtains. We also had an ant infestation. We did not have warm or hot water and the toilet kept flushing back the things we have flushed down. The bed was very uncomfortable and smelled like pure pee. I sprayed perfume to make it better but it did not last long. Location 6/10. Hotel 2/10. Staff 6/10.
Nhân viên siêu nhiệt tình! và chị chủ cũng rất chiều khách ạ!

Mình đến pq dịp lễ 30/04/2025. Mình ở phòng chill giá rất tốt, phòng rộng, đầy đủ tiện nghi. Có bàn ăn, có bếp ga, xoong chảo, tô chén dĩa đũa muỗng rất nhiều, đủ luôn cho gđ 6 người. Có tivi có thể xem youtube thoải mái, giường 1m8, view nhìn ra biển khỏi chê. Tuy nhiên có vài điểm cần lưu ý là hẻm vào hơi nhỏ, mn nên book xanh sm, chứ grab car có đôi chiếc to quá, vào khó quay đầu. Phòng không cách âm lắm nên có thể hơi ồn vào dịp lễ. View biển đẹp nhưng mình ít mở rèm vì dính 2 phòng bên cạnh, họ có thể nhìn vào phòng của mình. Những điều trên mình ghi chú để mn có thêm thông tin, chứ mình không hề chê. Mình và chồng đều rất hài lòng. Hôm nào trời mưa thì ở tại phòng, order đồ ăn về, có đủ xoong chảo để hâm nóng. Kéo rèm ra là có thể ngắm hoàng hôn ngay tại phòng, ngắm những chiếc thuyền ngoài xa rất chill. Bảo ồn chứ mình ngủ rất nhiều, rất đã ))) chốt lại là trải nghiệm rất chill ạ

Tuyệt vời vị trí thuận tiện di chuyển, nhân viên nhiệt tình dễ thương, view đẹp. Góp ý mấy ticker nhỏ nhỏ do khách trước dán (số dán trên giày ngay thanh treo đồ, hoặc bên hông giường ngủ) nếu vệ sinh kiểm tra kỹ hơn tháo ra hết, nhìn sẽ tuyệt vời hơn nữa.
Phòng sát bờ biển sạch sẽ, giá rẻ, nhân viên vui vẻ, hỗ trợ nhiệt tình
Lể tân nhiệt tình lắm mọi người, phòng cũng oke nữa
Lễ tân thân thiện, nhiệt tình, có kết hợp với tua lặn biển và cho thuê xe máy, cũng như có dịch vụ đưa đón khách tại sân bay ạ. Phòng gọn gàng sạch sẽ thoáng mát, mọi thứ đều ok ạ
Người ta đi chill nghỉ dưỡng! còn mình đi chill nghỉ dưỡng và ăn! )))))) kỳ nghỉ tuyệt vời!

Phòng view biển khá mát và chill nội thất thì tạm ok máy lạnh không ok lắm vì hơi nóng không ở trong phòng lưu ý cho khách sạn là nên làm rèm hơi tối xíu vì nắng khá rắt và sáng với những người khó ngủ thì rèm che vẫn còn sáng quá. 3,5 điểm

Khách sạn tốt đầy đủ tiện nghi như ở nhà, nhân viên nhiệt tình thân thiện, điềm trừ duy nhất là đường hơi nhỏ, xe ra hơi bất tiện nhưng nếu là thuê xe hònda thì thoải mái không gì hết, nếu là đi kiểu nghĩ dưỡng hay thích yên tĩnh thì đây khá ok nha, không ồn ào, không khí cũng tốt
Khách sạn rộng rãi, nhân viên phục vụ thái độ mến khách. Rất đáng tiền!

View khá đẹp, phòng tiện nghi sạch đẹp, nhược điểm là khá xa trung tâm phú quốc nên phải thuê xe. Wifi yếu chập chờn, đi lên phía chợ dương đông thấy có cái cống lớn xả nước thải sinh hoạt của xã dương đông xả thẳng ra biển nên không dám tắm nữa.

Nhân viên thân thiện, trong phòng có đầy đủ tiện nghi. Nằm trong khu dân cư làng chài nên thấy được cuộc sống thường ngày của người dân làng. Gần bún quậy kiến xây (quán đầu tiên) nên đi bộ ra ăn rất tiện. Cách chợ đêm, dinh cậu (trung tâm khu dương đông) khoảng 2km rất gần
Chill house có phòng ốc sạch sẽ, đầy đủ tiện nghi, view biển đẹp thích hợp để ngắm hoàng hôn. Xung quanh gần chợ, nhiều đồ ăn ngon. Có cho thuê khách sạn và nhận book tour

Phòng rộng rãi, đầy đủ tiện nghi. Bạn lễ tân nhiệt tình. View phòng thì quá đẹp. Buổi sáng có thể xuống tằm biền ở đây có mấy cô chú ở đó tầm 6h là xuống tắm nên mình cũng yên tâm xuống theo. Gần bún quậy và bánh xèo 5k nữa nha mọi người.

Gặp ngày mưa biển động nên không được lung linh lắm, lễ tân và quản gia nhiet tình, có bếp nấu dưới rất tiện, phòng chill 14 view full nhưng nhược điểm không mở được cửa, chỉ mở được cửa bên hông, nếu làm lại thay bằng cửa kéo thì sẽ thoải mái hơn, nước uống và sữa tắm nên thay bằng chai riêng nhỏ dùng 1 lần sẽ tạo cảm giác an toàn và yên tâm hơn, dầu gội ok nhưng sữa tắm có mùi lạ, phía dưới có tạp hoá bình dân thân thiện, nói chung vẫn khá hài lòng thích hợp trải nghiệm cs làng chài bản địa, sẽ quay lại với những hạng phòng khác
View đẹp, gần chợ, ai cũng nhiệt tình, phòng rất rộng nấu ăn ổn, có điều hổng có bậc thang xuống biển nên leo đá hơi cực (chill3)

Bãi biển cát rất đẹp ! thích hợp nghỉ dưỡng rất thoãi mái, yên tĩnh, gần chợ, khu hải sản, tiện lợi cho các bạn thích nấu nướng, nhân viên rất nhiệt tình giúp đỡ và hướng dẫn khách! mình mới đi lần đầu nhưng có vẻ rất thân thuộc .
A lott of error in this hotel so big no no

Cali hill is located in between two major areas, and walkable for both. The room was good with basic amenities, tv, a/c, storage, and coffee for the opening, albeit make sure you get the water heater from the front desk. The best were very hard and thin, so if you are used to a plush mattress that you sink into this isn t for you. The a/c was very nice and got cold. Also the bathroom is a toilet/sink/shower all in one, so make sure you take anything you don t want to get wet out before you shower, like your toilet paper lol. The pool looked great, and the two restaurants had a steady flow of people which tells me it was good, i just didn t utilize as i had other items on my agenda.
The food at the restaurant in the hotel was delicious! the hotel room was quiet and relaxing.
Exceptional place! comfy rooms, super helpful staff, and amazing location. We really enjoyed the infinity pool by the ocean. It was our getaway before a conference, and it was super relaxing.

Die anlage ist sehr schön und sauber aber kaum ist man draußen ist es alles dreckig und ungepflegt. Man muss wissen dass die anlage am hang liegt , zum meer sind es viele treppen. Der pool am meer ist einfach traumhaft ... Das personal im restaurant spricht kaum englisch , deswegen gibt es oft verständigungsprobleme. Zb die bestellten spiegeleier sind nie gekommen, weil man mich nicht verstanden hat. Das frühstück ist in allgemeinen gut , man findet auch als europäer was zum essen auch wenn die auswahl an gerichten nicht so groß ist .
Great resort with superb staff. Location a bit isolated but that can be also a positive thing.

The hotel pictures do not give enough credit to this resort! absolutely wonderful place with a small beach and two pools. We loved our stay here and would recommend to anyone! the only downside would be that the food at the restaurant was quite basic, except the pizza that was terrific (however very expensive for vietnam). They also weren t flexible/accommodating with the airport transfer and we had to go 3,5hours before our flight which really didn t make any sense for a nice place such as this..

Superfin resort med bra service och fräscha hotellrum med balkong. Frukosten hade inte det bästa utbudet om man tycker om typisk svensk frukostmat. Maten på restaurangen var ok men det finns bättre ställen utanför resorten som man kan äta på! 2 stora pooler och jättehärligt att bada i vattnet på stranden. Solnedgångarna var otroliga )
자연 친화적이고 조용한 분위기가 좋았습니다. 턴 어라운드 서비스가 계속 제공되는것이 특히 좋았고, 친절한 서비스도 마음에 들었습니다.
도마뱀 소리가 나고 도마뱀이 왔다갔다하긴 했지만 너무 좋았어요 수영장도 좋고 바다앞이라 좋았습니다 문밑에 틈이 있는 부분이 조금 걸리긴 했지만 모기도 없고 만족합니다

Loved the camia. Is in a quiet area of phu quoc away from the main areas of the island. Had a beachfront sea view room that was very spacious, outdoor shower and plenty of storage space. Could hear the water at night which we found very peaceful and loved waking up to the sun across the ocean in front of our room. Breakfast was amazing with plenty of options in a lovely open air restaurant overlooking the pool and a beautiful view of the ocean staff went out of their way to assist including booking a private driver at a reasonable rate and have cable car tickets available at reception. Both pools are great with the ocean infinity pool a nice place to relax and watch the world go by. The only thing, very minor is that is a long walk to get out of the resort and there is no shuttle at all. The local area is not well lit and you may get to meet the local cows whilst out at night. Quite harmless and part of the local area. Loved the camia and would stay again if in phu quoc.
Muy buen hotel excelente para relajarte. Los cuartos grandes y las instalaciones del hotel muy buenas.
This is the third time we stayed in this hotel. We keep coming back to this hotel due to the beautiful garden.

家族で利用しました 細い入口の急坂を上った先に海まで続くエントランスロードに始まり 開放的なレセプションは滞在期間中の強いサポーターです どのエリアからもオーシャンビューを楽しめ ビーチサイドレストランからのサンセットは感動です 子供はサンセットプールに大興奮でした ビラは清潔感はもちろん 寝心地は最高でした シーズンがら虫やトカゲとご一緒することになりましたが 許容範囲でしょう ホテルから1kmほど離れたエリアに多くのレストランやマーケットがありますが 外に出るときはバイクレンタルが必須 人里離れ マイペースでリゾートを楽しみたい方向けには最高のリゾートです また来たい

Our christmas stay at camia was the highlight of our trip around vietnam. An absolute jewel of a resort, how it is only rated 3.5 star i ll never know - i ve stayed in 5 star hotels not as nice as this. The christmas eve party and food was incredible. All the staff were very friendly and did their upmost to ensure we enjoyed our stay to the maximum. The 2 bed sea view villa was perfect, huge rooms with the most comfortable bed we ve ever slept in. The gardens are so colourful and beautiful. The food selection at breakfast was endless. We ate in the restaurant several times, the view at the beach restaurant is to die for. We ll be back one day, i m 100 certain of that. Thank you to all at camia

植物に囲まれた場所で海とプールを眺めながら一日中ゆっくりしたいと思い フーコックの数あるホテルからここを選びました 結果 理想どおりの素敵なリゾートでした 広い敷地内には様々な花が咲き乱れ 椰子の木やバナナの木が植えられており南国感 ジャングル感が満載 プールは 海の目の前に造られたインフィニティと 施設全体を眺められるプール(海も見える)の2つがある 前者は子ども連れファミリーが多いが 後者は数人がプールサイドでのんびり本を読んでおり空いている (ただこちらのプールは水温が低く 入るとき少しつらい ) 部屋はプレミアムデラックスオーシャンビューにした
員工親切有禮 住宿清潔寧靜 唔美中不足食物選擇性太少 如可加多越南食物會更好
Great place to stay with the family.
다 좋은데 좀 동떨어져 있음

We had no hot water for 3 days. The food at the restaurant was not good and really overpriced for vietnam. The mixed drinks were watered down. The hotel is very isolated. You need motorbike to get around. It s okay for 2 days. Not more.

연말을 가족과 함께 다녀왔는데 결론적으로 이 리조트덕분에 다시 푸꾸옥에 가고 싶단 생각이 들었습니다. 테라스 빌라동에 묵었는데 조식당과 로비, 수영장이 바로 앞이여서 너무 좋은 위치였습니다 조식은 가짓수도 충분했고 맛도 좋았습니다. 특히 egg station의 계란후라이와 쌀국수도 맛있었습니다. 아버지가 한식아니면 잘 못 드시는데 부모님도 4박동안 입에 안 맞는 것 없이 잘 드셨습니다. 참고로 샐러드바에 김치가 있는데 맛이 꽤 괜찮았습니다. 또 기억에 남는 건 총괄매니저분이 오셔서 베트남커피를 만들어주시는데 이게 또 너무 맛있어서 베트남커피에 흠뻑 빠졌네요 매니저분 외에도 모든 직원분들이 다 친절한데 특히 리셉션에서 갑자기 푸꾸옥에 오게 된 제 동생네 부부를 위해 방을 2박이나 쥐어짜 마련해주셨습니다. 그 과정이 매우 친절하고 저를 도와주려는 마음이 느껴져서 넘 감사했습니다 thank you, katty ! 해변가는 작지만 아이와 함께인 저희 가족에겐 완벽했습니다 해변가에 해수풀이 있고 몇걸음만 가면 바로 바닷가여서 아이를 보기에 동선이 좋았습니다. 하지만 발라 인근이나 앞에 수도가 없어 모래가 집안에 들어갈수 밖에 없어서 그 점은 아쉬웠습니다. 사실 외진 위치때문에 무료셔틀인 빈버스를 이용하기 어렵고 인근 동네도 나가기가 쉽지 않습니다. 하지만 친절한 스태프와 프라이빗한 비치 덕분에 단점들이 잊힐만큼 멋진 휴가를 보내다 왔습니다 가족같은 스태프들과 편한 힐링을 원하시는 분들께 완전추천입니다

Très bon hôtel avec de bonnes installations. Le personnel était charmant mais le service est comme partout au vietnam vraiment à améliorer. Les réservations au restaurant ne sont pas honorées. Nous avons été surclassé la 3ème et dernière nuit. Dommage de ne pas l avoir été dès la première nuit alors que l hôtel n était plein qu à 30 sachant que nous étions 5 personnes sur 3 nuits. L écologie et la gestion des déchets est à travailler sérieusement les plages aux alentours sont sales.

This has been the loveliest stay, we have enjoyed every minute of it. All the staff have been amazing, from the reception, gardeners and all the waiters and waitresses. We had a fantastic room on the sea front and sat on our balcony every night listening to the sea after having a meal in the wonderful sea front restaurant. Some special mentions need to go to hai harry, the manager of the restaurant, he has made our stay very special and some of his staff as well hue, thinh, ngan. Also a big thanks to hue who looked after us so well at breakfast and reception. We cannot recommend this resort highly enough, had the best time thank you everyone
隠れ家的ホテルでホテルに着くまでの道が車同士が交わせないほど狭い しかし その代わりに隠れ家的なこじんまりしたホテルでゆっくり過ごすのはとても良い サービスも良く スタッフの対応もとても良い 客層は欧米人が多いように思える
廁所排水管有奇怪味道, 位置稍嫌偏僻 整體上還不錯

Stayed here for five nights and it was generally a wonderful stay. Room was spacious and as advertised. Housekeeping did a fairly good job although the floor could be cleaned better but small issue. Breakfast was good, there s always a noodle station that changes daily. There are two pools, one closer to the reception and the other that overlooks the sea. Beach is very small. Camia restaurant is popular for sunset dining. And there s a spa that overlooks the sea. Service is well provided for.

Beautiful surroundings, excellent staff and great facilities. The resort also allows you to hire scooters and bikes to get around, which is useful, as ong lang is a small village and you might want to go further afield.
Khu nghỉ dưỡng yên tĩnh, không gian thoáng đãng, sạch sẽ. Ăn sáng buffet thay đổi món mỗi ngày. Nhân viên tận tình, chu đáo.
冰箱不夠冷 早餐沙拉裡面有頭髮 半夜電視櫃會嘰嘰叫每五分鐘叫一次 發出怪聲 吵得無法睡覺 房內硬體 有些老舊 海濱與花園泳池都很壯觀景色迷人很好 可以達到放鬆效果 雖然最後有幫忙換房間 還貼心送上一個小時spa 還送我們到下一家飯店 除了以上一些不好的經驗 可以讓飯店繼續努力改善 不然服務人員基本上都是親切貼心的 缺失部分都有影片 不發上來是因為 有換房間給延遲退房 給按摩 那就還算有誠意 囉

Vi bodde 12 dager på camia resort spa. Dette er et tropisk eventyr paradis. Fantastiske omgivelser og eksepsjonell service. Bildene klarer ikke å gjengi hvor utrolig flott dette stedet er. De ansatte på resorten fortjener ekstra skryt for sin imøtekommenhet og ønske om å gi oss gjester det beste oppholdet! anbefaler dette stedet til alle.
Lovely hotel and fabulous staff. Good choice of tasty food . What more do you need

The staff made this experience incredible. Especially nhi. She spent hours looking for my phone and successfully retrieved it, booked all my transfers, helped me with my luggage. I couldn t have asked for a better stay

We love the staff, the gm, the assistant gm, the waitresses, the cook, the gardener, the yoga instructor, the cafe staff, the front desk, the housekeepers, the pool guys, the maintenance crew, and more. We cannot express how much we love this hotel. It felt more like home with a huge backyard than an actual hotel. You have got try the burger!!!! and lava cake!!!!!!!! youre hangin by the pool, order a burger with coke and fries. Best burger ever!!!! we stayed at the beach house and got to converse with the lifeguard, the maintenace crew, the housekeeper, the neighbors, and etc... It just felt so right. Btw, the water is drinkable!!! super duper clean!!!

Utrolig lækkert hotel med små bygninger og flotte masser af buske, træer og blomster, lækre pools, lige ved stranden med flot solnedgang, gratis drinks kl 16 som serveres ved pool. Morgenmaden er mere end fantastisk og madvarer af høj kvalitet - ligesom deres frokost og aftensmad er af utrolig høj kvalitet.

My daughter and i spent 4 nights at cassia cottage. We were only supposed to spend 3, but extended a night. -check in went well with jenny showing us around. Lovely young lady. -just a lovely stay. So much attention to detail. The only critique would be it is very quiet. We enjoyed that for this trip but if you are looking for action, you will have to leave the resort. -breakfast was lovely and service is great. Phi remembered us daily and prepared my daughter her gluten free bread as my daughter has celiac disease. We had a dinner of appetizers one evening (all gluten free). Very good. For lunch they also prepared one of their sandwiches on gluten free bread, which was a great option for my daughter. -we stayed in one of the modern rooms. Probably the one farthest from the beach and still so close. No worries with being to far from the beach. Room is extremely comfortable. (bed, pillows etc).cleanliness was excellent. -the grounds are impeccable. Pools clean. Towels and lounges always available. -the malabar could do with a new music playlist as it was very repetiive after being there a few days. -had a lovely and very reasonable priced outdoor one hour massage. We have been at other resorts where they provide a menu for foot and leg massages at the pool lounges. I think this could be a lovely addition. We took daily 8 am yoga class with sasha. We cant say enough about her. Lovely class looking out over the sea. She was a wealth of information
Sehr schöne anlage auch im vergleich mit den nachbarbetrieben. Naturverbunden und konsequent ökologisches gastrokonzept.
Very pleasant and comfortable hotel, with great staff, great food, and well located on the beach and close to town
Great hotel, incredibly friendly staff. Brilliant pool and right on the beach!
ラクジュアリーだけれどアットホームに過ごせるとてもよいリゾートコテージでした スパもあるし 最小催行人数の4人に達すれば ダイビングもホテル内で予約できます 毎朝夕に無料のヨガレッスンを受けることができます ホテルの中のレストランも日本感覚では高くはなく ずっと引きこもっていられる場所でした 部屋から眺めるビーチの夕焼けはとても素敵でした

Resort is nice. Staff are very good. Manager extremely professional and kind. He is doing very good his job. There was also one lady i forgot her name that was fantastic (reception). Food was good and fresh.

Cassia cottage 에서의 휴식은 훌륭 했습니다. 건물은 조금 오래 되었지만 그만한 운치가 있었고 비치하우스 문앞을 나서면 바로앞에 보이는 바다가 너무 좋았고 해질녘에 보이는 노을 풍경이 정말 인상적이었습니다. 바로 옆에는 아이들을 위한 풀이 있어 그곳에서 아이와 즐거운 시간을 보냈구요. 시내와도 가까워 저녁에는 야시장에 나가 각종 해산물도 먹고 쇼핑도 할수 있었습니다. 단, 모기가 조금 많아서 모기약을 챙겨가시는걸 추천 드립니다. 3박 4일 여정으로 갔지만 오는 날에는 일정을 더 추가하여 더 있고싶을 정도 였습니다. 대부분의 직원들은 영어로 어느정도 소통이 가능하여 대화도 무리없이 할수 있었구요. 4일간의 휴가를 편안하게 보낼수 있게 해준 cassia cottage 직원들에게 감사를 드립니다. 다음에도 기회가 된다면 다시한번 가보고 싶은 곳입니다.
Such a lovely place to stay at and we had a fantastic stay at this resort. The staff was very friendly and serviceminded. Breakfast and lunch was very good with fresh food and a lot of spicy taste.

Ett av de beste hotellene vi har bodd på! vi leide en bungalow med hageutsikt, som vi likte veldig godt. Området er utrolig flott, og med tre bassenger og privat strand var det ikke noe problem å finne et sted å slappe av på. Veldig god service fra de ansatte på hotellet, og de hjalp mer en gjerne til dersom det var noe vi måtta ordne. Høyst anbefalet å bo her!
ゆったり過ごすことができた ロケーションとサービスはとてもよい 自然が多いので虫がどうしても入ってくるのと コウモリの糞が少し残念
Desde el primer momento te tratan excelente, todo fenomenal,comidas,desayuno,buenas piscinas,clases yoga,lo recomiendo a todas las personas que quieran descansar y disfrutar de unos días agradables.
Albergo superconfortevole, molto bello con spiaggia! tutti i comfort a un prezzo veramente vantaggioso. Il ristorante è ottimo e la colazione è varia e buona
A lovely hotel with exceptional staff
Chung toi rat thich va da dat lich quay lai day vao ky nghi he thang 7

2018年10月7日から2泊滞在しました 高級ホテルとのことですが スタッフも宿泊客もカジュアルです 部屋 sea view roomは1棟に4部屋ほどが連なっている1階建てのコテージで 部屋の目の前にkidsとadult only2つのプールがあり その先がプライベートビーチになっていました 設備やアメニティはおおむね揃っていて 冷蔵庫 ドライヤー 電気ケトル 栓抜きあり テレビなし クィーンベッド1台と2人がけのソファ1つのシンプルな作りです タオルはオーガニックのようで 洗面台の水は地下50mから汲んでおり飲めるとのこと 毎日のシーツ タオル交換とペットボトルの水を2本は欠かさず対応してくれました 雨季のためか夕方から蚊が多く 部屋前のソファでビールを飲みながら海を眺める と大量に刺されます ベープ ムヒは必須です ベッドには天蓋風の蚊帳があり 寝る時に蚊の心配はいりません 食事 朝食はホテル内のthe spice houseでブュッフェ形式です フォー パン 卵料理と品数は少ないながら一通り揃っています 目の前にはインフィニティプール その先には海が見え 夕日を見ながらのディナーは最高でした メニューはどれも美味しく 胡椒農園だけあって少し辛味が効いています ビールは1杯200円程度 料理は1品1,000円前後とビーチリゾートにしてはかなり良心的で 味と料理のバランスは取れています 他ホテルからも予約してくる人がいるようです 朝食時に誕生日ケーキを出されてる人がいました 同行者の依頼がホテル側のサプライズかは不明ですが 周りのみんなで拍手をして素敵な空間でした プール インフィニティプール kids adult onlyの3つで周りにビーチベッドが並んでいます 埋まることはなさそうです バーが閉じていましたが スタッフが定期的にオーダーを聞きに来てくれます スパ フロントで予約可能です 90分3,000円強だったのでかなり良心的 そのせいか当日予約は昼過ぎのいい時間から埋まっているようで 14 30開始の空き枠に入れてもらいました 施設 トレーニングルーム 売店はありません エリアごとにwi-fiが異なりますがパスワードは共通で フロントからビーチまで施設内どこでも不自由なくつながります その他 ホテル内でアメックス ダイナースは使えないようです ランチは歩いて500mくらいのbun cha ha noiでハノイ名物のブンチャーが300円程で食べられ ローカル食堂ながら比較的清潔です 夕食はビーチ伝いに歩いて3件ほど先のsunset beach barも利用しました ここはローカルではなく観光客向けで食事も欧米仕様ですが ビーチにテーブルと椅子を並べて見る夕日はとても綺麗です

A quiet hotel right next to the beach, we stayed in the old house which had been converted, though the rooms were a little tired looking they had great chatacter. All food, drinks and facilities were excellent and the were always cheerful and helpful. A free cocktail at 4pm was a nice touch.
Very friendly, family run hotel. Great food, staff, location, rooms and gardens...and loved the free daily yoga. The teacher karina was brilliant. All the staff helpful and friendly...
スタッフがいつも笑顔で良い

The hotel is very nice constructed, the rooms and bathroom are very big and clean. The infinity pool and the direct access to the beach make it a must to not leave the hotel during your stay. The staff is friendly and willing to assist you at any time. I really enjoyed my time there and recommend it!

Wir haben drei nächte im cassia cottage verbracht und haben uns sehr wohl gefühlt. Schöne grosszügige, saubere zimmer, mit nettem staff und gutem service! das dazu gehörige restaurant ist auch ganz lecker. Kommen gerne wieder...
Great location, opens to the beach. Good breakfast and friendly staff. I stayed in a beach villa and would recommend this.
Very quiet and peaceful. Food was excellent. Beach access very close and friendly service
The vibe of the place is so relaxed and the yoga is a real bonus. Highly recommended

Beautifully presented. Comfortable and clean rooms. Very friendly and helpful staff. Breakfast buffet very varied with plenty of availability. Very peaceful and tranquil, yet close to shops and restaurants for variety.

Cassia cottage was amazing! we really enjoyed our stay. It is such a beautiful property and very peaceful. The infinity pool overlooking the ocean is awesome and the breakfast was great! the staff is wonderful and took such good care of us while we were there. We can t wait to come back!

Cassia cottage is a great place to stay with kids, big rooms with good aircon, direct access to the beach, kids pool, etc. The staff is also very friendly and helpful. The only item which was good but not excellent was the food in the restaurant, the chicken was dry and most of the meals were too salty. Overall a great place to stay
Sehr schöne anlage, sehr guter service, strand nicht überall sauber

Excellent time here, very chilled and relaxed. Good location, close to lots of restaurants and a few bars. Food here was great, good selection and all very well put together. Service as excellent too, the staff were friendly, happy and helpful, always. Loved it here and would go back again if in phu quoc. It s right on the beach, but the pools are great, not overcrowded. Loved it!!!

L établissement a beaucoup de charme, un écrin de verdure au bord de la mer. Les piscines sont très agréables et offrent toutes une très belle vue sur la mer. C est calme. Le personnel est adorable, notamment au restaurant où la cuisine est vraiment de qualité. Les chambres sont spacieuses et joliment décorées.
3 day stay!

Cassia cottage est un petit paradis .tout est fait pour qu on s y sente bien.le personnel a l ecoute ,prevenant et de bon conseil pour les activites .la mer etait demontee faute a la mousson ...et malgre ce handicap nous avons eu un excellent sejour..le restaurant etait super et leur petit dejeuner excellent .
小而美 且服務人員非常棒

Måste säga att det positiva jag läst stämde helt och hållet. Sen var det synd att det blåste ganska mycket så det gick inte att bads i havet. Beror väl delvis att vi var här under regnperioden. Vi bokade de billigare rummen och de var riktigt bra och superfina badrum. Skönt att slippa ett stort hotellkomplex.
ホテルから出たくない そんな気持ちにさせてくれる 完璧なホテルです フーコックに行ったら絶対また泊まりたい

Cosy resort, nice staff, good breakfast, wonderful yoga class. Located in downtown! old bathroom, so!!!! many mosquitoes and many lizards and snails. Not recommend the taxi tour suggested by a staff...

I loved cassia cottage and wish i could have stayed longer. If you are looking for a retreat away from the hustle and bustle you ve found it. Beautiful rooms, stunning pool and r r. Staff were fantastic. Rooms and the outdoor shower were highlights. All that you need to make a wonderful holiday! i would absolutely stay here again!

We stayed in the heritage garden cottage which was just beautiful. The beach and pool were clean and we swam every day. The staff were friendly, engaging and attentive. The breakfasts and dinners were great. We enjoyed our stay very much.
Ich war rundherum zufriden, alles hat gestimmt, empfang, zummer, restaurant, pools, strand, persolal.

We had a fantastic stay. Beautifully maintained gardens and the best beach area on the strip. Does not have resorty feel. Rooms are modern and very spacious. We did not make use of the pool as we prefer the ocean, but both had ample space with no issue to find a lounger. Beds comfortable, perhaps too comfortable as i never made it to the free morning yoga ) the only thing preventing 10/10 is the restaurant, food is ok with very small breakfast selection. Love that though grow own organic produce. Plenty of restaurants within walking distance of the hotel. Overall, you could not make a better choice in the area!
One of the best hotels we ve ever stayed in! great facilities, friendly and helpful staff. We loved it and would recommend to anyone- hopefully we ll be back!
환경과 경관은 아주 예뻐요. 수영장과 프라이빗 비치도 좋고요. 얼리체크인과 조식을 추가결제할경우 가격이 엄청 비싼데 맛은 그냥 그렇습니다. 서양인이 좀 많은편인데 동양인에게 인죵초ㅑ별이 좀 있습니다. ㅋㅋㅋㅋ 어이가
Très bon hôtel calme et végétalisé et personnel au top
아주 좋아요. 위치도 분위기도 전체적으로 만족한 숙박이었어요.
Tolle ruhige anlage in einem traumhaften garten. Wunderbares restaurant, genug liegen am strand, am pool und unter den palmen. Super spa.
Every detail of the property has been thought out. Wonderful garden, small personal touches by the owner/staff. Gttat place and close to the town
Ett så fint och trevligt ställe. Är verkligen en pärla på phu quoc. En mycket trevlig och familjär inställning hos personalen. Rekommenderar det till 100

생각보다 완전 바닷가쪽이고 메인도로에서 골목으로 200미터정도 들어와야했어요. 택시 기사님들이 잘 모르는 리조트입니다. 오래된 건물이라 어느정도 문이 삐걱대고 잘 안 닫히는 정도는 감안해야했어요. 모기는 피하기 어려웠어요. 개미는 객실마다 복불복인 거 같아요. 저희가 2개방 썼는데 한 방에는 개미가 줄지어 다녔어요. 그리고 한 방은 샤워실이 야외에 있었어요. 이건 사람마다 호불호 있을텐데 샤워할 때 2층 사람들 소리도 들리고 약간 불편했어요. 다들 친절합니다. 아시아인이 훨씬 적어요. 숙소앞 해변이 훌륭합니다. 물이 아주 깨끗하진 않고 스노쿨링하기에는 무리가 있지만 물고기들이 조금 보여요. 썬베드에서 쉬며 수영장, 해변 모래놀이, 물놀이 하기에 아주 좋습니다. 숙소앞 마트도 12시까지하고 음식점, 마사지 등 다양합니다 atm기는 10분 넘게 걸어가야해서 아쉬웠습니다. 주요 관광지인 즈엉동시장과 킹콩마트까지 그랩에서 30,000vnd 정도 나오는데 너무 적은 금액이라 계속 취소됩니다. 걸으면 15분 거리라서 걷기도 애매하고 차 타기도 애매하고 그래요. 북부 남부 이동할 때는 전혀 문제 없어서요.
去年 雨季の９月に行った際 とてもリラックスできましたので 改めて乾季の２月に行ってきました 朝起きてから 夜眠りにつくまで 素晴らしい時間を過ごせます 朝食もおいしいし 雰囲気もとてもいいです またプールもビーチもとても居心地のいい空間になっています スタッフも明るく優しくとても感じが良いです また行きますので よろしくお願いします

Beautiful small resort with clean and nice rooms. The food at the spice house restaurant is amazing so we ended up having most of our lunches and dinners here. Also tried their yoga sessions in the mornings which was nice. Location is good and you can easily walk to the main street where you find additional restaurants and shops. There are sun beds on the beach but you need to be early to find available beds, but i think that was the only negative part of our stay. Once again, food is great!!
Cassia cottages is a very tranquil and lovely place to stay while in phu quoc, which is a lovely but very touristy island. Their restaurant spice house is fantastic.
Great location on a great section of the beach. Fantastic food, friendly staff and a really welcoming chilled vibe to the place.

This is a beautiful property. The grounds are stunning with flowers, trees and shrubs making an idyllic setting in front of a beautiful sand beach. Very peaceful. Swimming was great. Staff very friendly with the guests. Casual vibe. Very good breakfast with great views. Great seafood restaurants right down the small street. Pick your fresh fish from the cooler and they grill it for you. Very inexpensive, but good quality and flavors. We also stayed three nights at a more expensive, secluded resort, but liked this one more due to the beach and its more lively surroundings.

Booked the 2 bedroom beach house for 6 nights, very comfortable with an absolutely fantastic outside space located next to a small pool. Had some rainy moments, so great to be able sit very comfortably outside. Breakfast nice. Ate lunch a couple of times at the hotel s beach bar, really good quality. Sunset views from this beach bar stunning too. Only 10/15 mins to airport. Several places to eat, and a couple of local shops and spa/massage places on the lane that the hotel is located on off the main road. Also massage on beach right in front of hotel.

Our recent 5-day stay at cassia cottage on phu quoc island was nothing short of magical. Nestled in a serene location, this charming resort offered everything we could have hoped for and more. The family house accommodation surpassed our expectations in every way. Spacious, beautifully appointed, and thoughtfully designed with comfort in mind, it provided the perfect home base for our island adventure. We were pleasantly surprised to discover that our booking included half board - an unexpected bonus that added tremendous value to our stay. What truly sets cassia cottage apart, however, is the exceptional hospitality. The staff went above and beyond to ensure our comfort, anticipating needs before we even expressed them. Their warm smiles and genuine desire to make our stay memorable were evident in every interaction. This attentiveness was perfectly demonstrated when they prepared a special takeaway breakfast for our early departure flight - a thoughtful gesture that saved us from traveling on empty stomachs and showcased their dedication to guest satisfaction until the very end of our stay. The owner s personal touch was apparent throughout the property. From the carefully curated décor to the attentiveness to guest feedback, it s clear that cassia cottage is a labor of love. The owner s presence and engagement with guests created a welcoming atmosphere that felt more like staying with friends than at a resort. The attention to detail extended to every aspect of our exp
Lovely resort in a great location. Friendly staff.
Location, service, facilities, room, all top notch. We were pleasantly surprised at how well this location was set up. Really enjoyed our stay and would definitely stay again

Cassia cottage was a highlight of our vietnam stay! the location (accessible to main town), gorgeous beach/pool outlook, best food in vietnam onsite at spice house, morning yoga with a great instructor, and above all a really lovely staff - nothing was too much trouble and they were genuinely so kind. Superb!
Hyggeligt hotel med alt hvad der hører til. Super lækker morgenbuffet og rigtig sødt personale.

Nice beach side resort with sumptuous breakfast that has lot of vegetarian options. It was comforting for us vegetarians as it is not easy to find food that does not has meat in it. Property condition could be better but nonetheless it is clean and comfortable. Staff is very nice and polite. Overall a nice stay. I will come again to this resort.

After experiencing the hustle and bustle of ho chi minh city and hoi an we were ready for some relaxation. Our experience at cassia cottages was very tranquil and serene, just what we were looking for. The property has a lovely restaurant, spice house, and a fun beach bar to take in the gorgeous sunsets. The pools, and the beach were great. A good area for long beach walks! the staff was really a highlight for us. They were very friendly and helpful, we thoroughly enjoyed our interactions with them. Our room was spacious and clean. The outdoor shower was wonderful! all in all a lovely facility that we would be happy to return to.

Thank you to cassia cottage for the most amazing 10 day stay. A special mention to david, lorenz, juliana, phi and kim (and the rest of the fabulous staff) for making us all so at home. Cassia cottage is an eco, boutique hotel on ba keo beach, in a quiet location situated down a short lane and near the more upmarket la verandah hotel. It is a 20 minute walk to the night market, although we took taxis due to the heat. It is also close to restaurants and bars on the main road of duong dong. It has 3 pools. An infinity pool, a children s pool and an adults only pool. It has a beachside bar called malabar which serves cold beer etc, the spice house restaurant which is popular with locals as well as guests and serves fresh home grown spiced vietnamese food as well as western food at reasonable prices with mains mostly around usd 10, cocktails around usd 6.50 (my favourite being the phu quoc spicy pepper martini) louis pinel rose from france usd 21.50 a bottle and saigon beer at usd 2.00. All in all, exceptional value for one of the top restaurants in phu quoc. We gorged ourselves at the delicious breakfast every day which had pho soup, egg station with bacon and sausage, cereals, home made yogurt, home baked bread croissants, pain of chocolate etc etc and not forgetting the tamarind jam!!!!! we tended to either share a salad at lunch pool side and ate dinner at the spice house 4 times and at little family run restaurants on the main road for the rest. Thank you cassia cottage

It s a very relaxing place. The food is excellent. The staff is great. Very attentive and very friendly. My room was very nice, they have drinkable water from the tap. I will definitely stay here again!
Lovely place for couples , nice and quiet. Beautiful sunsets to enjoy with a cocktail

We liked that it was very relaxing - besides communication issues with the staff, those were minimal. It would be nice if the hotel would take a moment each morning to pick up the trash and litter on the beach. It was discouraging to see their own construction project was also a big part of the trash around the hotel.
Brilliant stay, beautiful spacious room, clean and comfortable,
Wonderful stay. Have already left a review.
Beautiful view and nice garden, yummy breakfast

Totally loved this place. It is beautiful with lots of trees and gardens, and an especially lovely stream coursing through the property. We only had a very slight issue one day with getting housekeeping to clean our room, but it was a minor miscommunication, and any requests we had, such as replacing the room mini-fridge or the battery in the safe, were promptly addressed. The breakfast buffet had good variety, featuring different dishes each day, and excellent choices of fresh breads, all kinds of fruit and vegetables and fresh cooked eggs in any way a guest chose. The grounds are well-maintained, very pretty, and all 3 pools are very clean. Lastly, the staff were excellent - very friendly and helpful, and a big shout out to ron, my, phuong and minh - thanks for making a visit to remember. I definitely recommend this place!

I took my parents past week and we all absolutely loved it. The whole area was beautiful, it felt like i was walking through a botanical garden. I specifically chose this resort because my mom loves plants and nature. The pool areas were very nice, they use well water so it s so smooth and not chemical-y at all. I would have loved to lay on the beach area since they do have a private beach but the tide was very close to the property so wasn t able to enjoy the beach area as much unfortunately. I m not sure if it was expedia s fault or the hotel but i guess our reservation didn t go through so the original room i had booked wasn t available the first night but the staff handled it very well. I honestly didn t really mind but they apologized so many times so i couldn t even get mad really d. I m not sure if it was because everything had to be done very fast but the rooms weren t that clean but it wasn t unbearable or anything, just small things. I do want to mention, the staff are very very kind and my parents want to definitely want to go back to this place if we go back to the island again. Thanks for a lovely stay!
It was such a lovely place the staff was super friendly. The food location were also very good with a beautiful view of the sunset.
Jeg ja de er dejligt 3 dages iphone i et stort rent og lyst værelse. Restauranten er ikke god, men alt andet får 5 stjerner.

Cassia cottages has a beatiful campus directly on the ocean with clean rooms and an excellent restauraunt on site. The staff was incredibly friendly and went out of their way to help us make the most of our time in phu quoc. The included breakfast was very good as well.

I stayed at the hotel only for one night. But, i felt relax because of the environment. It has a private beach and beautiful pool, and i could enjoy sup board near the beach. The staffs are all kindly and speak english well.

We loved that there were shops and restaurants within an easy 10min walk but then after the hustle bustle of the main street a short wander bought you back to the quiet tropical haven of cassia cottage. The staff were great and attentive to any requests. The gardens, restaurant, pools and beach were clean and inviting and while not a shiny modern resort the boutique ambiance of the original cottages was exactly what we were looking for. We loved the private outdoor shower garden, good air con, and excellent wi fi in our spacious ocean view room with a mattress much firmer than we are used to being our only concern. The malabar beach bar was being refurbished so closed while we were there but due to open very soon and we are sorry we missed experiencing the fabulous sunset from this prime location.
フレンドリーな ブティックリゾートです
We were only staying for 3 days but liked it so much that we stayed another excellent staff and good quiet location. Will definitely stay again.
Friendly staff, comfortable environment, clean room, awesome private beach, excellent service. What should i complain?
Modern and quiet facilities in central location. Everything was very nice.

Very spacious property, and the beach is just 20 feet away. We were impressed. Too bad that we couldnt go to the beach due to the storm. Lan, the host, is very nice and very responsive. Due to the storm on the island, we couldnt stay the full 3 nights. Host offered us credit for whatever days we have left behind. Its a pleasing suprise since we didnt expect it. The driver was also superb. We forgot our tablet at the stay and he came back to pick it up for us while we were having breakfast. We will go back next time we visit phu quoc.
ドライヤーが15秒に一回止まってしまい 髪を乾かすのが大変でした プールもビーチも完璧だったのですが 髪を乾かすのが時間がかかり残念でした それ以外は施設もスタッフもとっても良かったです

Overall, great experience. Bed was a little uncomfortable. Ants and geckos in the bathroom. Staff was excellent and very attentive to our needs. Food was great. Had one of the best pizzas ever (four cheese). Very pleased with the visit overall.
従業員の接客が悪かった 特に受付をしていたフロントの女子社員2名 部屋のシャワーの水圧がすごく弱い 全日二人目がシャワーを浴びるときお湯が出なかった 夜は冷えるのですごくつらかった
휴식을 취하기에 더 없이 좋은 환경과 직원의 친절함에 감탄을 금치 못했습니다 단지 편의 시설이 부족한 것이 아쉽다면 아쉬움이었어요

It is really a perfect place. Perfect. Except for one thing, which i guess we cannot blame the resort - the sea in phi quoc is becoming a sea of plastic. There s lots of plastic in the ocean, and that is very very sad. Phi quoc is becoming very polluted.

This small resort and spa is paradise on earth. The villas are located on a private beach amidst lush gardens, beautifully designed and furnished. The breakfast buffet, which is included, is amazing! the spa is excellent too and i enjoyed free yoga lessons.
친절한 직원분들과 매일 룸에 아로마 오일로 가득하게 서비스를 제공해주었으며 프라이빗 비치에서의 여유로움도 환상적이었습니다. 직원들은 한상 마주칠때 마다 반갑게 인사해 주었으며 조식또한 저에게는 좋았습니다.
너무나 아름다운 해변에 위치해 있습니다. 방앞에 바로 바닷가가 있어서 좋았습니다. 레스토랑에서 4번에 식사를 했는데 모든음식이 맛있었습니다. 리조트 근처에 식당이나 마트가 없어서 불편한것 빼면 완벽한 곳이었습니다.

Fantastisk resort, vacker miljö, trevlig serviceinriktad personal. Stora rum men riktigt bra sängar och ännu bättre sängkläder. Gratis cyklar, windsurfing och kajaker. Jag skulle absolut välja samma hotell om jag åker tillbaka.

Toller aufenthalt!! abseits mit privat beach.freundliches personal und sehr guter service! einzig, das bett war sehr weich und auch beim frühstück könnte es etwas mehr auswahl haben und zum teil frischer sein ( brot )! für den preis muss mehr kommen!! preise an der oberen grenze!! in der umgebung entstehen jetzt sehr viele neue grosse hotels!! die konkurrenz schläft nicht!!!
The setting was pure magic. As we were there in extreme heat, we most enjoyed the infinity pool overlooking the bay. The staff was very gracious and attentive. Enjoyed the spa services immensely.
Alles entsprach der beschreibung sehr zuvorkommendes personal wunderschöne lage
Lebevoll gestaltetes, kleines resort. Tolle strandnahe villas mit allen annehmlichkeiten und authentischem design.

내 예약에 포함돼있던 스파2인 무료 부분에 대한 실랑이로 체크인후 그들과 3시간 넘게 시간을 보내면서 이미 나는 지쳐갔고 이 전에도 이런일이 있었는데 모든 사람이 설명하면 받아들이고 이해했다는 부분에 더 화가나서 확실이 할 필요가 있어보였다 끝까지 나를 이해시키려 했으며 도무지 난 받아들일수 없었다 acess라는 부분을 스파area에 접근할수 있다고 설명하는데 어떻게 받아들여야할지 그럼 숙박하는 사람중에 2명만 그 스파area에 가서 뭘 하라는건지 정말 너무 억지스러운 설득이었고 개별적인 혜택에 대해서 그들은 이해력이 부족해보였다 결국 나에게 계속 그들이 문제제기했던 싸이트에 문의하고 연락하고나서야 첸시측에 다른 매니저가 등장하면서 체크아웃전에 내 권리를 행사하고 왔다 f b10프로 디스카운트 혜택 부분도 결국 결제 금액에 이미 해피아워여서였는지 할인된 부분이라고 말하는데 계속 이들과 싸우고 싶지 않아서 이부분은 결제하고 왔다 이 리조트는 자연친화적으로 모든 소품, 어매니티등 컨셉자체가 너무 맘에 들었으나 직원들의 응대와 쓰레기가 떠있는 해변자체 컨디션은 바다로 들어가는걸 망설이게 했다 아름다운 리조트, 이런 프로모션 문구에 대한 이해도와 어떻게 고객을 맞이할지 이러한 프로모션자체를 어떻게 응대해야할지에 대한 준비가 전혀 돼있지 않았고 이것에 대한 계획과 구체적인 내용을 직원들도 파악해야 할 것이라 생각한다 다음날 스파를 이용하면서 개인적으로 스파에 확인하고 시간도 리셉션이 얘기해줬던 10시에는 준비가 안된상태라 불가능해서 체크아웃 시간이 얼마 안남아서 겨우겨우 10시 30분에 스파 받고 체크아웃하고 바로 나오는 정신없었던 기억이 강하게 남는다 아름다운 리조트 하지만 나의 예약에 대해 설득시키고 설명하다 힘을 다 뺀 여행이었다

We stayed for 4 nights and had a really lovely time.the resort is really, really beautiful and the staff are overall very helpful and attentive. We had a couple of hiccups and misunderstandings - the check in staff said our vip benefits included a small discount on food and drinks but at the end of our stay they only discounted food. The cleaners picked up our laundry bag that had laundry cleaned the day prior and charged it to our bill despite explaining to different staff. The massage therapists arrived 5 minutes late and shortened our massage by 10 minutes. Despite the small nuances, we had a great time and would stay again. The buffet breakfast was amazing! the pool was incredible. Big plus was no single use plastic and the resorts efforts to have enviro friendly practices. Thanks again for the stay.

Chen sea var den perfekte ramme om en luksuriøs, afslappende ferie ved stranden. Her var lige præcis så eksotisk og paradis-agtigt, som vi havde håbet på, og det er nok et af de bedste hoteller, vi nogensinde har prøvet. Resortet ligger i smukke, velholdte omgivelser, og værelset var lækkert og stort med et fantastisk badeværelse og en hyggelig terrasse. Den private strand var upåklagelig - og ikke langt fra nogen af bungalowsne -) en privat strand tilhørende et hotel er i øvrigt et must på phu quoc, ellers risikerer du at skulle bruge tid på at finde en af de sjældne offentlige strande. Fra hotellet kan du komme til en lille nærliggende by på ca. 7 minutter på cykel (gratis udlån på hotellet) eller ca. 25 minutters gang. Det eneste minus er, at priserne på mad og drikkevarer er skruet godt i vejret i forhold til resten af øen, og det er ikke fordi, kvaliteten af disse er højere. Vi fandt meget andet god mad til en væsentligt lavere pris. Desuden manglede det generelle serviceniveau (betjening i restauranten, hjælpsomhed i receptionen, personalets engelskkundskaber) et lille nøk opad i forhold til prisen, der er høj for vietnam-standarder.
We spent the first 6 nights of our honeymoon at chen sea and totally loved it. The hotel facilities, service, food and drink and general ambience are all amazing. Will definitely be back!

Kleines luxusresort am strand, in dem man sich wunderbar erholen kann. Sehr entspannte atmosphäre. Das personal ist sehr fleißig, freundlich in jeder hinsicht entgegenkommend. Wir können das chen sea uneingeschränkt empfehlen.
Mycket fin resort med fin strand och pool. Utlåning av sup, kajak, katamaran förhöjde upplevelse. Enda negativa var att tennisbanan var nerstängd!
Very nice hotel located in a private beach. Very taste breakfast.

무엇 하나 흠잡을 곳이 없는 완벽한 휴양지입니다. 깨끗한 시설, 환상적인 경치, 친절한 직원들, 맛 좋은 음식들.. 창문을 열자마자 펼쳐지는 깨끗한 해변은 더이상 아무것도 하기 싫어지게 만듭니다. 객실의 갯수 자체가 적기 때문에 굉장히 조용하며, 북적거리는 느낌은 없이 느긋하게 휴양을 즐길 수 있습니다. 환상적인 장소입니다. 다시 푸꾸옥에 가게 된다면 반드시 재방문할 의사가 있습니다.
The thoughtfulness of what you get for your money is worth every penny- such an amazing place.

初日出先から部屋に戻ると スズメ位な鳥が 部屋で飛んでいた ジャグジーの部屋なのに壊れていますと言うだけ 30センチ位のヤモリが部屋内シャワーの上の材木に張り付いていた 二日目 部屋内のシャワー室に７ｃｍ位の蛙が 入ってこれない構造なのに 飛び跳ねていた ３日目外の壊れているジャグジーの底中でヤモリが黄色の腹を見せて死んでいた 現地在住の日本人 友達が全てフロントに報告しましたが 回答無し ４日間 エキストラベットに黒いホコリの粉 ヤモリの汚物 天井の柱 に 住んでいて 動くと落ちてくる 此れは推測です 毎日でした

Wir waren im oktober eine woche dort und haben den strandbungalow 111 bewohnt und sind begeistert! bungalow mit super netter terrasse, davor ein kleiner garten und dann gleich strand und meer. Der bungalow ist schlicht, aber sauber und nett eingerichtet. Das personal unglaublich freundlich! wir waren mit unserem 1jahrigen sohn dort und der wurde von allen seiten verwöhnt und geherzt. Für kleine kinder finden wir das resort perfekt, weil die nähe vom haus zum strand so super ist und somit das kind mittags zb im haus schlafen kann, während wir am strand lagen. Generell ist das resort sehr ruhig. Wer party oder lange abende an der bar will, ist hier falsch. Aber für familien oder paare ist das perfekt. Übrigens auch das essen. Wir waren drei wochen auf der insel, in unterschiedlichen hotels und dort haben wir am besten gegessen. Wenn auch nicht am günstigsten, aber qualität hat eben ihren preis. Unser fazit das chen sea wird so schnell nichts topen können und wir werden wieder kommen!
Very peaceful place, great service,great spa toiletries and food.
From start to finish we had an amazing time at chen sea. Staff were simply outstanding and couldn t do enough for us. The rooms were spacious and with everything you could need and more!!

Hotel liegt direkt an einem schönen privaten strand! kleine aufmerksamkeiten vom hotel wurden jeden abend ins zimmer gelegt sowie duftkerzen angezündet. Wunderbar! am strand selber gab es so gut wie keinen service. Um getränke und essen zu bestellen musste man selber zu den mitarbeitern. In der nähe befinden sich keine weiteren restaurants deshalb waren wir gezwungen das hoteleigene restaurant, welches für die westlichen touristen ausgelegt ist, zu testen. Richtiges würziges vietnamesisches essen gibt es dort leider nicht. Wer jedoch tatsächlich pizza und pasta in vietnam mag ist hier wahrscheinlich richtig.
位置遠離繁榮的市區但是能得到優質的服務與住宿環境 飯店服務相當周到 餐廳食物非常好吃只是價格稍微有點貴 但是仍然非常划算 海灘維持得很好 可以在度假村待上一整天享受藍天大海與spa 飯店也有提供很多免費的活動可以嘗試

Amazing resort with great beach and we got upgraded to the swimming pool villa which was a great bonus.. It was massive and having your own private pool was great. They do have sport facilities like snorkeling and paddle boating and balls to play volleyball which was good fun. The food is a little expensive on the resort but we had no complaint over quality. We stayed for 3 night and thoroughly enjoyed it.

Fantastic overlooking beach. Water was lovely and warm and quite clean. Sandy beach. Water craft (paddle boards, kayaks, wind surfers) available at no extra charge. Plenty of shade through trees and umbrellas. Only recommendation is to have fly screen doors on villas, as we prefer to sleep with fresh air rather than a/c, which also blocks the sound of the waves on the beach.

Vi bodde i underbart rymlig villa med egen pool. Rent och bra. Fin gemensam pool på området, men den lilla privata var toppen. Perfekt för några dagars avkoppling för de som gärna slappar på hotellet.

It s a small resort so doesn t feel crowded. Super friendly staff and the food is great. The rooms are very comfortable, nice decoration and all the amenities necessary. I would return to this resort again. Highly recommended.
Tranquil boutique resort on private beach near ong lang. Excrllent staff and clean, comfortable accomodation. The pool villas are highly recommended.
Lovely new resort with lovely beach, warm seas
3日ボケーっと過ごしました こういう時間の過ごし方はサイコー 波の音もよくまた夜星が綺麗でした リフレッシュした

Amazing stay, staff were amazing and very accommodating for our needs and dietary requirements (gluten free). Parts of the hotel needed some work and maintenance and if they did this it would be even more beautiful. The beach front villa was definitely worth it and the views were incredible. Would highly recommend. The bar and restaurant serve great food and drinks, making the most of happy hour! there was also a small beach cafe next door called bamboo which we used for a cheaper lunch and drinks. The activities available were ace and we tried everything! the free beach massage was great too, we had one every day of our stay. Overall despite a couple of maintenance issues the hotel stay was fantastic and a great way to celebrate a birthday!!

Endroit paradisiaque, personnel très accueillant et serviable, chambres avec vue mer hyper confortables, luxueuses sans être ostentatoires, cuisine.savoureuse et variée (en plus, pour le midi, possibilité de petit resto local voisin les pieds dans le sable, très démocratique) baignade très agréable également température idéale et eaux limpides. Belles balades à faire le long de la plage et dans les villages voisins (vélos à disposition) seul hic pollution sur les plages hors hôtels, choquant ...
An amazing hotel in a beautiful location. Drinks on the jetty to the sound of the sea. Bliss!
Great staff, great location, lovely.beach!!!!
静かなプライベートビーチに面してて のんびり寛げるホテルです 波も穏やかで静かな環境です 隣にレストランがありますが それ以外は徒歩で行くのはちょっと大変で自転車で5 10分行けば それなりにありますし タクシーで20分くらいで繁華街にも行けるし タクシーにもさほど困らず のんびりするつもりが 色々出かけてしまいました
Pristine location, great service and food, clean and tastefully furnished rooms. Everything was truly excellent!
Sehr ruhig gelegenes hotel. Strand war ein traum und der service 1a.

An idyllic quiet spot with a beautiful and well-kept garden and lovely rooms. We had a nice sea view room and enjoyed bathing in the sea every morning and laying on the beach. The restaurant is beautiful and the breakfast and dinner excellent with local products. Good opportunities to borrow bicycles on the hotel. Or rent a motorbike outside til hotel. We enjoyed our stay very much.
The best resort and hotel in phu quoc. I don t think that you will find better than this one! the service was reaching the excellency and everything was perfect!

I love it. The swimming pool villa was big and cozy. The staffs were amazing helpful and nice. So friendly. Not gonna spoil how amazing they are, just go and find out. My husband and i were very surprised, and would definitely come back again. Love love love
휴양하기에 매우 훌륭한 시설입니다!! 다음에 다시 꼭 가고 싶습니다.

Eine kleine ruhe oase mit super küche - vietnamesisch sowie italienisch. Sehr sauber und gepflegt, das personal ist sehr freundlich und liest einem jeden wunsch von den lippen ab. Nichts scheint unmöglich zu sein. Toller, sauberer privatstrand und ein traumhaft schöner pool. Kleines sportangebot möglich - kanu, surfen, standup paddeling..... Die massagen im spa sind sehr zu empfehlen! wir kommen wieder !
スタッフ全員が大変親切だった 静かに波の音を感じたい方にはお勧めです
This place was magical!!! a must stay. We didn t want to leave!!!
Notre villa jacuzzi était exceptionnelle ! chambre et salle de bain ultra spacieuse, personnel au petit soin, cadre idyllique. Petit déjeuner à ne pas rater, et les massages sont très bien !

Très bien plage privée de l hôtel très belle et très propre ! super restaurant vietnamien sur la plage à côté de l hôtel ( qui ne fait pas partie de l hôtel) qui permet de manger sur la plage midi et soir
静かでプライベート感があり 草木を優しく丁寧に育てているので最高のリゾートでした また来ます
개인적으로 푸꾸옥 리조트 중에서 바로 앞에 프라이빗 비치가 있어서 너무 좋앗습니다. 이탈리아 사장님도 계시는데 동네 이장님처럼 돌아다니면서 챙겨주시는데 가족같으면서도 시설도 정말 좋은 리조트였어요! 담번에 또 방문하고싶네요
Ein perfektes hotel zum entspannen

Nous avons passé quelques jours en famille (4 adultes) dans deux bungalow avec terrasse qui donnent sur la plage juste fantastique ! personnel aux petits soins et petit déjeuner au top avec jus pressés frais . Et personnel super réactif sur whatsapp très très pratique ! piscine à débordement de rêve qui donne sur la plage . Le paradis !!!
Just like it will come back someday

We can truly recommend this amazing resort spa. We stayed in a 2 bedroom pool villa which was very spacious, clean and authentic. The resort follows a high environmental concept with no plastic bottles , reusable or nature sourced products. The restaurant is fantastic with a large menu and they delivered with high quality on every dish we ordered. There is a lot to do, beautiful pool, beach is clean and there are plenty of things to do (free), as snorkelling, sup, kayaking. Finally the staff is the best of the best - super helpful, friendly and professional! we can truly recommend a stay here - it combines a boutique resort tranquility, friendliness and service with a larger resorts variety of things to do and eat. One of the best resorts we been staying at (and we travel a lot ) - highly recommended!
What a great place to relax. Little hidden gem in phu quoc. Great service and great food. Would definitely go back.
Lovely beach villa, very spacious and clean. The resort is peaceful and well maintained, staff are friendly and the food was good.

Complimenti davvero. Mai vista una simile attenzione al cliente, una pulizia quasi maniacale, una buona manutenzione (muri pulitissimi), tante piccole coccole come una salviettina fresca al mattino in spiaggia, una pallina di gelato al pomeriggio, una storia e cioccolatino alla sera in camera. Personale gentilissimo e professionale. Da migliorare insonorizzazione della porta comunicante tra le due camere...si sente tutto. Mettete un pannello fonoassorbente. Da tornarci di sicuro.
ロケーションが最高
Hôtel idéalement situé au sein du vieux quartier. Équipe et spa formidables.
자연친화적인 숙소, 파도소리를.들으면서 받는 spa는 최고의 만족 입니다.

Quite a good bungalow, large, spacious. Of the minuses i will note the already quite outdated equipment and furniture. The jacuzzi is too old and does not heat the water, so there is no need to use it. The housing needs repairs, as there are many cracks where insects crawl. Overall, a good bungalow, the resort has a large stunning pool with a view of the sea.
Otel kesinlikle çok iyi. Personel mükemmel. Otel kesinlikle eksiksiz.
Một kỳ nghỉ đáng nhớ và thật relax
Tuyệt vời.

직원들이 정말 친절해요. 몇가지 아쉬웠던건 이용한 샤워가운을 교체해 주지 않았어요. 그리고 지금 메인 풀 공사중인데 저희는 풀빌라에 머물러서 괜찮았지만 풀빌라에 안계신분들은 조금 실망스러웠을거 같아요. 수영장 이용 못하는대신 옆 리조트 수영장 이용할수 있게끔 왕복 라이드 제공과 사과의 의미로 돌아가는 날 비행기 시간에 맞춰 공항 데려다 주셨어요. 아침 메뉴도 매일 똑같고 아주 조금씩만 바껴서 삼일째 되는날에는 좀 질렸어요.
Beautiful beach, pool and facilities. Staff were lovely and helpful. The bikes worked but the brakes were not in good repair. The prices of the cocktails and meals were overpriced.
Schönes resort mit sehr gutem service. Das personal ist sehr motiviert und zuvorkommend.
Anniversary dinnerにcooking class,spaを利用しました コスパはいまいちですが ﾎｽﾋﾟﾀﾘﾃｨと快適さ お料理がおいしい事が良かったです

今回のこのチェンシーホテルでの滞在は大変不愉快なものとなりました まず 初日にホテルの場所は非常に分かりづらく表示も無い 送迎のサービズ このホテルの前に泊まったグリーンベイは送迎サービス付き がないので不親切な印象 チェックインの際にわざわざ高いジャグジー付き部屋を予約したにもかかわらず ジャグジーは壊れていた しかも長い間修理していない様子 部屋のチェンジも叶わずジャグジーは使わずじまい 翌日には明らかに部屋に置いてあった妻のカーディガンが紛失 ちゃんと探せば出てくると思ったが結局出てこずじまい 最終日には飲んでもいないミニバーを請求されこのホテルのハウスキーパーには服の件を含め大変不信感を持った このクラスのホテルでは珍しく 従業員に笑顔がなく気持ちが良くない 設備 ホスピタリティー ロケーション 食事 の全てをみても全くこの評価ポイントは理解できない 今後のホテル選びに大変な不安を覚えた
2階の部屋が雨漏りしてきた バーも早く閉まっていた
素晴らしい滞在でした 部屋もプライベートプールも毎日清掃されました 朝と夕方には部屋にアロマが炊かれ 部屋中 香りに満たされました 朝食は 品数は多くないが どれも美味しい 麺と卵料理はカウンターで作ってもらえます スパも清潔で丁寧 おすすめです

What an amazing place, so quiet and isolated. There are no many guests as this property have only 36 amazing villas. Beautiful private beach and great infinity pool! highly recommend and we ll definitely come here next time.

수영장 뷰가 엄청난 곳입니다. 데스크직원 등등 모든 직원들이 너무 친절했으며 하나같이 책임감있고 열정있게 대해주었습니다. 레스토랑 조식도 너무 맛있었고, 야간바에서 먹었던 피자 파스타 모두 맛있었습니다. 숙소 뒷편엔 바다가 바로 보이는 뷰고 그런 뷰를 보면서 따뜻한 스파도 할수 있었습니다. 그리고 샤워실이 너무 이뻐서 보는순간 반했네요 ㅎ 그리고 천장에 달린 선풍기 덕분에 에어컨을 틀지 않아도 시원했습니다! 너무 만족했던 숙소이고, 푸꾸옥에 다시 가게되면 또 이용하고 싶은 곳입니다.
Really nice resort. I stayed beach bungalow , beach front bungalow and jacuzzi villa. All of them are really nice and specially, jacuzzi villa is amazing.
コテージに 家族 カップル 親子とプライベートもささっかり守られて

This is a wonderfully isolated property to allow for some downtime during your trip to vietnam. The spa was wonderful - book the body scrub, it was absolutely our favorite part. The food in the main dining area was delicious, but we thought the food at the bar wasn t anything special, but it has a great seaside view.

Sehr schönes ambiente und der blick von der rezeption auf s meer macht auch gleich lust auf mehr. Auf den ersten blick ist alles sehr schick, nach ein paar tagen fallen einem dann aber schon einige makel auf. Vor allem der strand. So schön wie der sand auch ist, der ganze angeschwemmte müll ist schwer zu übersehen (auch wenn die mitarbeiter stets bemüht sind alles sauber zu halten) asiatische länder haben öfter müllprobleme, wenn man das vorher weiß, kann man sich damit sicher abfinden.

We ver much enjoyed our stay at chezcarole. The beach, pool, food, rooms and staff were amazing. Arrangements were made for us to tour the island on one day at a reasonable cost. We also travelled into duong dong for the evening market. Wonderful evening. If you want a quiet relaxing space with all the goodness mentioned, the chez carole is the place.

This is a good beach getaway. A bit isolated but fine if you are looking to just relax on the beach or by the pool. There is nothing else nearby within walking distance so unless you take a taxi you re stuck on the property. The restaurant serves very good vietnamese food and has an extensive western menu as well. The restaurant staff were friendly and accomodating, especially one waiter named duc, his english is very good.

L hôtel est assez excentré l utilisation de taxi ou de scooter et obligatoire si l on veut bouger un peu. Le cadre est très agréable, le calme et la sérénité se font sentir dès notre arrivée. Seuls bémols, nous sommes obligés d aller à la pêche aux informations, le personnel n est pas des plus réactifs. Il n y a egalement pas assez de transat pour tous les voyageurs. Concernant le restaurant, nous n avons pas été très satisfait rapport qualité/prix. Si vous rechercher du farniente au bord de la mer, alors vous passerais un séjour agréable.
Un super établissement avec du personnel très sympathique. Un très bon séjour dans ce bel établissement. Je recommande.

Fina rum men missvisande att det är havsutsikt när det är utsikt över floden när vi dessutom betalde mer för det rummet än de med utsikt över floden. Ganska dålig service. Helt ok mat. Fin strand och fin pool, men strandbaren verkar vara nedlagd, skötseln av floden och vissa delar av området ganska dålig. Ligger fint på stranden men hotellt ligger långt från andra restauranger och shopping så man blir beroende av moped alternativt taxi.
Very quiet place perhaps also because we were just 2 bungalows out 50 bedrooms (but they didn t offer a late check out )

Eine vergleichsweise naturbelassenes gelände in der weniger touristischen ecke der insel. Von hier kommt man gut überall hin sofern man sich auf die verkehrsmittel roller und taxi einlässt. Sehr ruhiger strand und nettes personal, auf anfrage wird einem alles gebucht und/oder infos zu aktivitäten und co. Gegeben. An sich ist die unterkunft und die ausstattung etwas in die jahre gekommen, aber dafür ist man auch näher dran als in den großen resorts die kaum was mit vietnam zu tun haben.

Eine woche vor anreise wurde uns mitgeteilt das wegen renovierung das restaurant nicht geöffnet hat.als wir abends ankamen hörten und sahen wir nichts.fer nächste morgen zeigte dann die wirkliche situation. Laut und unerträglich überall schmutz und das ganze hotel renovierungsbedürftig.wir haben sofort bei hotel com reklamiert aber das wurde nicht umgesetzt.schreckliche zwei tage.in der strandbar könnten wir frühstücken abends hat das personal billard gespielt und war nicht an gästen interessiert. Wir würden keine nacht mehr dort verbringen und auch nicht mehr über hotel com buchen. Man hat nur die möglichkeit mit einem virtuellen chat partner zu schreiben. Leider kann ich hier keine bilder hinzufügen ich werde die bilder auf der seite des hotels bei google hinzufügen

It s position nestled in the corner of a soft sandy beach amid great stone walkways, lush gardens, orchids and numerous. Coconut trees along the shore. If you appreciate older gardens, love waking up with the sun rise and the high tide waves crashing on the stone jetty then you have nature at your doorstep..the property has had better days but the overall picture makes you wonder how much more beautiful the property was when built and created by its original owners..someone s dream is forever a part of chez carole. I truly hope the present and future owners will see it s present beauty, restore it s beauty and understand how well it all fits with its surroundings..very special, great energy and a strong grounding feeling with nature.
Need a motor bike to get anywhere
Hotellet ligger vid en fin strand med väldigt lite folk på. Så här har man nästan stranden för sig själv. Det är detta som är bra med detta hotellet, sen resten har mer att önska.

Stayed in a bungalow villa. Although slightly dated , clean and with everything well thought out. Room was cleaned every day at no extra charge. Very good bar and restaurant with breakfast included. Good choice of food. Beach was stunning and so peaceful. Also hotel has a very good swimming pool which was again very clean and fresh pool towels provided daily. Staff were excellent- nothing too much trouble and very friendly. Only downside is that they didn t understand much english but google translate took care of that. Special thanks to jessie, jon (the assistant manager) and tam - excellent service would definitely stay here again
O saw so many little fish species from the confident of my deck. It was heaven

The hotel is far away from the main tourist area, but there are also opportunities to shop and eat nearby. The complex is very quiet with a private beach area and a small pool with a beautiful view of the beach. The restaurant serves pizza, burgers, spaghetti and meat as well as local dishes with meat or fish, and a variety of drinks. The staff is very friendly. There are both good and bad things to say about the bungalows the good thing is the size of the rooms, and there is free cappuccino, tea and water. The bad thing is that the facade and roof need to be renovated, so you might get uninvited guests. A little tip rent a scooter and explore the island - it s really fun.

Hotellet i sig var trevligt och vår villa fantastisk med altan mot havet. Maten var bra men inte mer, men då är vi nog rätt kräsna efter ätit fantastisk mat dagarna innan i hoi an. Det finns tyvärr inga restauranger nära, vi gick till närliggande resort och åt med, men var heller ingen wow. Om man gillar slappa på samma ställe där det är lugnt och är ok att äta på hotelrestaurangen varje måltid är platsen perfekt. Frukosten var bra. Men vi som gillar att gå och äta på olika ställen passade detta inte alls tyvärr, även om boendet var mysigt. Vi bodde kvar 2 dagar av 5 och flyttade sen till longbeach istället. Personalen var trevlig. Personal som städar upp stränderna, vilket behövdes när det blåser in massor av plast. Fans sup och kanot att låna. Och en helt ok pool. Även volleybollnät.

This place is amazing!!! the service is incredible - right from the start smiles were on everybody s face and they never left for our entire stay. The pool and beach are superb... Chilling by the pool and watching the sunset while sipping on beers and cocktails is what dreams are made of. A quick walk down the road gets you to a minimart or a little longer stroll down the beach gets you into town to buy food and see the locals. The beach in front of the resort is perfectly clean and there is volleyball, kayaking and paddle boarding to be done. The rooms are beautifully spacious and clean, and even with a mozzie net - which is definitely needed. The best sleep i have had in ages... Due to the bed and the peacefulness of the place. The gardens are beautiful, with lots to look at and even a pool table hidden in another bar area. I would definitely stay here again - possibly bringing many more friends. Thankyou to all the staff who made us feel welcome!!! oh and definitely go on the tour we were recommended that takes you to the south of the island where you go snorkeling and on the massive cable car - thanks for the recommendation!!!
A great property with tons of charm and beautiful views. The pool is amazing. The staff is extremely attentive and the food was 5 star.

Omgivelserne var absolut ikke svarende til billederne. Billetterne giver et meget mere positivt og charmerende indtryk, hvilket viste sig ikke at være tilfældet i virkeligheden. Stedet er meget øde, med ingen mulighed for alternative spisesteder i gå afstand. Vi fik en ringe modtagelse. Blev ikke hentet i lufthavnen trods oplysninger om ankomst tid. Personalet i restauranten taler virkelig dårlig engelsk. Der er desværre heller ikke noget positivt at sige om maden virkelig kedelig og smagsløs. Morgen buffeten var kedelig og trods adskillige personaler i restauranten var de fleste fade tomme. Værelserne var til gengæld rigtig fine store og rene med rigtig fint badeværelset. Poolen fremstår pæn og ren. Stranden var fin, men vandet ikke klart, måske pga udmundingen fra vandløb. Der var en standbar, men den var lukket. Vi rejste 3 dage tidligere end booket. Receptionisten tilstede ved vores afrejse var venlig med godt engelsk.

Pretty remote in location, outdated and in need of a refurbishment. Staff were not friendly or helpful, the bath overflowed, the bed was uncomfortable and hard! sheets were not changed. Structure of the bridge to the water bungalows was a bit dodgy and then the water bungalows themselves needed upgrades, stones falling off around the bathtub and the sliding doors were not secure with gaps in the frame essentially inviting in all creepy crawlies (geckos) from outside. I will not be back and i urge you not to bother going.
Phòng ốc sạch sẽ, trong khu grandworld đi chơi vinwonder, vinsafari thuận tiện. Quan trọng là cô chú chủ nhà rất thân thiện, hỗ trợ check in sớm và check out trễ. Sẽ ở lại nếu có dịp

By luck, we decided to choose jm cacavilla retreat to stay for 1st time in phu quoc. It s located on the eastside of phu quoc,from the map it looks like on the remote side of the island but that what we wanted. Our first impression was wow!!! we got upgraded into a nice villa style with kingsize bed, premium towels ,sheets, nice bathroom with shower, big stone soaking tub and good running hot water. Our villa is only 100 meter from the ocean, and before that was an outdoor beautiful infinity swimming pool where we spent almost our time there. Also, catch the sunrise here is unbelievable scenes. We also had free delicious breakfasts , and the restaurant here has a good menu for everyone including vegetarian dishes. We also met mr.dung, the owner of the resort, very friendly and hard working person to keep the place running smoothly. All the staffs here were very friendly, happy and polite. We felt very blessed and joyful that we chose to stay here. Next year we ll back and stay longer.
Loud neighbors one night and early morning a guy banging on his boat at 6am
Lovely family resort, friendly and helpful staff. It s quite remote but if you re looking to unplug / detox it s perfect. Would definitely stay again.

Wonderful staff. Nice facility and quiet away from the main city which i like. You can rent moped at the hotel for the day and ride around the island. Hotel can also arrange a ride for you to wherever you want to go. Round trip to night market is 650,000vnd for 6 of us which is not bad. Only thing i would suggest is to add porridge to the buffet breakfast and have more variety of food on the menu for lunch and dinner. Laundry if by weight 30,000vnd/kg, but please note it s hang dry and not machine dry. Our clothes came back all wrinkly and bugs on them. I understand the bugs. It is an island after all. Maybe there is a section to check for ironing for a charge which i missed. But overall stay is nice.
조용하고 너무 좋은데 푸꾸옥 동부의 특성상 너무너무 한적한게 장점이자 단점입니다.
The staff was beyond amazing from check in to check out. Everyone was so friendly and helpful. This was truly an amazing place, very peaceful and quiet.

I reserved the ocean front view bungalow and everything i expected. I booked this place based on reviews new, beautiful bungalows steps to the beach. But when i got there, it was beyond my expectations. I am used to 5 stars resorts big chains i.e marriott sheraton intercontinental ritzs etc. Jm casavilla is so unique in term of location and surroundings. The grab driver cautioned me that this resort is so far from everything from town center, i said it s ok because i spent a week in sensory overload hcmc so i need the tranquil and solitude, i wasn t disappointed. Obote everything else, all the staff was so nice gracious and attentive to my every needs, room was cleaned with quick speed everyday, and whatever else you need, they came through. What amazed me was the foods, from the casual look of the dining area, i didn t expected much, reakfast was nice and adequate for lunch we just wanted to grab quick bites so we don t have to venture outside of the resort, but to my suprise the foods were just amazing worthy of michelin stars (i am a foodie so i know good when i tasted it. Needless to say we ate all our meals at the resort for the whole week and not repeating. I don t have enough words to describe my love for this place. I will come back for sure, highly recommended to everyone who s looking for a 4-5 stars of a quiet retreat. A plus for all the staff.
숙소상태와 조경,수영장은 너무 좋습니다 하지만 시내랑 너무 멀리 떨어져 있어 불편했지만 그랩으로 충분히 이동 할 수 있습니다 리셉션에

Jm casavilla retreat exceeded all expectations! the serene location, stunning infinity pool, and beautifully designed rooms made for a relaxing stay. The staff was incredibly kind and attentive, ensuring every detail was perfect. Waking up to ocean views and enjoying a peaceful atmosphere was just what we needed. Highly recommend for anyone seeking a quiet, luxurious escape!

All the staff were so wonderful! the pool is huge and amazing- we loved it! they only have one restaurant- it was also very good. Breakfast daily was wonderful.
