I am glad that i picked the right place for a last minute booking. My previous booking did not confirm. It s a family run small operation by the beach and it s walkable to the main road, where you find everything including a bus stop for those free ev buses to airport! nhien, is the host and we communicate thru whatsapp. She also works at the associated bar by the beach and it s just relaxing environment. You can get massages, food, snacks and drinks (asian beaches). The few days i was there, i didn t bother to go to other beaches as they can have trash as reported, but not this one. I m sure the business clean them up real well. Water is clear and calm all the time when i was there. There s still some trash under the water but definitely tolerable in southeast asia standard. Our host, nhien with her dog would go into the water on a paddle board together and it was the cutest thing. I visited during low season, but i think it makes it perfect if you want some relaxing beach vacation. No banana boats or other noisy water activities. The room itself is basic but that s what i need. Ac worked fine and never had power issues. Don t expect it to be some higher class hotels. If you want an no-frills carefree accommodations, this is it.

Phòng tôi nhận và phòng trên ảnh không giống nhau, phòng lúc book có bồn tắm và lúc nhận thì không có. Tới nơi đúng lúc hồ bơi bảo trì nên cũng không bơi được, những thiết bị giải trí khác thì cũng bị hỏng nên không chơi được, đồ ăn sáng thì ít món và làm theo khẩu phần nhưng lượng đồ ăn cũng ít. Lúc book phòng thì có ghi chú có đưa đón sân bay free và có xe ra trung tâm chơi mỗi ngày vì khách sạn ở xa, nhưng sau đó liên lạc khách sạn mới biết phải book 2 đêm mới được đưa đón sân bay free, còn xe ra trung tâm chơi thì vì ít người nên cũng không có, muốn đi thì phải trả phí. Ngoài ra lúc tới nơi không có nhân viên lễ tân mà chỉ có người quen của lễ tân trực nên không tìm được đặt phòng, cũng như không chuyên nghiệp.
Resort quá tuyệt vời. Thích hợp với ai muốn nghỉ ngơi yên tĩnh. Buffet sáng ngon. Có xe đưa đón sân bay free. Quá giờ check out mà khách sạn vẫn cho ở lại phòng không cần phải trả

Vào đúng ngày mưa, đường vào bị lụt, đi chơi muốn về phòng nghỉ ngơi nhưng nước lụt ngang hông, không về được, ra vào rất khó khăn. Trong phòng thì wifi rất kém, xem youtube không nổi. Mình ở 2 đêm ở đây mà không dọn phòng. May có em lễ tân sn 98 dễ thương, và đội ngũ nhân viên khá nhiệt tình kéo lại cho cái resort không thì mình đã cho 1 sao
Phòng đẹp, phong cách ấn tượng, nhân viên nhiệt tình và tận tuỵ ! sẽ quay trở lại khi đến phú quốc !

Resort rất rất tuyệt vời. Gia đình mình gồm 04 người có người lớn tuổi và em bé ở lại đây trong 04 đêm khung cảnh rất yên bình, tách biệt khỏi sự xô bồ bên ngoài. Hồ bơi rất rộng, đẹp. Phong cách nhà gỗ cổ vn rất ấn tượng. Có xe đưa đón sân bay, đi chợ đêm miễn phí. Nhân viên cực kỳ thân thiện, dễ thương. Phòng rất rộng, giá phải chăng. Ăn sáng rất ngon. Resort có sẵn không gian rộng lớn để khách có thể tự mua đồ về nướng bbq, có sẵn karaoke để khách hát hò, nhảy múa. Sẽ quay lại nếu có dịp quay lại phú quốc!
Cần nâng cấp tranh thiết bị và cảnh quan của khách sạn

Trừ đường vào hơi xa và hẻo lánh, còn lại mọi thứ ở maison đều rất đẹp, rất tuyệt vời. Khuôn viên rộng, nhiều cây xanh mát mẻ, cây ăn trái nhiều, hồ bơi lớn, đẹp, bữa sáng ngon. Các căn bungalo rộng, đẹp, riêng tư, yên tĩnh. Cổng sau resort là suối đá bàn, đi vào mùa hè rất mát, nước suối trong. Resort có cả vườn bbq, rất thích để nghỉ dưỡng. Mình sẽ lựa chọn maison tiếp cho chuyến đi phú quốc lần sau.

- khi đặt hàng qua ứng dụng app chị không biết vị trí phòng ở đâu với mức giá trên ứng dụng, khi nhận phòng thì vị trí cuối resort rất vắng vẻ trong khi các phòng khu tập trung còn phòng trống. Có vẻ phòng ít được sử dụng nên mùi trong phòng không dễ chịu, chị phải mở cửa phòng cho thoát khí để giảm mùi. - do resort khá xa trung tâm nên bữa tối chị phải ăn ở nhà hàng, phục vụ ít người nên khó gọi và thời gian chờ bữa ăn khá lâu.

Khách sạn hơi xa trung tâm, nhưng có xe đưa đón tại sân bay, bác chủ dễ thương thân thiện lắm, tết còn được bác chủ lì xì lấy lộc ngày tết, tất cả nhân viên cực kỳ dễ thương và nhiệt tình. Phòng rất sạch sẽ, không khí rất trong lành và yên tĩnh, hồ bơi lớn. Không có gì phải phàn nàn. Cảm ơn rất nhiều vì sự nhiệt tình. Sẽ tiếp tục ủng hộ nếu quay lại phú quốc.

Resort cách thị trấn dương đông khoảng 7km nhưng đó không là vấn đề nếu bạn muốn trải nghiệm cảm giác yên tĩnh. Mình rất hài lòng khi book phòng tại đây, phòng rộng rãi, tiện nghi, view đẹp. Nhân viên vui vẻ, hỗ trợ khách nhiệt tình. Buffet sáng tại resort là một điểm cộng, có nhiều món từ âu sang á cho bạn lựa chọn. Mình sẽ quay lại đây nếu có dịp

Khách sạn rất to và rộng, yên tĩnh nữa. Các anh chị staff hỗ trợ hết mình trong các vấn đề tour du lịch đảo nên mình cảm thấy khá thoải mái. Chỉ có vị trí là hơi xa khu trung tâm, nhưng bù lại có bus hỗ trợ đi chợ đêm. Vì phú quốc cũng chưa phát triển đô thị nên ngoài các khu vui chơi giải trí thì xung quanh cũng chẳng có gì lắm nên không bị lo là xa nên không đi chơi được đâu v
Rộng rãi, nhiệt tình. Phòng y như hình

Resort yên tĩnh và phù hợp cho những du khách muốn trải nghiệm thiên nhiên, tắm suối đá bàn. Cần chú ý các vật dụng trong phòng không bị hư hỏng trước khi đón khách. Vd két, ly nước, chốt cửa phòng vệ sinh..vv

Thật sự là không có điểm nào để chê luôn. Nhà mình săn được phòng giá rẻ phải gọi là bất ngờ nhưng dịch vụ nhận lại được trên cả bất ngờ luôn. Một không gian làm mình hoài niệm về nhà ở quê ngày xưa. Không gian rất rộng, thoáng mát, hồ bơi siêu to, đồ ăn của nhà hàng ở resort nêm nếm rất vừa miệng ăn rất ngon như cơm mẹ nấu ). Cảm ơn maison du đã tiếp đãi gia đình mình rất nhiệt tình chu đáo, lần sau có đến mình sẽ lại ghé maison du.
Trừ 1 điểm là xa trung tâm còn tất cả các điểm khác đều rất tuyệt vời! resot rất đẹp, sạch, giá cả phải chăng, nhân viên tận tụy, phục vụ vô cùng chu đáo. Sẽ quay lại nhiều lần nữa.
Hài lòng về dịch vụ cũng như cách phục vụ của mọi người tại khách sạn. Lần sau nhất định quay lại khách sạn ạ

Mình đến khách sạn 2 người, đón tiếp cũng niềm nở, còn nhiệt tình hỏi ăn sáng chưa mời tụi mình lên ăn trong lúc chờ nhận phòng, vì khách đông phòng chưa có, mình cung chẳng nghĩ gi chỉ la thấy khách sạn mời thân thiện thì lên ăn, nhung đến luc check out thi lại phụ thu phí ăn sáng hôm nhận phòng 160k 2 ngừoi, nếu ngay từ đầu nói la có phụ thu phí thi minh không bất ngờ, đằng này đến khi check out mới tính vào, thời gian ở phòng thi dơ, phân con gì tùm lum, luc mưa không biết bọ búng gì bay vào đầy phòng, gọi lần đầu thi noi cho người lên, chờ cả đêm 1-2h sáng không thấy ai phai trùm mền kín ngừoi mới ngủ được. Mình và ông xã rất bực bội khi đã nói vơi nhân viên luc check out ma không có lời xin lỗi nào.
Khách sạn đẹp, phòng giống hình, nhân viên thân thiện, ở rất thoải mái, có xe đưa đón sân bay.
Phòng đẹp, rộng rãi thoát mát, tuyệt vời với phong cảnh ở đây, tôi sẽ trở lại vào năm sau

Khuôn viên resort rất rộng, yên tĩnh, gần gũi với thiên nhiên. Nhân viên rất vui vẻ, tử tế và nhiệt tình. Địa điểm hơi xa bãi biển và những nơi vui chơi, nhưng nếu lựa chọn để nghỉ ngơi thì rất tốt vì phong cách cổ điển và yên bình

Zachęceni pozytywnymi opiniami o resorcie zdecydowaliśmy się na zarezerwowanie 3 nocy z możliwością przedłużenia pobytu. Już po pierwszej nocy żałowalismy naszego wyboru. Dokonując rezerwacji nie byliśmy świadomi tego, że szałas który otrzymuje się w ramach pobytu, jest otwarty. Nie chodzi tu tylko o otwartą łazienkę, ale również o to, że jest solidna szpara między ścianami a dachem, przez którą łatwo przedostaje się wszelkie robactwo. W domku brak suszarki, czajnika, lodówki - jest pudło ze styropianu do ktorego trzeba przynieść lód. Brak jest telefonu, przez który można by się skontaktować z recepcją w razie problemów, nie wspominając już o klimatyzacji. Aby odstraszyć komary, wewnątrz domku codziennie zapalano spirale odstraszające, co powodowało, że przebywanie w środku stawało się nieznośne nawet dla ludzi. Zasięg i jakość sygnału wifi poza restauracją były bardzo słabe. Teren należący do obiektu jest bardzo duży, ale sprawia wrażenie nieukończonego. Ścieżki są jedynie wydeptane i słabo oświetlone w nocy, a po deszczu stają się błotniste. Wystają korzenie i kable elektryczne, o które łatwo się potknąć. Śniadania były pyszne, a restauracja ładnie położona na skałach i to chyba jedyna pozytywna rzecz, którą możemy napisać o tym miejscu. Zwiedziliśmy niemal całą azję se, ale jeszcze nigdy nie trafiliśmy na tak kiepski stosunek jakości do ceny. Płacąc co najmniej 200 za noc oczekuje się czegoś więcej niż liście nad głową.

Mango bay resort was the perfect location to finalize our vacation i vietnam. After hectic cities like hanoi and saigon your really get to unwind at a resort like mango bay. The beach front bungalows were of great quality and staff kept it neat at clean. The beach was clean and there were lots of sun beds available. The staff on the beach were also extremely service minded and there very kayaks, sup and snorkeling equipment available free of charge. The restaurants served high quality food with a large variety and all was very tasteful. Pick up and drop off at the airport was also arranged by the resort and worked perfectly. A true pearl and well kept resort, highly recommendable.
전반 적으로 만족스러웠습니다. 하지만 에어콘과 냉장고가 없는 곳은 처음이라 좀 적응하는데 시간이 걸렸습니다.
西海岸に面したステキなリゾートホテル サンセットを見ながらのディナーは格別 プライベートビーチやスパもあり ホテル内で全て完結できる ただ 唯一の難点は蚊や虫の多さ 蚊取り線香や虫よけスプレーも完備されてはいるが そこは我慢が必要
Den eneste grund til at mango ikke får fem stjerne er at der en af vores nætter var en rotte på vores værelse. Ellers fantastisk hele vejen rundt

As soon as we arrived we were right at ease and well taken care of by the staff. Our rammed earth cabana was was charming and visited by numerous geckos over our stay. Despite being open air, we did not have any issue with insects in our room. The food at the restaurants was mostly superb, although the service could be a touch better. The real star here is mango bay s grounds, beaches, and the calm warm waters of the gulf of thailand. The flora is well established and due to the low number of guests it feels at times like your own private getaway.

I witnessed the resort staff be extremely rude with day-trip visitors who temporarily sat on a beach bed (reserved for guests) and were sent away with brutal manners. That was really unpleasant and upsetting for us to witness. I think manners in the hospitality sector should always be at the highest level regardless of whether you are talking to a guest or to a visitor (who might potentially become a guest). Mango bay is one of the nicest spots to visit in phu quoc, therefore there are many tourists invading the resort at daytime despite not being official guests. Of course, this is not an ideal scenario for the management even though it doesn t seem to be unhappy when both bar and restaurant fill up very quickly.

Wunderschöne anlage direkt am meer mit vielen kleinen bungalows die mitten im grünen liegen. Alles mit viel holz, und bambus schön an die natur angepasst. Die kleinen hütten sind nicht bis unters dach geschlossen, das bad ist komplett im freien. Wer also angst vor ameisen, gekkos, fledermäusen etc. Hat ist hier vielleicht nicht so glücklich. Gegen moskitos gibt es ein netz über dem bett und vom housekeeping werden abends überall rauchspiralen angezündet. In allen bereichen tolles personal, 2 wunderschön gelegene restaurants, ausgezeichnetes frühstück und abendessen, tolle cocktails. Nur das service team im beach restaurant war leider etwas gelangweilt und lustlos, ganz anders als im on the rocks restaurant, hier war der service top! schöner strand und nettes kleines spa, mit tollen anwendungen und sehr professionellen mitarbeiter. Rundherum ein perfekter aufenthalt in wunderschöner umgebung nach unserer tour durch vietnam. Wir haben uns sehr wohlgefühlt und können das mango bay absolut weiterempfehlen!
잘 관리된 숲에 위치한 친환경적인 숙소였습니다. 천장 없는 욕실에서 샤워를 하거나 요가를 하는 등 다양한 경험을 할 수 있어서 좋았고 시내로의 셔틀도 일 4회정도 있었습니다. 숲의 울창함 치고는 벌레가 없는 편이었으나 그래도 작은 나방과 지네 서너마리는 각오하셔야 합니다

Eco friendly can mean a bit too rustic for me. Resort picked us up from the airport and checked us in late. Room was dark and outdoor bathroom was dark. They could use some directed spotlighting. Outdoor bathroom took some time to get used to but was fun showering outside. Restaurants were great. Beach staff, the one guy, was helpful and attentive. Tourists from many different countries were there enjoying the clean clear beach, food, spa treatments, and weather. Although it was winter, temps stayed in the 70s to 80s. About the rustic part - i want nicer sheets and towels. Mattress was comfy enough and had a nice veranda with table, hairs, and padded loungers. There was a little bit of nature in the room, a gecko and a spider which was quickly ushered outside with a broom. Mosquitoes were kept at bay with a daily smoke treatment. Only 1 bite,

Perfect location in ong lang area situated on the beach. Beautiful bays to swim or snorkel in and we did not miss having a swimming pool at the resort. However we could have used the pool next door but preferred the ocean. There are a variety of good restaurants in walking distance and use of bicycles are available. The two restaurants in the resort are in unbelievable locations overlooking the ocean and the food menu including breakfast is spot on for taste and variety. We stayed in a plantation beach bungalow which was large, had amazing views, comfy and housed everything we needed. The outdoor bathroom space is amazing. Loved our stay here. Very helpful and attentive staff.
Look no further, mango bay has it all!

Fantastisk resort! utroligt smukt med virkelig mange fine planter og palmer. Helt vidunderligt at bo i naturen i bungalow og udendørs bad. Lækker mad, gode faciliteter, især mulighed for snorkling ud for hotellet var godt. Området udenfor resortet var ikke spændende.

Had a great time at mango bay. The staff was incredible and so helpful and welcoming. The bungalows were so peaceful and the overall space was beautiful. Our first night we got attacked by mosquitos but we told the staff the next day and they provided us with another net for our bed and got us an extra fan. The town of phu quoc is very peaceful and quiet, not much going on though. We had bad luck and it rained most of our trip but overall i would stay here again. The food is beautiful but expensive, the inclusive brekkie was the best we had in vietnam. My favorite part about mango bay is how is is an ecofriendly resort and they care about the environment.

生憎の暴風雨の中 二日間の大半を部屋とレストランで過ごしました 最初 部屋の中に蟻の行列を発見しましたが 小一時間もすると何処かへ去っていきました 蚊取り線香を一度に６つも炊いて蚊対策をしたお陰か 蚊には刺されませんでした 虫よけスプレーが部屋に完備されているのも親切でした 風雨が強い時には 枕元にも雨飛沫が入ったりしましたが 落ち着けば虫の音や得体の知れない鳴き声の中で キャンプ気分を味わうことが出来ました 天候が良い時期に滞在したら 良い思い出になると思います
Beautiful hotel with great staff. Incredible breakfast and food. The free activities at the resort were also great (yoga, tai chi, kayaking).
Great beach hotel with a super friendly service team. The restaurant on the rocks is truly amazing! great view, delicious breakfast, stunning dinner! i would return to this hotel anytime again.
Eco resort on the water in a secluded position - ideal for the total getaway holiday.
Good but the room price is probably too expensive
너무편안하고 좋은 여행이었어요 다행히 모기도 거의안물리고 벌레도 크게 많지않았어요 팬만틀어도 그닥 덥지않았고 새벽엔 쌀랑해서 이불덮고잤어요
Great place fantastic service. If critters and animals is not your thing, consider somewhere else.
It was perfect time for me to stay mango bay. I love the place.
It was very different! i have never stay in a place like, wasn t expecting it to be so open, loved the shower outside!! missed air conditioning for myself i found it so hot with out it..
対応もよくすごくゆっくりできるホテル
정말 자연친환경적인 숙소입니다. 특히 리조트내 레스토랑 음식 전부 맛있어요. 그리고 특히 썬셋 기가막힙니다. ㅜㅜ최고에요 진짜 너무 좋았어요. 방갈로 문열면 바닷가입니다.....간혹 아니...자주 도마뱀나와요 ㅋㅋㅋ (정법 찍고싶은분들은 망고베이로 / 럭셔리는 jw메리어트 / 야시장 구경하고 적당한데 찾으시면 노보텔 추천)
Everything was perfect from the accomodation to food and friendliness of staff.

온더락 레스토랑 현재 리노베이션 하는중입니다. 아쉽게도 이용 못했어요 ㅠ 제가 간 기간에 요가클래스 하려고 했는데 선생님이 휴가를 가셔서 못했습니다. 허나 해양스포츠 할 수 있는 액티비티가 있고 추천합니다. 한국에서 경험할 수 없는 컨셉의 리조트! 조식도 세미 뷔페 스타일로 운영되고 서비스 좋습니다. 장점 자연친화적 컨셉, 바로 앞이 바다라 풍경 굿! 스파하는 장소가 바로 바다 앞이라 파도 소리 들으며 스파 가능! 새소리를 들으며 기상 가능 단점 시내에서 거리가 좀 있음 (리조트에서 운영하는 셔틀을 탄다면 괜찮을듯), 벌레가 많아 무서워하시는 분들은 조금 힘들 수 잇을것 같아요. 다녀와서도 자연 환경속에서 보냈던 시간들이 기억에 많이 남습니다. 추천!
The ocean view at the restaurant is beautiful! if you like the rustic setting of the room then this is the place for you. It is a 3 star hotel.

If you want top service with a smile in a relaxing environment - don t hesitate to book mango bay. What a find - yoga , the treatments, the food, the staff all top notch. Very member of staff had a smile and nothing was too much trouble. A little slice of paradise for 4 nights - bliss!
Back to nature holiday
とても静かな場所です リラックスに最適です
This is a unique and perfect place close to mother nature. We loved every minute of our stay. The hotel, the beach, the food and the staff are world class. We would definitely book it again!

Wow! five star eco resort. Just an amazing experience. Sea plantation villas were gorgeous. We had such great sea views. Water was so warm and the location is quiet and somewhat secluded. Fabulous range of activities and the food was fresh and exceptional quality. We didn t leave the resort for the five days we stayed. No need. The staff were amazing and really catered for our vegan needs - remembering these each day without prompting. This truly is a special place for those wanting a sustainable alternative to mainstream resorts. Highly recommend. Small note might want to bring allergy medication as pollen was a little agitating for us.

Nous avons été enchanté par ce séjour dans cet endroit au milieu de la nature qui se démarque des complexes hôteliers et même des autres établissements du même style, par l espacement des logements, la nature verdoyante, le confort et le service. Que ça soit les chambres ou les bangalows, tout est très confortable avec des grandes espaces et des salles de bains extérieures spacieuses. Le service est excellent et le personnel compétent le plus est le restaurant qui propose des plats délicieux en fusion de cuisine dans une ambiance romantique.
Tranquil resort with excellent food and service oriented staff. Beautiful bungalows providing all amenities you need for an easy and relaxing stay. A truly restorative environment!
Voyage en famille (2 adultes et 2 enfants 2/4 ans, nous avons sélectionné la villa). Vraiment très bien.

Beautiful property that honors nature and tranquility. Most genuine and kind staff! we learned there is a a buffer of 4 hectares to woods that will stay undeveloped to support wildlife and biodiversity. Would return in a heartbeat. Thank you mb staff!

Mosquito paradise, the bungalows have no mosquito mesh on windows and doors and the mosquito net over the bad is full of hole s. Water in the shower and sink is also dark brown. The beach and area is nice but this hotel is extremely overpriced for what they deliver, i recommend trying one of the many other resorts in the area.
유니크한 리조트, 정말 특이하고 자연경관이 아름다워요. 바다 깨끗해요
Very nice resort but some of the toons are very far and needs walking

Wunderbare ruhige wohlfühloase in einer gepflegten grünen anlagen mit traditionellen bungalows und einem privatstrand. Das personal ist äußerst freundlich und zuvorkommend, die anwendungen und massagen im wellnessbereich himmlisch. Umweltschutz wird groß geschrieben und die mahlzeiten (frühstück, dinner) köstlich und abwechslungsreich.
Skønt resort, dejlige mennesker og fede omgivelser. Dejlig restaurant og lækker varieret morgenmad

This place is amazing. I stayed here 8 years ago and loved it so was eager to come back and it did not disappoint. The resort and room were beautiful and very evo friendly. The restaurant is also amazing, we had a great dinner and breakfast. The free yoga was also great.
Superbe endroit encore très naturel restaurant de qualité très bon rapport qualité prix très belle situation
분위기는 진짜 끝내줍니다. 일상에서 벗어나 이색적인 경험을 하고 싶다면 망고베이로 가는게 맞아요. 근데 벌레랑 이동성이 좀 부족하네요. 조식서비스도 메뉴가 제한적이라 좀 불편했습니다.

Das hotel ist eine sehr schöne resort und kann ich nur empfehlen -). Auch das restaurant ist hervorragend und wir haben hier öfters gegessen. Ich habe für komfort nur zufrieden genommen, da es in der nacht trotz der ventilatoren sehr warm war und wir uns schwer getan haben zu schlafen. Dieses war uns aber natürlich von der anreise bekannt, dachten nur das es kein problem wäre. Für uns war es dann leider eins.

Perfect for a relaxing, rejuvenating holiday with lovely staff, excellent food, and a great bungalow complete with geckos, hammock and a sense of complete escapism. Even though i was there during the rainy season (july) and it did rain for quite a few days, i still had a wonderful time. I highly recommend mango bay resort!

Just lay back and relax. Amazing staff, friendly, helpful and good english. Wonderful food that comes out looking and tasting superb and quickly. A lovely atmosphere. They bend over backwards to make your stay as pleasurable as possible. Taxi service was swift and never a problem. Beach staff so happy and cheerful and beach always cleaned and looking pristine. I had a wonderful experience here and would love to return one day. I stayed for 3 weeks and could have stayed longer.
Enjoyed the stay very much anything was well organized. Hotel was great

Sehr entspannte atmosphäre, tolles leckeres essen! betreiber setzten auf nachhaltigen tourismus (keine plastikflaschen, kein pool). Eine tolle gepflegt anlage mit super schönen bungalows. Würde sofort wieder hinfahren. Klare empfehlung!

Wonderful staff, delicious food of all variety, 2 clean beaches with lounge chairs and shade. They have thought of everything you may need (adaptor for phone charging, umbrella, flashlight, bug spray to name a few). Grounds are beautiful and well kept. This is an eco resort so no plastic, glass water pitchers in your bungalow (filled daily) and bamboo straws!

진짜 너무 좋아요. 하루만 묶은게 아쉬워서, 다음날 선셋보러 택시타고 다시갔어요. 객실이 야외랑 좀 오픈되있어서 벌레가 들어오기쉬운데. 모기장 있어서 괜찮구요. 저희는 나방이 들어와서 소동이 벌어지긴 했는데 ㅋㅋ 다행이 추억으로 기억해요 ㅋㅋ 그리고 레스토랑 밥 진짜 맛있고. 바다에서는 스노쿨링 장비 빌려서 놀면 진짜 재밌어요. 그리고 무료 클래스같은거 있는데 그것도좋고. 망고베이간날은 그냥 리조트 안에서 하루종ㅇㅣㄹ 놀면되요.

We loved our stay, friendly staff, excellent food, fantastic location. The only, very small, criticism would be that the room was very dark. Overall we didn t care because everything else was so wonderful.
Mysigt och lungt. Supertrevlig personal o fantastiskt mat. Gillade eko-teamat vilket skilde sig från alla andra hotell på ön men det blev varmt på natten utan ac.

Wir sind zwei wochen durch vietnam gereist und hatten für 10-20 die tollsten unterkünfte inkl. Frühstück. Hier zahle ich das 10fache!!!! schönes resort o.k. Aber der strand ist öffentlich zugänglich, backpacker schleichen sich hier rein um für lau das maximum rauszuschlagen und ihre freundinnen zu beeindrucken. Sie werden zwar von den liegen geschmissen, aber dürfen hier rumschreien und sich mit den handtüchern in den sand legen, spielen ball und schreien rum. Komme mir vor wie auf einem spielplatz! beworben wird es jedoch mit einem privatstrand! das gefühl hat man leider ganz und gar nicht. Hätte ich das vorher gewusst, hätte ich mir auch oben an der straße ein zimmer zum evtl. Fünftel des preises geholt. Die sich hier rumtreiben und benehmen wie die axt im walde machen jedenfalls nicht den eindruck als würden sie mehr zahlen. Auf anderen hotelseiten wirbt man mit günstigen zimmern und der nähe zum mango bay strand suche den fehler! free wifi für alle ohne passwort, kein wunder das sich die jugend hier gerne aufhält. Man sieht kaum hotelgäste außer beim frühstück was nich inklusive ist. Der großteil geht raus, das erklärt warum die von draußen nicht verjagt werden, die trinken dann aus anstand mal ein bier und das sind ja wiederum einnahmen. Außerhalb trifft man hotelgäste in jeglichen restaurants, warum nur?

Ruhiges eco-friendly resort direkt am strand. Sehr entspannt alles. Nettes personal, gutes essen. Privatstrand gab es jedoch nicht, jeder konnte an den strand. Hab mich wohlgefühlt. Dennoch ist es verwunderlich, dass einfachster komfort (kein telefon, kein tv, keine ac, keine minibar ...) doch so viel kosten kann.
Best!

Great service, free snokelling equipment, sup, kayak, bat and ball. Two waterside restaurants, excellent service from pick up at airport to reception to restaurant staff striving to meet needs of vegan customers.
Loved everything about this experience, location, hotel, staff and the food were all outstanding. Would highly recommend
ﾋﾞｰﾁに近く快適なホテルでした
최고
Good food and service. Bungalows are spread out over a large area. Peace and quiet. Rustic and nice if you don t want air conditioner.

Mango bay resort er en sand perle! selve resortområdet er ufatteligt smukt (og rent). Maden på de to restauranter er superb! der er mulighed for diverse aktiviteter såsom yoga, cykling og kajak (gratis). Værelserne er meget autentiske, gennemførte og smukke og det udendørs badeværelse er skønt! tag til mango bay hvis i skal til phu quoc!
Jag har nästan ingen lust att nämna hur bra detta var - för att behålla hela känslan. Kind regards helen
Wonderful

Excellent food and cocktails. Nice clean beaches. Good breakfast. My husband struggled without air conditioning and with the open style bungalows although it didn t bother me as much. Missed having a swimming pool.

Boede her med min familie i 4 nætter i family deluxe bungalow. Jeg havde set en del gode review så mine forventninger var høje, men må sige at de blev indfriet allesammen ! fra vi blev samlet op i lufthavnen til vi tjekkede ud igen var servicen helt i top, vi blev af alt personale mødt med smil og en vilje til at gøre vores ophold helt fantastisk. Hotellet ligger på en af øens bedste strande med den mest fantastiske udsigt og solnedgang. Hotellet har valgt at fokusere på miljøet og er derfor indrette på mange måder herefter. Lad mig give nogle eksempler - der er ingen aircon, men blæsere og vifter - der er ikke køleskab på værelset, der er til gengæld er fin træboks med en termoboks hvor der kan bestilles drikkevarer og genanvendelige isposer til efter behov. - der er drikkevand på værelset, men dette er i kander og ikke flasker således at der spares på plastik/flasker. Hotellet har dagligt gratis aktiviteter, bl.a. Yoga, thai chi, drage bygning, gratis udlån af kajak, snorkling udstyr, sup mm. Hotellets restaurant er øen måske bedste, faktisk så god at de andre hoteller anbefaler at man tager derhen. Her får man super morgenmad helt ned til vandet hver morgen! ja, priserne er højere her end sammenlignet med andre steder i vietnam men det er det hele værd. Helt igennem en fantastisk oplevelse - jeg ville ikke tøve med at tage dertil igen!

Mango bay resort var så skønt et paradis for mig at jeg bookede endnu en nat her. Man kommer helt ned i gear og services man møder lige fra chek ind til udcheckning kan ikke beskrives men skal opleves. Jeg kan varmt anbefale dette fantastiske sted hvad enten man rejser alene eller som par.
Très bel hôtel pas surpeuplé à taille humaine le bungalow était top petit déjeuner exceptionnel un 3 qui mérite beaucoup plus
This is such a laidback, lovely, unspoilt area. The staff were very friendly, food was excellent and accommodation clean and well maintained.

Mango bay is a paradise! the atmosphere is just magic! wood, light colors and the sea. The food and the cocktails are great at the two restaurants. We went more at the beach restaurant because there was often live music, we really loved it. The staff is friendly and helpful. I also had a great yoga lesson with the view of the sea, i really enjoyed it. The rooms are big and immersed in the nature, the bathroom is open air. The only drawback be prepared to have insects and geckos in the room, the first two nights i found it difficult to sleep.

Tämä hotelli on todella omaa luokkaansa. Rauhallisuus, luonnonläheisyys ja kauneus pistää hiljaiseksi. Palvelu on erinomaista ja vieraat otetaan huomioon juuri oikealla tavalla. Koko alue on erittäin siisti ja sen sisältämät monet rannat antavat vieraiden valita oman paikkansa. Ravintoloissa on hyvä ruoka, vaikka hintataso onkin maahan nähden kallis. Hotellilta on kävelymatkan päässä pieni kylä, josta löytää pientä ostettavaa ja hyviä ravintoloita. Suosittelen hotellia täydestä sydämestäni ja ikävöin sinne takaisin.

We did enjoy five days at this wonderful place. We had a rammed earth bungalow whit a lovely little terrace were i enjoyed my morningcoffee every morning. The have free yogaclasses every morning for the guests, and the spa was superb! we highly recommend a dinner at the restaurant, the food and the service is amazing. If we return to the island, we will stay here for sure.

This eco property is absolutely gorgeous. The bungalows are fab, we loved the outdoor bathroom and all the little touches like barrels of water to wash your feet. We ate in both restaurants and the food was delicious as were the cocktails and the setting is perfect. Beaches and beach facilities are excellent too.

Mango bay doesn t have all of the comforts a big chain luxury hotel would have such as a pool or room service but therein lies its charm. Situated quite a distance away from the city/town (30mins car ride), it very much feels like a self contained resort. There are activities to do but most of the time patrons are lounging on sunbeds. The restaurant is really popular at night and people come from other resorts to eat here. Because the land is so vast, it does feel very serene and secluded for the most part. You do feel that it s a very private space. You don t usually run into many other guests. I loved sleeping to the sound of waves and bathing under the stars to the sound of crickets.
El paraiso
리조트는 식사도 깔끔하고 자연적이고 좋습니다만 어딘가 나가긴 택시비가 만원 이상 나옵니다 3박 이상시에만 공항픽업이 제공됩니다 바다는 맑지않습니다 가족여행자는 빈펄이 답인듯합니다

三泊しました 夜中 雨漏りしてスーツケースが濡れた マネージャーにメールで伝えたが 返答も対応もなかった ホームページで無料のシュノーケルツアーがあるように誤解した アクティビティは充実していなかった 部屋は隣の声や音が聞こえた ホテルでバイクレンタルをしたが 途中で故障して大変困った ホテルに連絡したが ホテル外のサービスなので とあまり対応してくれなかった 返金やディスカウントもなし 日本人としてはホテルでレンタルしたものは信用してしまうのだが バイクのレンタルはホテル以外のきちんとしたショップで借りた方が良いと思った 朝食は美味しいが バイキングの品数はとても少ない セミオーダーなので問題はないが 朝食のワクワクはなかった スタッフは全体的には素晴らしい 環境も良い コスパは良くないが バックパッカー風の高級宿という感じを楽しむことは出来た
Fantastisk bungalow med stor veranda och utomhus badrum. Vacker resort med väldigt hög service och trevliga medarbetare. Fin liten sandstrand med ljuvligt vatten. Kan varmt rekommenderas.
Far from the maddening crowd, food was 10/10 . Extremely comfortable

Personale disponibile e gentilissimo navetta gratuita per aereoporto scooter da noleggiare appena arrivi al resort ad un prezzo assolutamente ragionevole. Anche se non ha un affaccio sul mare bellissimo non lo abbiamo vissuti come un problema perché su un isola, con il motorino ti muovi benissimo e vai a cercarti ogni giorno una spiaggia diversa! lo consiglierei a tutti coloro, sia coppie, gruppi di amici o famiglie che vogliono vedere phu quoc
Very nice and quiet place. The service was really good.

This is the worst resort i have ever stayed in. I have traveled to over 30 countries and stayed in some horrible places but this was by far the worst. It is way too overpriced with terrible food to start. They double all the prices because there aren t many other places to purchase food and drinks nearby. They tell you that you can t bring your own snacks and drinks in either. Extremely uncomfortable, the beds are as hard as concrete. It is unsecured and unsafe, locks do not work, no safes in the rooms, the safe for your valuables that s behind the reception desk is accessible to anyone and the night guard sleeps all night. There are 14 dogs (5 street dogs and 9 puppies)on site and it looks like a puppy mill. The dogs bark all day and all night so there is no relaxation. The dogs also bark and growl at guests and beg for food at the restaurant. There is drilling, hammering, chainsaws and construction noise while you re trying to relax by the pool. They cater to clientele that smoke cigarettes so if you are a non smoker it s impossible to enjoy any fresh air. Ocean and beaches are littered with trash and very rocky so you can t swim there. Luna and aron are completely incompetent managers, they possess a complete lack of customer service. To make it all worse we were then treated to an aggressive altercation from them when we brought these issues to their attention. We had to leave early as we didn t feel safe. Do yourself a huge favor and avoid this place at all costs!

Trivsam, familjär resort med stort fokus på service. Bra frukost och fina rum. Luna som jobbar där talar väldigt god engelska vilket hjälpte mycket. De bokade resor, ombesörjde marktransporter och såg till att vi fick bra priser på våra utflykter.poolen var välskött. Spadelen var bra, något dyrare än på stan men fortfarande billigt jämfört med sverige. Maten var bra, vällagad och fanns ett utbud som passade även barnen. Är det något som drar ner betyget något var det att sängarna var lite hårda. Mycket bra mellanklassboende. Rekommenderas varmt
Heerlijke en rustige omgeving om het eind van onze vakantie af te sluiten.

Heerlijke plek! geweldige bungalow met uitzicht op zee. Lief personeel en geen vraag was te veel. Eten vonden wij ook lekker. We zijn 3 dagen het terrein niet afgeweest. Fijn zwembad. Top massages. Erg genoten van ons verblijf hier.

Schönes boutique resort hotel, das eine entspannte atmosphäre bietet. Besonders hervorzuheben sind die sehr freundlichen gastgeber und mitarbeiter. Tagsüber auf der offenen oder überdachten meerplattform chillen und abends an der bar einen der vielen cocktails genießen. Das essen ist gut und authentisch. Wie sagte mein sohn willkommen bei pirates of the caribbean.

Établissement très calme, super belle piscine et nourriture excellente.si vous allez la pour lola plage, vous serez déçus. C est aussi à 40 minutes de route du centre ville. Mais si après le brouhaha des villes vous voulez relaxer sur l an piscine, c est idéal. Il n y a rien autour, mais le ssite est très beau. Great rooms super staff, excellent food. Thé océan is disgusting and its far (40 min drive) from downtown and restaurant but thé resort is perfect and very quiet. If you want top relax beside thé beautiful pool it s thé perfect spot!

Si tratta sicuramente del resort più caratteristico che io abbia mai visitato. Confort, pulizia, cucina, cortesia e disponibilità di tutto il personale sono stati al massimo livello. Unico neo, ma questo non è certo responsabilità del resort, è rappresentato dalla impossibilita di camminare sulla spiaggia, che ha bisogno di essere bonificata da oggetti di ogni tipo e vegetazione selvaggia.

Great hotel still located in a quiet area on the not so touristic side of the island. But no problem to get to the night market to doung dong if you like (40 min drive). Very friendly, english-speaking staff, great view at the pool area. Delicious breakfast (pancakes, eggs, fruits). Food in the restaurant is excellent as well which is good - because there are not many options close to the hotel. Perfect place to escape stress and relax.
Property was situated on quiet side of the island. They have scooter rental for good price if you need to go to other side of island. Restaurant food and service was excellent.

Das ressort ist wunderschön und das team ist sehr bemüht. Die bungalows sind luxuriös und sehr empfehlenswert. Wir hätten gerne badeurlaub gemacht der strand, auch das meer ist unakzeptabel vermüllt. Der swimmungpool ist so trübe das man nicht auf den boden schauen kann (vermutlich algen). Man ist sehr abgelegen spaziergänge sind an der müllkippe strand unmöglich und auch an der strasse uninteressant. Man muß mit dem roller weit fahren um etwas zu unternehmen. Es gibt weit und breit nur das restaurant des ressorts und das essen ist einfach, fade ohne gewürze, zubereitung. Dennoch kann man sich in der wunderschönen anlage ein paar ruhige tage am pool machen. Es gibt auch zimmer mit sehr einfacher ausstattung.
Nice hotel for those who like rest in quiet and beautiful place.

Mango beach is by far the nicest resort on the east coast of phu quoc! we stayed in one of the new rooms and everything was clean and quite nice. The balcony was overlooking the ocean. The pool was also much nicer than in any of the other resorts. The food was average and the ocean was really dirty. Also, as the roads are currently being redone, the trip from the airport/ to town was a hassle and very bumpy.

Super hyggeligt sted, meget venligt personale, daglig rengøring og ikke for stort. Vejen der ud til er under opbygning så efter 3 dage med heftig regn og storm var vi spærret inde på resortet i 2 dage, da ingen biler kunne komme frem eller tilbage. Menukortet har dog lidt mangler. Er man til fred og ro er det stedet.
Jag är verkligen glad när jag kommer hit. Rummet gjordes av trä. Du kan se soluppgången från din privata rum

Mango beach är verkligen en fin resort! en fin pool, supermysig trädgård och stora bungalows. Vi var bara 5 gäster totalt när jag var där, vilket var väldigt lyxigt. Åk hit om du vill vara ensam och komma bort från turisthets. Nackdelen som kommer på köpet är att det ligger en bit bort från andra restauranger/butiker mm, då gäller det att åka taxi för att komma bort från resorten.

I just spent 5 nights at mango beach and it was just what i was wanted. On the sea, private, chilled and relaxed. The staff was friendly and helpful - especially harry whom from the start was inviting and attentive. I would recommend if you are looking for small quiet resort that is clean, safe and the grounds are beautiful.
Although it s called mango beach, there s no beach.
Mình muốn xuất hoá đơn vat tiền phòng nghỉ khách sạn mấy ngày nay liên hệ mình 0819626364

Khách sạn giá phòng cực kì rẻ, phòng đẹp và rất rộng rãi. Gần ngay trung tâm, mình thuê xe máy vi vu khám phá thị trấn, gần dinh cậu, bãi biển sunset sanato, .. Lên đồi checkin quán caffe chuồn chuồn, ngắm thị trấn từ trên cao rất là chill.
Ks đẹp và nhân viên nhiệt tình

Phòng giá hợp lý. Rộng rãi, sạch sẽ. View biển. Bể bơi rộng. Buffet sáng ổn, nhiều món. Tuy vị trí khá trung tâm thành phố nhưng đường vào có khúc cua hơi khó. Gần biển. Đi trái mùa du lịch nên thoải mái nha.
Vị trí thuận lợi, gần trung tâm, phòng sạch sẽ, có view biển

Lúc đầu khá có thiện cảm với khách sạn khi cho mình nhận phòng sớm 1 tiếng vì có em bé. Nhưng đến hôm thứ 3 mình muốn nhờ thay ga giường thì kêu mấy lần không có ai thay, sau đó xuống lễ tân kêu lại thì chị lễ tân hỏi vặn lại ở mấy ngày rồi mà đã đòi thay ga ( lần đầu tiên trong đời mình đi nghỉ bị hỏi như vậy vì bt dù mới chỉ ở nửa ngày mà thấy ga bẩn muốn thay là họ vui vẻ thay ngay không ai hỏi lại khách như vậy cả). Sau đó mình có nói vì con mình ăn bánh trên giường rớt ra nên mình muốn thay cho sạch sẽ. Và chị ấy bảo dây bẩn sẽ bị charge phí nhưng mình nói không phải làm bẩn ga chỉ là vụn bánh các thứ nên mình muốn thay cho sạch thôi. Nhưng sau đó chắc vì chị ấy thấy lí do không hợp lí nên về mình thấy ga gối vẫn y nguyên không ai thay cho cả. Mình chán rồi nên thôi không kêu nữa mất công. Thực sự thấy bực vì bị cskh hỏi vặn lại như vậy xong yêu cầu thì không được thực hiện, thấy cskh quá kém. Đồ ăn sáng ở đây thì hôm nào cũng rất lèo tèo, gọi là buffet nhưng chỉ toàn cơm rang chay và mì xào chay (mỗi loại tận 2 nồi luôn ngày nào cũng đứng đúng chỗ đó). Món xào có thịt chỉ có đúng 1 nồi nên mọi người lấy hết rất nhanh mà hết rồi cũng đợi khá lâu mới fill lại nên sáng hầu như cả nhà không biết phải ăn gì. Haizz. Giờ ăn sáng thì chỉ vỏn vẹn 7-9h chứ không được dài 6-10h như những khách sạn khác nên hôm nào mệt muốn cho con ngủ thêm thì sợ xuống là hết giờ và hết đồ ăn. Bể bơi của khách sạn thì không được vệ sinh sạch sẽ, xuống bơi thấy rất nhiều rong rêu (bể người lớn), bể trẻ con thì đỡ hơn. Nói chung trải nghiệm ở đây khá tệ và mình sẽ không quay lại nữa!

Toilet thì tắm xong nước không rút, vòi sen thì không mở nhưng lâu lâu bỗng nhiên chảy nước ra, chảy nhiều chứ không phải nhỏ giọt, ra biển thì phải đi qua một cái hồ hôi ơi là hôi, không thể nào dùng hồ bơi ở gần đó được, đồ ăn sáng thì ở 3 ngày mà không thay đổi nhiều, chỉ thay đổi bò kho thành canh củ dền, bún bò thành bánh canh, nấu lại dở, thịt thì cực ít, bò kho nhưng không dùng gân bò mà dùng sườn que rẻ tiền, cơm chiên thì chỗ vàng chỗ trắng, lại đóng cục, kinh khủng à còn 1 điểm bất tiện nữa, grab không thể tìm được vị trí của khách sạn khi search, bạn phải nhập vị trí của the long beach hotel gần đó nha

Check out mất khá nhiều tgian phòng mình sửdụng có chút mùi trong nhà vs, mình có gọi lễ tân nhưng không ai giải quyết. Lúc hk dọn phòng họ cũng rất vồ vập, gõ cửa và gọi lớn hk mình chưa kịp mở thì họ đã tự mở cửa bước vào bằng thẻ của họ ( dù mình không treo bảng dọn phòng). Nói chung không quá tệ nhưng không thực sự tuyệt vời

Ưu điểm - khách sạn hiện đại, sạch, đẹp - nhân viên nhiệt tình, chu đáo - khách sạn sát biển, có bể bơi riêng và có cả bể bơi trẻ em nên nhà mình tắm biển hay tắm bể bơi đều thuận tiện. Nhà mình có trẻ em nên thấy rất tốt. - ngắm hoàng hôn ở biển hay ở phòng cũng tuyệt vời - nằm ngay thị trấn dương đông nên đi lại rất thuận lợi nhược điểm - cổng vào đang làm ngổn ngang nên mới đến có cảm giác không sang trọng. - ăn sáng còn ít món ăn, không đa dạng - ban công xây cao, kín và nhìn rất bí. Nên làm bằng kính sẽ thoáng hơn. Có cơ hội mình quay lại đây và giới thiệu cho bạn bè của mình nghỉ ở đây!

Đồ ăn sáng sơ sài, xuống ăn đã chẳng còn đồ. Phòng ốc thì quá đơn giản đến cái thùng rác ở ngoài cũng không có, vứt rác toàn phải chạy vào nhà vệ sinh. Cả cái phòng có đúng 3 cái bóng điện. Chất lượng phòng với giá không tương xứng. Thủ tục check in quá lâu mặc dù mình đã đặt trước phòng cả tháng trời mà đến nhận phòng vẫn phải đợi rất lâu để lễ tân kiểm tra lại booking.
Phòng sạch sẽ, rộng rãi, giống hình, view biển, đi bộ ra biển chưa đến 1 phút. Bữa sáng free, ăn buffet rất ngon. Vì trong phòng giống hình kháchsạn chụp nên mình không chụp lại.
Khách sạn phục vụ tốt,nhiệt tình,sạch sẽ

Khách sạn thuận tiện cho chợ đêm, nhân viên thân thiện và hữu ích nhưng tôi không nghĩ có người giữ nhà (chỉ để lại một tờ giấy vệ sinh trong phòng tắm khi tôi nhận phòng và nếu cần thêm phải gọi cho lễ tân và thu thập nó từ người tán tỉnh nếu tôi đang cần ).

- phòng ở khách sạn quá nhiều muỗi - máy lạnh làm lạnh cực kỳ lâu và thường xuyên hiện lỗi trên bảng điều khiển - khách sạn nằm đươi 1 con dốc khá sâu, khó đi lại cho người già, trẻ em và người khuyết tật

Khách sạn sạch sẽ, an ninh, phòng ốc rộng rãi, thoải mái, có view nhìn ra biển đẹp. Hồ bơi hơi nhỏ nhưng cũng khá đủ cho trải nghiệm ở khách sạn, hồ bơi mát mẻ. Mặc dù có lối ra biển nhưng biển ở đây không có cứu hộ, biển tự phát nên tắm khá nguy hiểm. Buffet sáng thì không mong chờ gì vì món ăn rất ít. Nếu cần tìm 1 khách sạn để ở thôi thì có thể chọn khách sạn này, nhưng để tận hưởng và trải nghiệm thì chưa ổn lắm.
Cảm ơn the may. Gia đình đã có kỳ nghỉ tuyệt vời. Phòng như hình, hỗ trợ khi đến sớm nữa.
Đặt nhầm ngày ko thể hoàn tiền

Khách sạn nằm khá sâu trong hẻm. Đôi khi tôi gọi grab, grab không thể tìm thấy lối vào. Phòng rộng rãi với giá rất rẻ. Ban công có tầm nhìn tuyệt đẹp hướng ra bãi biển bên dưới. Vào ban đêm, bạn có thể nhìn thấy quang cảnh thuyền câu mực. Ánh đèn xanh hòa lẫn với ánh đèn thành phố ở phía bên kia hồ bơi sạch sẽ có lối đi bộ xuống bãi biển không xa. Bữa sáng tự chọn phở rất ngon, nhưng có một ít thịt trong đó. Nhưng bạn có thể thông báo cho nhân viên. Nhìn chung là rất tốt.
Khách sạn view thoáng thích hợp đi healing
Khách sạn rất sạch sẽ và chủ đáo ạ chấm 5 sao ạ.

설날이라 사람많다고 서비스가 많이 바뀌었습니다. 서비스가 굉장히 안좋아요. 일단 휴지, 헤어드라이어, 접시, 식기 등 기본적으로 제공해주던 물건들이 없었습니다. 특히 로비에서 체크인할때 태도, 서비스가 안좋습니다. 사람 많은건 니들 호텔 사정이지, 내가 이해할 문제는 아닌 것 같습니다. 불쾌해서 다음부턴 이용하지 않을 생각입니다. 업그레이드, 얼리체크인, 늦은체크아웃, 안된 것은 이해합니다. 근데 툭툭이도 도착 안한 상태에서 체크아웃을 재촉하는 행동은 제일 불쾌했습니다
Very comfort and good traffic

청결하고 편안함. 리조트의 고급스러움과 달리 프론트데스크 직원의 응대가 다소 불친절함

23년 12월 6박 후기입니다. 장점 - 숙소가 넓고 화장실이 많아서 대가족이 머물기 좋음 - 직원들이 느리지만 친절함 - 셔틀버스가 다님, - 그랜드월드, 사파리까지 접근성이 좋음(7인승 그랩 기준 비용이 4-7천원 사이) - 씨뷰에 묶었는데 바로 앞 비치 접근성이 좋았음. 바닷물이 깨끗하고 사람도 없어서 아이가 놀기 좋았음 - 씨뷰에서 노을, 바다뷰가 좋았음 단점 - 곰팡이가 온 집안에 구석구석 있음 (화장실, 실리콘, 커텐, 방 벽, 가구 등) - 가장 큰방을 제외하고는 방에 곰팡이 냄새가 너무 심해서 자는 내내 두통이 생길 정도였음 - 방충망이 없어서 환기가 어려움 - 어메니티가 너무 지저분해서 사용하지 못했음 - 마루 바닥인데 너무 쌔까매서 슬리퍼를 꼭 신어야 함 닦아도 닦아도 까매서 닦는걸 포기함 - 슬리퍼는 6인 기준 새것은 2개만 주고 나머지는 재활용 세탁한 슬리퍼를 제공함 - 전체적으로 청소 상태가 매우 안좋음 - 모기는 없었으나 도마뱀, 거미, 파리가 있음 - 음식이 전체적으로 너무 맛이 없음 - 조식, 저녁 뷔페도 쌀국수 외에는 맛 수준이 너무 떨어짐 - 룸서비스도 여러번 시켰으나 다 맛이 없음. 가격 대비 퀄리티가 떨어짐 - 서비스 대응이 느림. 수건이나 기타 필요한 걸 요청하면 기본 한시간씩 걸림. 안온적도 있어서 두 번이상 전화해야 처리됨 - 체크인 전 메일로 요청한 사항이 전혀 반영되지 않았고, 체크인 직후 곰팡이, 냄새 빼문에 방 교체룰 요구했으나 불가능하다고 했음. 푸꾸옥의 날씨때문에 그렇다고 이유를 댔으나, 동남아에는 모두 우기. 건기가 있고 내가 다녀온 많은 호텔/리조트 중에 이렇게 방안에 곰팡이 냄새가 심한 리조트는 없었음. 이 문제 때문에 체크인 후 5번 정도 전화를 하고 두시간이나 지나서야 매니저가 찾아와서 임시방편으로 카페트 제거 및 무료 저녁 식사를 제공하는 것으로 마무리되었으나 크리스마스 이브날 저녁 스케줄을 망침 - 개인 수영장 물이 너무 차가워서 아침, 오후에는 들어가기가 어려움 - 환전이 거의 불가능함. 6일동안 세 번이나 갔으나 직원 이 없거나 돈이 없다고 해서 못함 다시 푸꾸옥에 간다면 묵지 않을 것 같음
맛사지나 부대에서 행사하는것은 가격이 좀 비쌋고 퀄리티가 그래도 전체적인 분위기 등은 만족해요! 룸서비스 안심구이가 맛있었어요! (파스타류는 비추합니다)

The hotel is tired and the middle management are not up to the job. The room was dirty on arrival (basic dirty as in thick dust on surfaces) but we were moved. The pool kept draining or stopped filtering which was a pain. Breakfast buffet was ok but a 20 minute wait to get to it. The main meals are over priced. After 2 nights i paid a taxi driver a few quid and from then on he sorted restaurants, travel, scooters-the whole thing. The resort is a sad place. It is trying to be a disneyland but with not enough customers so it is dating rapidly as no capital expenditure to keep it going. I fear in a couple of years it will bankrupt itself. Mrs b also pointed out that the resort ran out of white wine, so no way a 5 star resort.

我book的是4套房的屋型 非常大非常舒適 床具和地面也非常乾淨 看得出有好好打理 基本上以這個價錢沒什麼可以投訴 除了在spa前台工作的人員非常無禮貌之外 其他員工都非常有禮貌友善 會主動幫助你安排很多東西 唯一美中不足是浴室的水壓不穩定 水力偏低 洗澡時有點尷尬 另外 在生日那天預約了bbq到會 太喜出望外了 估唔到呢個價錢有咁多海鮮同肉類 而且質素幾高 其他前菜飯湯甜品等 係好似搬咗個buffet去你個villa 食咁 我哋個日係留係酒店玩 有見到工作人員set up, 整個過程佢哋都好認真好細心 如果你人多又懶得出去食飯 呢個villa bbq 真係抵到爛 overall 非常滿意

This was a family of 5 stay, with 2 toddlers and 1 teenager. Everyone loved it. The kids club was great for the toddlers and they have scheduled activities. Maybe after age 6 or 7 it could be to baby-ish. The private pool was aaaaaaaamazing, especially for a night swim. We had the two bedroom villa. Breakfast and dinner was included in our stay. The buffet had lots of variety for the a m. And p.m. The food was decent some dishes were really good. I would definitely consider the food pkg bc outside the resort, nearby, is nothing (that we saw of). There is a shuttle that takes you to vinwonders and the safari. The hotel staff was nice, the pool was nice, the beach was nice. The property is huuuuuuge. There are coconut and mango trees everywhere. The bed and sheets are standard. The villa itself is aaaaaamazing. It does have a kitchen but we had not dishes or cookware in ours, odd. But we also didnt plan on using it anyway. We did order room svc, the pizza, ceasar salad, and spring rolls were not good. The burger was decent.
Excellent, we have been treated as a queen and king . Royal service

Melia truly takes things to the next level in terms of comfort, location, food, and space. We stayed in a two-bedroom villa with the all-inclusive option, and the experience was mostly excellent. The villa was enormous easily spacious enough to host a large gathering. It was equipped with everything we could possibly need, and the private pool was a fantastic touch. It meant we didn t need to head to the main pool or beach just to cool off, which added a lot of convenience and privacy to our stay. Dining at melia was another highlight. The food quality was consistently high, especially the meats and seafood, which were always fresh and plentiful. However, the all-inclusive package left us a bit puzzled. Many drinks required either an upgrade to a higher tier or an out-of-pocket payment, even if they were listed on the standard menu. The same drink might be free in one spot but chargeable in another, and some beach areas and minibar items also came at an extra cost. For what we paid 1,000 aud per night for a family of three we expected a more genuinely all-inclusive experience. Melia offers a rich program of activities. We particularly enjoyed the yoga classes with vani, who was both professional and attentive. She adapted each session to the abilities of the guests and even took some great photos to share with us. Overall, our stay was memorable and enjoyable, though a clearer and more inclusive approach to the all-inclusive offering would elevate the experience further

Had high hopes for this lovely villa and resort but they sadly fell short. April 2025, very low occupancy so food/drink places limited, season coming to end. All inclusive limitations on food/drink and places we could eat/drink were in place - with no explanation as to what premium ai was so these extras could be attained. Eg, a lovely cocktail bar with nice seats (and was empty) but told couldn t go in there. Theme/menu in main buffet was mainly suited to koreans. Difficult to get drinks in buffet, often warm as no onsite bar. Room - fantastic but little touches (wet paint ruined some clothes, ants in bathroom, broken catches on sliding doors) let it down. Complex system to using beach towels, with a 40 deposit per towel that seemed crazy, we didn t dare borrow a golf umbrella! sea, beach lovely, although main pool (ibiza) seemed to have many bugs in it. Shame not constantly being removed as lots of staff that were not very busy. Games room, absolutely fantastic pool table, but no bar nearby (that we could go to) meant carrying drinks up a huge staircase to play pool. We guess many who stay here would visit the theme parks at this end of the island, these were not of interest to us but driving past them, from the road they looked tired with miles of empty shop fronts. Airport transfer well organised and comfortable. Felt a partial refund would be fair for the limitations and closed facilities but nothing offered from melia when requested via expedia.

Despite a horrendous 1-hour check-in, we had a great stay at melia. The resort is big, but villas are private and very spacious. We loved the yoga (with vani and risa), the pool room, the melia-nade! we had some issues with the plumbing (toilets and shower drains) but we re resolved with maintenance. I don t know what happened at check-in, but this started our trip on a sour note. However we ended on a nice note with staff very accommodating to our family.
Far from airport and city center some part of resort showing sign of wear and tear staff generally helpful and friendly but not all are english competent

Property was spacious, staffs were friendly and respectful but not always available at your service. The pool was nice but we did have to walk around finding staff to place drink orders. Not much night life going on inside the resort as well as outside around the area besides just those tourist traps like vinwonders or sunworld.
Good

We booked the all inclusive and was very disappointed with the food especially the snacks and drinks choices. The drink choices were very limited and the bartenders didn t know whats supposed to be in each drink. Even the cgeapest beers in vn were not included. The floors in our rooms were damaged with water leaks. They charged for almost everything even we had the all inclusive. Paid 600 for 2 nights which is very expensive in vn but we didn t enjoy the food.

If you can, you definitely should. Huge living space, beautiful bedrooms, large outdoor living with private pool. The breakfast buffet was good and the other resort pools were also fantastic. Staff though was what made this resort so good. We met tons of great staff. We stayed 4 days and 3 nights in phu quoc and that was perfect. Small tip for vinwonder world, bring your swim gear and do the water park first, then you can spend the second half of the day going through the amusement park and drying off and then finish with the incredible light and water show.
Lovely resort and quiet!!! staffs were friendly and helpful.

약간 노후된 시설 친절하지만 직원들과 영어로 대화가 어려움 조식 식당의 메뉴 아쉬움.
유명한 숙소로 알려진 곳아었고 규모가 상당했으나 전반적으로 서바스 품질이 떨어지고 숙소가 청결하지 못했습니다. 개인풀은 더러웠고 방에는 모기가 있어 엄청 많이 물렸네요. 빈원더스랑 사파리가 근처에 있는 장점이 있지만 솔직히 또 가고 싶지는 않네요.

Villas are decently affordable for what you get, everything other than lodging is petty pricy like food and spa stuff. The units have zero silverware or plates. Villas come with a stove but have zero pots and pans which is odd. Property is pretty dated as far as technology goes. Pros were amazing staff and affordability for larger groups. Cons were dated and not fully equipped. Not a walkable location at all. I would recommend going somewhere else like wyndham or radisson blue closer to grand world unless you just wanna relax and not leave your place for the entire stay. It was just okay.

The hotel staff were very friendly, the resort was beautiful, and it was the best vacation ever.

The stay was perfect overall. Nicely prepared staff and the atmosphere was just great. Simply i couldn t ask for more. But sometimes, i had to call twice for buggies. And the card key just disabled during the stay without a reason, which caused inconvenience.

I m satisfied overall during my stay, but when i check out, i asked if there were some towels. I didn t even tell you how many towels i had or how many replacements i had when i went in. I feel bad because i only said there were none when i checked out.
정말 넓고 너무 좋았어요 키즈클럽도 잘되어있고 한살아기랑 첫 가족여행이였는데 다 너무너무 좋았어요 만족해요
편안하게 있었고 99 스태프들은 친절하였음.

친구들이랑 멜리아 빈펄에서 1박을 했는데 너무 만족스럽고 넓고 개인풀장도 있고 좋았어요 4명에 룸2개를 했는데 너무넓어서 룸 하나만해도 충분한데 몰라서 2인1실로 했네요 아깝긴하네요 빈펄티 좋은점은 모든 교통수단둘이 무료라는것이 편하고 좋았답니다 그리고 디파짖낼때 비자카드나현지 화폐로 해야체크아웃시 바로 받을수가있어요 저희들은 트래블 월렛 카드로 했더니 10일만에 들어와서 현지에서는 쓰지를못해서 다시충전했답니다 1박하는데 룸당300만동해서 600만동 너무많이 받더라구요 (다른호텔은 룸상관없이 계약자한테만 100만동 해서 체크아웃시 바로 월렛카드로 들어왔어요) 디파짖 너무많이 받는것 외에는 모두 좋았어요 애들이랑 가면 좋은곳이예요
숙박시설도 깨끗하게 정리되어 있었고 다소 작지만 개인수영장이 있어서 가족들과 즐거운 시간 보내고 왔습니다. 규모가 워낙 크다보니 아침식사는 조금 많이 이동해야해서 불편했어요. 아침식사는 만족합니다.
Nice and good

This resort is large and broad, access to the beach was a little wayward unless you stayed at the beachfront villa. You would need transportation to visit outside the resort, due to this reason we may stay close to duong dong city for more accessing to nearby location. It is a great place to relax and enjoy peace and quiet. The resort beach is clean with lifeguards, water related activities and no crowds. Villa pool is great for private enjoyment. Breakfast is excellent with varieties, we enjoyed vietnamese foods the most.

Very nice property and villas. However, extremely overcrowded with the type of people that think they own the place which ruins the experience. I would travel here in the off-season for sure but during the holidays i would never come here again no matter the cost

Gia đình rất thích trải nghiệm không gian và dịch vụ tại resort,

This property offers you all inclusive and your pay all-inclusive price but even in room minibar has charges! towel services not included. Many drinks not included. Food services are limited. Other water experiences are limited. Remembers there are spider like insects buried in the beach sand. Unfortunately, i have been to many other all inclusive resorts so i can definitely tell you do not spend your money here. Deceptive advertisement by expdeia and melia resorts.

This property is not all inclusive when you go to a western all inclusive resort, in room minibar is included. Here it is not included! they given you a three bedroom with adjacent pool option, but remember, pool may not be clean. The kitchen has no utensils. An extended stay in us is much better than what you see here. The dining options are non. Spanish (japanese restaurant under construction). The buddy/ tok-tok is usually late 10-15 minutes. The extra-curricular activities - surfing does not exist on property, snorkeling - not on property, vin-safari not included in all inclusive . My partner got injured - no first aid kit available! look around no aed available. There is a person called terry nguyen who runs his own side business of offering private snorkeling experience. He pockets the money and arranges a taxi service and boat service (separate from property admin). Then took us to south of island where the water was not clear, the coral reef had poisonous coral reef and sharp rocks. Expedia and melia vinpearl are misleading the customers. Overall expect 50 of what they promise online. Come at your own risk and manage your own health (wound injury -- no first aid kit). I would have had better experience going other genuine all -inclusive resorts with proper standard of safety. Finally, remember, you have to turn on a switch (outside the bathroom) to turn on hot water before putting soap on your body.
숙박은 좋앗어요 단지 아쉬운점은 식사가 나트랑 빈펄대비 좀 부족하다고 느꼇어요
버기 갈아타야해서 불편한건 있지만 조용하고 편안했어요

전체적으로 괜찮았습니다. 그래도 샤워 필터는 필수입니다. 방은 깨끗한데 오래된 흔적은 어쩔수 없네요. 북부쪽이라 북부를 중심으로 돌아다닐수 밖에 없어서 조금 아쉬웠습니다. 툭툭이는 빨리빨리 도착하고요. 풀장은 워낙 수영을 못해서 충분했습니다.

The staff were amazing. The owner gave me medicine to help me breathe when i got sick from red tide.

Overall the property for the price was quite nice. The two ladies at the front desk were exceptionally nice, friendly and helpful, both duy and tuite sp? had a nice swimming pool. The alley that you had to drive to get to property was not so good and the breakfast was not very good.

Location was a bit inside the small road but price was affordable. I got there early and started a pool play right away. It was amazing and my son loved it so much. There are great restaurants walking down to main road and they are highly recommended to try.

The hotel is okay - it has a nice pool and friendly staff. Unfortunately, the rooms lack quite a bit on cleanliness. Our frist room had several large moldy areas, so we requested another. This was better but we had to change the bedsheets for clean ones, the fan was dark from old dust and you could find old trash behind the lounge chair. In general, the hotel really need to step up their cleaning-game. If they manage to do this, then it is a nice hotel for a fair price.
Le cadre est agréable et le personnel serviable. C est un peu loin de la mer. Pas trop loin du supermarché. Le petit dej n est pas tres généreux.

Ce séjours fut parfait tout d abord la qualité de l hôtel et la beauté du site digne d un 5 étoiles les maisons sont spacieuse et très jolie le mini jacuzi dehors est parfait pour les fin de soirées , moi et mon mari voyageons souvent et je ne comprend pas certain avis négatif sur l hôtel car tout est parfait en particulier le personnel est d une gentillesse et toujours la pour vous aider et servir toujours souriant meme sous un soleil de 34 degrés , le buffet du matin est un délice il y a tout ce que vous voullez du petit déjeuner français en passant par des petits déjeuner traditionnel de nombreux fruits .... Enfin parfait nous avons pas l habitude de mànger dans les hôtels mais la nous y avons mànger tout les soirs tellement c était bon et prix raisonnable , thien et les autres serveurs vous accueille avec amour et le directeur un philippins est très gentil et à l écoute nous voyageons souvent et je peux vous dire que cette hôtel est de meuilleure service et qualité que certain hôtel 4 étoiles à paris , et de meuilleure prix ceux qui aimes la quzlite la beauté du site et la gentillesse du personnel c est ici quil faut venir quànd à ceux qui on mit des avis négatif je pense que sa doit être des milliardaires aller à dubai ou vous payerez 40000e une nuit et vous serez satisfait ou pas . Pour les environs vous pouvez louer un scooter à coter poyr 8e la journées et aller visiter les temples et autres sinon navette gratuite qui vous ramene en ville eva et farid
리조트는 좋았지만 빌라는 주변이 공사중이라 소음과 분진이 있었습니다.

飛行場のすぐ南側 周囲はまだ開発中のところが多い 海側にビーチ 中側にフロント レストラン プール その後ろに２戸が１軒になったバンガローが並ぶ 最後列には２階建てで４戸が１軒になったのもある １軒あたり300坪はあるかと思われるほどゆったりとした配置 建物の造りもしっかりしたもので 窓を閉めれば外の音も聞こえない ちょっと高めの部屋を選択したせいかジャグジーもついていたが 水を張る手間を考えると プールに行った方が手っ取り早い 前に泊ったホテルもそうだったが このリゾートにも 蚊とかぶよなどの不快害虫が全くいない ハエは極くすこしいたが 気になるほどではない チェックインの際 帰りの飛行機を聞かれ 19 35と答えると 先方から17 00までのレイトチェックアウトにしてくれた 勿論無料だったし 飛行機に合わせて空港まで送ってくれた こんな親切なホテルはまずないのでは ただホテルから歩いて行けるところには レストランとかお店などがないのはちょっと残念 でもタクシーは日本に比べればずっと安いから出かけるにも不自由はない

The island of phu quoc is definitely up and coming and there s a lot of choice out there. Overall we left happy and you won t go wrong if you stay here. It was good value for money for a good experience and so here s some useful info to help you decide - - room - we stayed in one of the bungalows which are closer to the main complex although everything is walkable and the hotel has buggy s to bring luggage etc. Felt secure, lots of space, safe included but not big enough for laptops. Air con and fan. Good range of tv channels with english i.e hbo movies. Free water bottles each day. - pool - is central within the complex and nice with a swim up pool bar manned most of the time although sometimes you have to wait. - beach - absolutely lovely and the main complex is next to the beach. It s quite private as no other resorts around. - spa - totally lovely and not that expensive. Good range of treatments. - food - good mix of vietnamese and western food although not a lot of fish. The vietnamese dishes tasted great. Not a lot of choice for vegetarians though. - drinks - beer selection good, cocktail list great. Wine selection poor vs other island resorts. - location - very close to airport so you hear the odd plane but not too intrusive. A bit out of the way from main strip so you ll need to take taxis quite regularly cost 5 each way. - service - all staff really friendly - ambience - but quiet as off peak. Beach bar dead, no one around after 10pm!!

ガーデンヴィラタイプの部屋に宿泊しました マスタベッドルームが4か所 シングルが1か所と 家族四人では大きすぎる部屋でびっくり! ホテルの敷地から少し離れているため 移動に毎回カートを呼ぶ必要がありましたが 大人数の家族や複数家族のグループでの宿泊には便利だと思います 専用のプールも庭にあり 朝ジョギング後にプールでクールダウンする等活用しました 洗濯機もあったのは 非常に便利でした ホテルの近くに 小さな売店があり ビール等はここで調達しました 朝食は もう少し種類があればという感じでしたが 満足できる内容でした 海はキレイですが 魚はほとんどいなく シュノーケルは楽しめません 私達が滞在した時期はクラゲもおり プールメインで過ごしました スタッフは 皆親切でした

Helt okej hotel för vila och sol bra pool och fin strand men ligger lite off och maten på hotel dyr och finns inte mycket annat i närheten men taxi är billigt och finns många andra bra resturanger i närheten
Stayed three nights, room was very nice and large with private outdoor hot tub. Staff was wonderful and very accommodating. The included buffet breakfast was very generous and delicious.

一人で利用しました 英語も出来ない私ですが 快適に過ごせました 街からは遠く シャトルバスも本数も少ないので アクティブに過ごすには ホテルでボーと過ごすのも飽きます ご飯はそこそこです スパはとっても良かったです 外で受けられるといいな と思います でも すごく安くてコスパ最高 平日は17時までみたいです パンフレットには２０時までと書いてありますが マネージャーが朝食の時に挨拶に来てくれました 驚くことに名前覚えてくれてました
Helt okej hotel

Nöjd över vår 4 dagars vistelsen på mercury resort and villas. Mycket fräscht och fint strandhotell med härlig pool och restaurang. Stannade 4 dagar vilket var ganska lagom med tanke på läget. Hotellet i sig har jag inget att klaga på egentligen, det är läget som är lite trist. Det finns inga restauranger i närheten och den lilla butiken 500 m från hotellet har inte något stort utbud av varor. Det innebär att man måste åka taxi för att ta del av detta. Är man en person som gillar att bara vara på hotellet så är det ett perfekt resemål med strand, pool, massage och restaurang. Spat var bra, mycket nöjd med massagen och pedikyren jag tog. Nackdelen är att spat har öppet mellan 9-17, vilket var tider som jag och mitt sällskap oftast var ute på utflykter och äventyr på vilket gjorde det krångligt att få till en tid. Vänlig och hjälpsam personal! som överallt i vietnam blir det dock missförstånd pga språksvårigheter, även med den allra enklaste engelskan också. Men man får ta det för vad det är )
Hôtel trés propre chambre superbe déjeuner sympa piscine bien agréable attenante à la mer. Transat parasol canoé à votre disposition. Personnel agréable et bon cuisiniers. Un seul mot super.
Agréable séjour en famille dans cet hôtel calme et bien situé. Chambre confortable, piscine en bord de mer très agréable.

Rauhallinen hotelli kauempana keskustasta. Lähettyvillä ei ole ravintoloita tai muita hotelleja. Ihana iso uima-allas, josta näkymä merelle. Ranta oli siisti. Ravintolan ruoka oli keskinkertaista ja aamiainen oli monipuolinen. Villa oli siisti, tilava sekä bonuksena ulkoterasilla oma jacuzzi! henkilökunta oli erittäin ystävällistä, mutta englanninkielen osaaminen oli välillä vähän hakusessa.

Stayed 2 nights only but really enjoyed my time here. The beach/swimming pool are very nice like in the pictures. There was always places available on the beach or around the swimming pool and there is some attentive and helpful staff who provide towels, open/close parasols... Restaurant with beach view offer both western and asian food. Food is ok, an effort is done on presentation, prices are on the higher side for vietnam but reasonable. Breakfast is very good with lots of options. Stayed in a superior villa which was nice, modern and spacious. Very comfortable. The resort is very well maintained overall. Hotel is close to the airport but in a nice, calm and private environment. Very good experience overall, highly recommended.
Excellent séjour du 30/12 au 1/1/18 avec repas du nouvel an.

ブログなどでよく出てくる名前のホテルではなく かなり安く予約したので後から少し不安になりましたが 大当たりでした まず スタッフの対応がどなたもものすごくよく 結構 英語が通じないことが多いベトナムで片言ではほぼ全員 ネイティブも2 3割いました (日本語は一切通じませんがgoogle翻訳大活躍) オーナー会社マネージャーの点検時期でもあり みんなキビキビしていました レストランは 左手にプライベートビーチ 右手にプール 前は芝生と最高のロケーション よく風の抜けるテラス席で快適に朝昼晩 おいしく頂きました そのほか ビーチパラソルやカヌーなどアクティビティはすべて無料 ホテルのスパも1時間3,000円ほど 部屋は少し時代は感じさせましたが 清潔に保たれており 大丈夫です (かなりヤモリはでます) 中心部までタクシーで500円ほどでしたし とにかく快適でした
Nothing to do or see nearby, dirty adjacent beaches, not the best shower. Very nice and helpful staff, good restaurant, nice pool, exclusive atmosphere, great bed.

We had arrived to phu quoc one day earlier and stayed at another hotel near the night market so we can explore the area on motorbike. The next day mercury resort was nice enough to pick us up from this hotel to their resort (this resort usually pick up their guests from the airport only). We were upgraded to a bungalow for free. Restaurant services were excellent. Happy hours with buy one get one free drink is a plus. Private beach is clean and beautiful with attentive staff. Thank you mercury for a nice vacation.
Private beach private place only you there just stay in the place, it is your place

Nice hotel with excellent facilities. The beach is the highlight with warm and clear water. Nice warm swimming pool. The villa style rooms are first class. The restaurant has beautiful view of the beach with nightly music and a variety of food choices. Kayak and bike are free to use. Free transportation from and to airport. The sunset is magnificent. A little bit far from town but there is a free shuttle.

Fantastic hotel with great pool...although gym was ordinary...the restaurant is ecellent on the beach serving very nice food at reasonable prices...mini mart was a fair wayy but they have a golf buggy that can take you...definitely worth staying here in one of their lovely villas surrounded by manicured gardens

We absolutely love this resort and can t wait to come back. The perfect location for peace and quiet and beautiful beach but close enough to be able to enjoy downtown dong dong and takes 5 min to get to the airport which is free with hotel. They gave us a free upgrade because it was my birthday and wow what a room. We got the pool villa right on the beachfront . Absolutely stunning. Such a beautiful clean huge room. Super comfy bed an bedding. Huge modern bathroom mini fridge and free waters. Great breakfast buffet and all day coffee , espresso and lattes all day. Amazing helpful staff so friendly and welcoming and we love the manager !! we can not wait to come back thank you for all your hospitality we are sure to recommend this hotel to all of our friends and family
Excellent staff and lovely location! place is amazing
Very nice resort, leaves nothing to wish for. Staff very helpful and very friendly. Private beach very nice and clean.

Super ophold på dejligt hotel. Rigtig god restaurant og live music i top. Super service fra personalet især fra lam og sean - tak for det. Savner dog en købmand på stedet - lidt besværligt at skulle med taxa ind til byen for at handle.
Incheckningen var 2,5 h sen. Golvet extremt skitigt. Fruktansvärt dålig service. Mycket svenskar. Åk inte hit om ni vill ha lugn och ro. Dock fin pool och strand.

Wow!!!! i was actually surprised how amazing this place was, i stayed in the executive bungalow, which has ocean view and private pool. Really excellent management, and will 100 visit again.

A paradise like no other. Excellent staff very friendly, always a lovely greeting. Premium room was excellent. Beech towels from the staff who really look after you. Happy hour for drinks 5 pm-7 pm is something to embrace and enjoy. The only downside is most things end at 10 am (breakfast) or 10 pm the bar and restaurant close and you have to ask nicely for another drink. But overall a fantastic stay, really enjoyable. Thank you to everyone!!
