We wanted a quiet place close to the beach and be able to snorkel and we were not disappointed. There was decent snorkeling jus a few tens of meter from the beach. In addition there is a very nice pool also available. The resort is located in the north in a more authentic part of the island with less tourist. The village close to the resort is a typical vietnamese village with real working people, there are no shop directly aimed at tourist. Days trip are easily feasible for any part of the island, it may takes 1 to 1.5hours to go all the way to the south of the island which is reasonable. Even though we went during the rainy season (august), the weather was actually quite nice. There was some rains a few time (hard at time) but we were never rained out for the day. Most of all we really appreciated the staff of the hotel. They have been so nice and helpful with everything, we really felt special. So thank you very much and keep up the excellent work. We definitely recommend the place and we hope to be able to return there one of those days...
A very relaxing and calming place to stay.linh was a very kind and helpful host and nothing was too much trouble. I would definitely stay here again.
We realy enjoy staing here. And stayd one more extra night. Very relaxing place. We did snorkling, kajakk and rent motorbike. We will realy come back. Thank you so mutch

Wonderful, helpful staff, beautiful location, lovely rooms with outdoor seating areas, a nice swimming pool, pretty beach, good food in a small family-run resort. Pretty much all one could ask for as a quiet getaway.
Perfekt lugn del av ön - fin trädgård och toppservice - gott om solbäddar och ingen trängsel frukost med fin frukt och äggrätter

My husband and i were discussing the pros and cons of our trip to phu quoc in particular our stay at peppercorn beach resort as we knew we would complete a review or two. As we were discussing the beautiful and idyllic scenery, the friendly and attentive staff, the fresh delicious food, our comfortable spacious clean room, the free access to snorkeling gear, bikes and kayaks which filled our sun drenched days with activities, the relaxed restaurant and bar with thirst quenching drink selection, the comfortable sun loungers on our beachfront section and by the pool, we determined we didn t in fact have any cons... The peppercorn beach resort was perfect for our needs and we loved every minute of our four night stay we definitely hope to be back!

We enjoyed the location very much. The proximity to the coastline is a big plus. The little village is also very worth visiting it offers anything you might need (even a fully equipped gym), very friendly people and a lot of options regarding food. Also, you hardly get to see obviously western tourist faces, which makes it seem more authentic than other places on the island. We enjoyed that it is more removed from the island s main attractions as well. The resort itself is well kept and we loved our room. The option to rent bikes, kayaks/kanus and snorkeling gear is also a nice feature we very much enjoyed our bike ride to the peppercorn farm or our kanu trip along the shoreline. The staff is extremely friendly and goes out of their way to help the guests. The breakfast and other food options are amazing. Only downside is the outdoor gym. It s not in the state that you see in the pictures. But there s a fully equipped gym in the village nearby.

Great place to stay. Homemade bread, pies and jams were part of a great breakfast. Tons of local restaurants nearby. Beach was great, safe, lots of fish to see among the rocks. Near to a very nicoral reef

, family-run hotel that stands out for its warm, welcoming atmosphere. The villas overlooking the sea and the clear waters of the gulf of thailand are stunning, but it s the staff and their family-like bond that make this place truly special. Most days, you can see the owner herself in the open kitchen preparing some of the dishes. Nestled in the north of the island in a quiet fishing village, the hotel is about an hour s drive from the airport. Unlike the busier towns and cities in phú quốc, this area offers untouched natural beauty. There are trails through the national park and dirt tracks leading to pristine, protected beaches arguably some of the most beautiful places i ve ever seen. The peppercorn is a solid 3-star hotel in terms of facilities and services, but for me, it felt like a 5-star experience. The remote, raw beauty of this location is unmatched, and the staff s genuine happiness creates a lovely environment. Every morning, we enjoyed gorgeous sunrises, sometimes practicing yoga while watching the calm waters. On most days, the sea is perfect for snorkeling, though it can get a little rough with the warm northeast winds. Even then, it s a beautiful sight, and stronger swimmers could still enjoy it. I had a wonderful time at the peppercorn. Everything about it felt real, from the natural beauty to the heartfelt hospitality. I can t wait to return.

We spent four incredible nights at the peppercorn beach hotel. The hotel s tranquil atmosphere, delicious breakfast, and excellent restaurant made our stay truly special. May, the receptionist, was exceptionally helpful and thoughtful, arranging our visits to peppercorn farms and starfish beach by boat. We can t wait to return!

We enjoyed our 4 nights stay very much and loved every meal we ate here. You can taste the quality and love for the food. All staff is very nice and the member who welcomed us on the resort spoke very good english and wanted to make our stay as enjoyable as possible. With good tips and support. We rented a scooter for the whole period which is needed to explore more of the island. Within 15 minutes you will be at the safari- or amusement park. The bungalows are clean and well maintained and the pool is clean and refreshing. All and all we had a very good stay here.

Härligt ställe om man vill ha sol och bad i några dagar och inte se så mycket annat än fiskebyn i närområdet. Cyklar, snorkelutrustning och kanoter att låna, liksom filmer till dvd. Fina koraller direkt utanför stranden. Fantastisk personal och fin atmosfär, bra mat i restaurangen. Överlag dyrt, men känns prisvärtsom helhet.
Ein kleines resort, in dem man sich wunderbar erholen kann. Sehr schöne geräumige bungalows. Sehr gutes abwechslungsreiches essen. Happy hour, ein cocktail ist inclusive.

Nice small resort and a great place to recover from jet lag. Nice australian owner who was working waiting tables and interacting with the guests. Good food. Great massage and you can use bikes, kayaks etc for free. Live dinner music one night. Had a bungalow right on the beach. Would definitely come back.

Känslan när man kom in på detta ställe var wow! så fint inrett, ordning och reda med bra information vid incheck. Vackra bungalows och rum. Vacker trädgård och upplägget på anläggningen gjorde att det kändes lungt, luftigt och omhändertaget. Stranden (med finkornig sand) var underbar och ren. Massagen var superb! ägaren trevlig och tillmötesgående för de önskemål man hade. Det första personalen gjorde när vi kom och skulle äta lunch/middag var att ge min son kritor och papper att rita på-lung infann sig från första stund. Härlig matsal och trevlig peronal! gratis drink varje dag på drinktimmen var oxå en liten detalj som höjer intrycket. Detta är ettharmoniskt ställe där alla sover vid 22, om man önskar party har man inte så mycket att hämta. Vi bodde inte i bungalowerna vid vattnet men dessa såg magiska ut. Jag kommer defenitivt åka tillbaka till detta ställe!

We loved everything about peppercorn beach! very relaxing stay with an amazing view, very calm sea for swimming with kids, good food, pool, happy hour everyday. The staff go out of their way to make everyone comfortable and can organize all kinds of tours and activities around the island. We will definitely be back!

Extraordinary service, wonderful beach pool and great restaurant. There is not too much to do in the nearby area, but since we just wanted to relax and wind down for a few days this place was perfect. Will definetely come back for our next visit to the island.

The hotel itself was truly a paradise although the neighborhood was a bit dirty. The tv did not work well but we did not care much about it because we had other things to do such as free kayaking. The breakfast was the best, and the free drinks during the happy hours were great.
Mycket bra ställe. God mat, komfortabla rum och mycket vänlig och hjälpsam personal.

Peppercorn beach was amazing, don t think twice about staying. All the staff there are fab and so friendly and are so helpful. One of them even went and got banana blossom as one of our group wanted the salad not on the menu. They are excellent hosts, the place is stunning and serene and i couldn t recommend it more. Thank you so much for having us )

We were hesitating to come back to phu quoc six years after our last stay and especially after opening the new airport and the outrageous vinpearl complex. Therefore we picked up on purpose this appearently still bit remote northern area of the island. This is indeed one of the rare places in phu quoc that survives the methodical destruction of this former paradise. Snorkeling, swimming, kayak, everything at disposal to enjoy a few days rest in a good atmosphere and with friendly service. Highly recommended.

Although it s almost an hour to get there, it s definitely worth it if you are looking to relax and unwind. We spent 3 days there and felt very relaxed on day the property, rooms and staff all contribute to a lovely overall experience.

A great hotel in an unspoilt spot. Beautiful beach overlooked by the pool area and then the bar/restaurant. Food choice quality in the restaurant was wonderful, although suited to a 4/5 day stay. However, the hotel acknowledge this and provide recommendations for local hotels/restaurants should you wish to try somewhere different. On the downside (to us as we had 19/20 year old children) it was very quiet in the evenings and we were often the only people in the bar passed 9pm. This could be seen as a positive to many other people though. The staff were fantastic and dealt with any query in a friendly and enthusiastic manner.

Idyllic location, peppercorn beach is a very rare find that actually still feels like a forgotten part of an island. The room was simply furnished but comfortable and i was delighted that the 4th bed (we booked a family room with 3 beds for 4 people)... The 4th bed was described as a rollaway mattress but was actually a comfortable camp bed so that both children were thankfully elevated to the same height thus removing any arguments(!) breakfast was simply amazing - lovely selection of fruits, bread, pancakes, fresh juice, omelette made to your choice, bacon and egg, natural yoghurt mango - we literally ate like kings and tended to rarely require lunch or just a light snack. The restaurant food was simply superb. Kayak s are provided including life-jackets for kids and adults so we made full use of this. I think rowing out to watch the sunset on a completely still sea was one of my most memorable parts of the trip -)

Amaing time here, we added additonal night is was so great. The staff is so friendly. Everything is well priced. Great snorkeling right off the beach!! staff went out of their way to ensure a special occasion/birthday was celebrated. Thanks peppercorn!

We booked 4 nights and we wished we could have stayed longer. Everybody was friendly and professional, the rooms are spacious, modern with comfortable beds. The resort is surrounded by tropical gardens and the small private beach is kept clean and has plenty of shade to relax, read or nap. The restaurant serves really nice meals and the breakfast was the best we had in vietnam. The happy hour can be enjoyed from the terrace overlooking the pool or on the beach. You can swim, snorkle, kayak or take a bike and explore nearby village, we loved the secluded location and friendly, relaxed atmosphere.

Excellent place to visit. Had such an amazing time here. The staff are all lovely, always had a smile on their face and so poilte. The food was very good full of flavour and the restaurant offered a large variety of foods to try. Cannot fault this resort. Have stayed at many places in vietnam and this was by far the best. Peppercorn beach is private and quiet but this was great for relaxing and getting away from the business of the town. Thank you again for a lovely stay.
Newer bungalows on the beach, excellent restaurant, warm inviting staff, can t wait to return.
Hier hatten wir den schönsten aufenthalt auf phu quoc!! die anlage ist sehr schön und super sauber und täglich ein cocktail gratis den man an der kulisse einfach nur genießen kann!
Var 5 nätter på peppercorn beach. Mycket vacker anläggning med bra bad. Personalen var supertrevlig gjorde allt för gästerna skulle trivas. Frukosten var utsökt.

Fantastisk lille resort. Meget venlige og hjælpsomme personale. Super service. Lækker mad. Skøn oase. Mulighed for at låne kajak og snorkeludstyr. Rigtig pæne hytter. Ren pool. Vi var ikke udenfor hotellet. Men der er noget beskidt i lokalområdet. Det ligge langt fra hovedbyen. Men der er dejligt fredeligt. Kan kun anbefales.
Brilliant staff, very relaxed and great setting

I loved staying here, so much so i extended my stay by two nights. A beautiful beach and gardens, tended with care and attention by the staff. Delightful, caring and friendly service by all the team at peppercorn. Lovely, fresh meals and drinks. The free happy hour cocktail was a real treat every day. I can t recommend highly enough.

Ett mycket trevligt hotell men mycket trevlig personal och mycket fint hotellområde och bra mat/restaurang. Rekommenderar alla som ska till phu quoc att välja bort hotellen vid long beach och istället bo på peppercorn! mycket bättre vatten, trevligare och mindre exploaterat. Några tips om du väljer peppercorn snorkla långt ut där finns det fina koraller, gå in till fiskebyn och ät en middag på lokala restaurangen hoang du sea food , ta en cykeltur till lokala byn/marknaden och låna även deras kajaker för en tur längs kusten

Il personale super gentile e sempre sorridente ci ha fatto sentire a casa. I bungalow sono immersi nel verde e l atmosfera è estremamente rilassante. La colazione è molto ricca e se si decide di cenare/pranzare nella struttura la qualità del cibo è ottima . Consiglio vivamente se si vuole fare un soggiorno in pieno relax lontano dai rumori della città!

Wir haben vier tage auf phu quoc verbracht und unsere zeit in peppercorn sehr genossen. Der ort ist wunderschön, noch schöner als auf den bildern. Wir haben besonders genossen mit dem kanu die küste entlang zu paddeln und direkt vor dem hotel zu schnorcheln. Von peppercorn kann man gemütlich zu fuß in das nahegelegene dorf spazieren. Dort gibt es cafés und restaurants. Aber auch in peppercorn kann man hervorragend essen. Linh und die crew sind alle sehr herzlich und haben unseren aufenthalt zu einem wunderschönen erlebnis gemacht. Danke dafür!

Hôtel tout simplement parfait ! au calme et proche d un village local, cet endroit est magnifique et paisible ! le personnel est très agréable et aux petits soins, les petits dejeuners et le restaurant sont délicieux !
Das was wir gesucht haben. Ruhig und weg vom trubel

We loved our stay here. The staff are wonderful and very accommodating. The restaurant is excellent. The villas are so lovely, comfortable, and the beach is beautiful. The pool is pristine. We went to the south of the island for a day and we re so glad we stayed in the quiet north.

Ce resort est vraiment un agréable avec une taille humaine et un accueil irréprochable le personnel est aux petits soins sans etre obséquieux le jardin est magnifique et tres bien entretenu, la piscine propre les bungalows sont spacieux et confortables le restaurant est bon avec des produits frais, le petit dejeuner tres copieux des vélos sont à disposition pour explorer les alentours c est un tres bon endroit pour se reposer dommage que l ile entière ne soit pas à l image de ce petit coin..
Haben kostenlos ein upgrade auf strandbugalow bekommen. Service ist sehr zuvorkommend. Essen ist das beste in der region! preise sind angemessen, d.h. Das preis/leistungsverhältnis ist sehr gut.

In mei 2018 een aantal dagen in dit kleinschalige, schone, gastvrije resort verbleven. Mooie huisjes, fijn privé strand. Het resort ligt aan de noordkant van het eiland, ongeveer 45 minuten van het vliegveld af. In de omgeving is niet veel te doen maar als je voor de rust, zon en zee komt is dat een verademing. Het enige puntje is dat het restaurant wat prijziger is dan elders in vietnam maar dat wordt ruimschoots goed gemaakt door het geweldige team van peppercorn beach.
The picture with the beach behind the swimming pool is not real. The reality is that the beach has lots of rocks and we had to go by taxi to a nicer beach to swim.
We just loved the place and staff. It was paradise.

This resort is mind blowing. Seriously my husband and i kept saying the pictures just don t do it justice. We never wanted to leave. The restaurant has wonderful food and the service staff all work so hard to make sure you have a wonderful time. The beach is so amazing - we snorkeled, kayaked, and swam for the whole 3 days we were there. We also booked a couples massage which was wonderful! we stayed in a garden room and were very happy with it. The room was clean, well appointed, the ac worked very well. I swear this is the most beautiful and relaxing place i have ever been.

I was most impressed with the level of service by the staff at peppercorn. They are very attentive and there for any issues or help you may need, as well as friendly conversation. Dao was incredibly lovely to work with and very helpful - what a wonderful woman! we had some fun conversations and she even talked coffee with me and upon my leaving gave me the gift of coffee, personally from her. I was so touched by this! i don t think that s ever happened at any of the many hotels and resorts i ve stayed. The resort itself is very well kept and clean. Also, it s in a less crowded/less touristy area of the island, which i loved. I d definitely stay again.

It was a beautiful resort nicely located far away from the very touristed part of the island. This was a huge plus! we really enjoyed the restaurant, however, compared to vietnamese prices, it was rather expensive. All in all, we were very pleased with the service, the beach, the people, everything!

We really enjoyed our stay at peppercorn beach. This is a small hotel, but the room was clean and big. Also, the service was impressive. The staff there is dedicated and ready to assist you in any way they can. The beach is also very nice, and you can borrow some bikes or snorkel equipment for free. There is some corral reef just on the hotel beach. We and our kids really had a relaxing time there. Thumbs up to the lovely staff there!
Beautiful hotel . Loved our beach hut made for a very relaxing stay . Staff were excellent and the food was very good .

Peppercorn beach oli todella viihtyisä paikka. Huoneemme heti rannan edessä oli siisti, ja koko resorttia pidettiin hyvässä kunnossa. Erityisesti paikassa miellyttivät ystävällinen palvelu ja ruoka. Vaimollani oli flunssa, joka vasti lääkärissäkäynnin. Henkilökunta auttoi tässä kaikella mahdollisella tavalla. Ruoka vei kielen mennessään ja tulemme muistelemaan erityisesti äyriäisruokia varmasti talven synkeinä päivinä suomessa. Tätä paikkaa voi lämpimästi suositella henkilöille, jotka hakevat rauhallista ympäristöä, hyvää ruokaa ja kauniita maisemia.

From the second we pulled up at peppercorn beach the staff could not have been more welcoming. The resort is simply beautiful and the grounds are kept incredibly clean. Although the area is much quieter than the main resort the staff are very accommodating with organising day trips and activities.would highly recommend it for anyone looking for a relaxing holiday.

Just what we wanted, a clean, comfortable hotel by the beach, with attentive but not intrusive staff. It was quiet as its low season but we knew that before we went and only added to what we needed! free cocktail happy hour also helped! free upgrade to larger room was much appreciated.

Everything was wonderful. We felt at home from the very first minute of our stay. Service was superb and the foot exquisite. Any little thing we needed was solved quickly and efficiently. Recommend peppercorn to whoever would ask me a place to stay in vietnam -)
Beautiful beach, quite but few amenities.

Hotel très sympa, possédant plage et piscine, avec possibilité de faire du snorkeling et du kayak. Compter 1h depuis l aeroport (l hotel est a la pointe nord de l ile). Seul petit bemol, la plage souffre de l erosion et est tres etroite. Restaurant agreable et service impeccable. Ideal pour se resourcer quelques jours
Hôtel accueillant dans un beau jardin avec très bellle piscine et avec vue sur la plage
Peaceful and private. Staff very friendly and helpful, but a bit of a language barrier. A great stay.

Lovely small hotel on the north coast of pho quoc. Staff were very helpful (as seems to be the case in most of vietnam). The hotel is in a pretty remote position, so is best for a chill out, perhaps at the end of a longer holiday across vietnam or cambodia. The rooms are bungalow style and although fairly basic are perfectly fine and clean. The sea on the beach front can be choppy if windy, but it does shelve gradually, so it s possible to paddle. There is an open plan kitchen in the dining room and food is cooked directly after you order and brought piping hot to the table. Breakfasts are particularly enjoyable with fresh fruit and bread alongside anything else you d like them to cook. Power cuts do happen (we had 2 or 3 over a 6 night stay), but aren t an issue because there is a back up generator that kicks in after a couple of minutes. Wifi was generally good. There seem to be a few huge resort complexes opening up in the north of the island, so to find a family run boutique style hotel (there can t be more than 30 odd rooms) is great. For a 3 star hotel at this price point, i would have absolutely no hesitation in recommending.
Very friendly and comfortable hotel, with excellent food and easy access to great beach- the staff were really helpful and helped maked my mums birthday a very special day- thank you!!
Flott avslappende opphold i vakre omgivelser med svært god mat
Das hotel ist sehr familiär die mitarbeiter sind sehr sehr hilfsbereit lage des hauses ist sehr schön
沒有熱水.租車下午6點取車.隔天中午就需歸還.時間不足為奇
Quá tệ. Ko biết cach sắp xếp. Ko chuan bi trước.
Phòng rộng rãi, view xịn. Thoải mái. Anh chị chủ rất thận thiện và nhiệt tình
Phong tiện nghi thoáng mát, chủ khách sạn nhiệt tình, cám ơn khách sạn vì đã đón tiếp chu đáo ạ
Resort đẹp, thoáng mát, phòng ốc sạch sẽ. Có tiện ích xe đạp, và phương tiện chở ra nãi biển chu đáo. Nhân viên rất dễ thương và tận tâm. Cám ơn resort giúp mình có kì nghỉ thư thái

Nhân viên vô cùng dễ thương và thân thiện. Luôn hỗ trợ khách hết mình. Đặc biệt là các bạn lễ tân. Resort hướng đến khách nước ngoài, đặc biệt là khách tây nên ở đây rất yên tĩnh, không gian thoải mái, thiên nhiên trong lành, không bị xô bồ, khó chịu như những nơi khác. Buffet sáng ăn cũng khá ngon tuy cách trung tâm khá xa, nhưng nếu đi xe máy di chuyển dọc 2 bên đường thì rất mát. Nơi đây là 1 điểm cực kì thích hợp dành cho những ai muốn đến nghỉ dưỡng hơn. High recommend mọi người đến đây nhé 1 nơi cực thích hợp cho những ai thích pose các kiểu. Mình sẽ chọn resort này vào những lần sau khi đến phú quốc
Khách sạn đẹp, thân thiện, nhiều cây mát. Dọn phòng cực sạch. Ăn sáng chưa được phong phú lắm nếu cải thiện thì quá tốt.
Nơi yên bình với khung cảnh xanh mát và tự nhiên. Dịch vụ xuất sắc và nhân viên thân thiện. Rất khuyến khích ở lại phú quốc

Một nơi yên tĩnh để thư giãn. Phòng dễ thương và không gian hài hòa với thiên nhiên, bữa sáng không nhiều nhưng không sao. Tôi đã rất hài lòng với hồ bơi, nó thật đẹp. Lễ tân dễ thương và thân thiện. Cảm ơn
Không gian đẹp, yên tĩnh, mọi thứ đều tốt
Phòng giống trong hình, không gian yên tĩnh. Được bao bữa sáng đồ ăn ngon, nhân viên nhiệt tình, chu đáo.

Resort khá yên tĩnh, phù hợp cho các cặp đôi đi trăng mật không thích sự ồn ào, nhiều tây, ít người việt đặt phòng cách trung tâm không xa lắm, đi xe máy từ resort vào trung tâm khá thích vì đường thoáng và mát.

hotelName: Phu Quoc Kim - Bungalow On The Beach
userCmt: Bungalow les pieds dans l eau ! propreté aux alentours, je jardinier gentil, les dames de service aussi...

hotelName: Phu Quoc Kim - Bungalow On The Beach
userCmt: Khách sạn sát biển thuận tiện cho gia đình có con nhỏ dưới 2 tuổi. Nhân viên ks nhiệt tình vui vẻ. Đồ ăn sáng hơi tệ không phong phú. Lối đi trong khuôn viên ks hơi tối

hotelName: Phu Quoc Kim - Bungalow On The Beach
userCmt: Like to go back and stay for next trips hotel staffs was nice , pretty beach

hotelName: Phu Quoc Kim - Bungalow On The Beach
userCmt: Khách sạn tạm được, phòng ốc sạch sẽ, nhưng không có máy lạnh, chỉ có quạt. Chúng tôi đến vào mùa mưa nên cũng không đi đâu được nhiều.

hotelName: Phu Quoc Kim - Bungalow On The Beach
userCmt: Amazing

hotelName: Phu Quoc Kim - Bungalow On The Beach
userCmt: We stayed 6 nights in the beachfront bungalow. It surpassed our expectations. If you re looking for a stress free stay on a beautiful beach this is it. The breakfast was delicious, kim was very helpful with all our needs and always super nice. Highly recommend this place

hotelName: Phu Quoc Kim - Bungalow On The Beach
userCmt: The bulngalows are rather basic. But localisation is perfect! we had the frontbeach bungalows.

hotelName: Phu Quoc Kim - Bungalow On The Beach
userCmt: Fantastic location with a beautiful vibe, situated right on the beach you can t ask for a better spot! we opted for the beachfront bungalow upgrade, and it was absolutely superb, with stunning views and the sound of the waves just steps away. The area has plenty of great restaurants within a short walking distance, making dining out incredibly convenient. The hosts were exceptionally friendly and went out of their way to make our stay comfortable, offering helpful tips and ensuring we had everything we needed. While it s not the cheapest option, the pricing feels fair considering the unbeatable location and the quality of the experience. Highly recommend if you re looking for a relaxing getaway by the sea!

hotelName: Phu Quoc Kim - Bungalow On The Beach
userCmt: Kim and her boutique appartment complex is just wonderful. She is a great host, speaks fluently english, french, vietnamese and helped us arranging trips and getting infos about people and puo quoc island. Appartments are really good, very comfortable and the garden is beautifully maintained. It s a family business in second generation hands with private terrace and sunbeds on the beach - if you are not looking for a 5 star resort, this is the place to go!

hotelName: Phu Quoc Kim - Bungalow On The Beach
userCmt: Wonderful location on the beach with great facilities such as restaurants and grocery store.

hotelName: Phu Quoc Kim - Bungalow On The Beach
userCmt: Kim är en otrolig och hjälpsam värd. Vårt rum med utsikt över stranden var verkligen toppen. Perfekt läge och balkong i solnedgång. Rent och fräscht. Strandhanddukar, mycket uppskattat. Fin frukost och trevlig personal. Vi kommer tillbaka.

hotelName: Phu Quoc Kim - Bungalow On The Beach
userCmt: Perfect if you re looking for a small basic bungalow on the beach. Very comfortable but it s not a traditional big hotel experience. Kim and her assistants are charming and authentic. Great coffee and breakfast (delicious fruits pancakes). Kim is fluent in french and english and is generous with her time explaining details about vietnam.

hotelName: Phu Quoc Kim - Bungalow On The Beach
userCmt: Staying at phu quoc kim s bungalow has been nothing but lovely! as a host and person kim is wonderful and so is everyone around her. The room was simple yet beautiful and from our garden view bungalow we could still see the beach and the ocean from our door step. Only wish we would have stayed longer and really hope we can come back for another visit soon. Fanny, hampus viggo

hotelName: Phu Quoc Kim - Bungalow On The Beach
userCmt: This bungalow has great benefit, esp owner has sincerly heart. If couple came here u guys might be prepare bug killer, of coruse facilty little bit poor but not big matter of ur happy travel. If u hesistate ur booking, i definitely recommend this bungalow. Ocean view n safe facility r great. 한국인들을 위해서 말하자면 시설 자체가 뛰어난 편은 아닙니다. 벌레가 많고 문이 중간중간 조금씩 뚫려 있어서 잘못하면 잠자면서 음청 고통 받을 수 있습니다. 다만 벌레 기피제 에프킬러 하나 큰거 근처 킹마트가서 사오셔서 다 처리하고나면 몹시나 좋습니다 주인 아주머니가 영어도 잘하시고 친절함 끝판왕입니다 오션뷰도 너무 좋아요. 만약 커플분이시면 무조건 바다가 바로 보이는 2층 방을 예약하시는걸 추천해요!!

hotelName: Phu Quoc Kim - Bungalow On The Beach
userCmt: 비치는 휼륭했으나 객실이 낡고 모기가 많았다

hotelName: Phu Quoc Kim - Bungalow On The Beach
userCmt: Sehr nette familie und immer hilfsbereit

hotelName: Phu Quoc Kim - Bungalow On The Beach
userCmt: This bungalow was absolutely perfect! me and my fiancé had a wonderful time and enjoyed the resort greatly! staff was friendly and always available to help in every way. Great location within steps of the beach with an area sectioned for lounging on the beach. Never seen any pan handlers which is nice to avoid! great location with many restaurants to chose from on the few streets within minutes of walking. Highly recommend this place.

hotelName: Phu Quoc Kim - Bungalow On The Beach
userCmt: Lovely simple bungalow-style rooms only a stone s throw from the beach. The rooms are simple and basic, but were very clean and well maintained (as are the lovely garden areas around the bungalows). Good size comfortable double bed - with an easy to use mosquito net. I didn t use the wife, but a nice surprise were the very extensive internet tv options. One of the best things about the property is being able to sit out in the morning enjoying the delicious breakfast (seafood rice noodle soup recommended ....) overlooking the sea. The owner, kim, is absolutely charming and he was very helpful throughout (and before - in arranging a taxi transfer and a super-late arrival of 1am). There are number of local restaurants nearby, as well as a small café attached to the property, where they also make fresh bread and very excellent pastries. This was our first trip to this island, but after staying here both my wife and i are agreed this is the place we will return to for out next trip!

hotelName: Phu Quoc Kim - Bungalow On The Beach
userCmt: Bodde i bungalow på stranden, 2 meter till havet, härlig uteplats att se solnedgång. Tyst på natten. Sköna sängar!. Bra frukost. Enkelt badrum. Taxi till staden ca 50 kronor. Perfekt för sol, bad och avkoppling.

hotelName: Phu Quoc Kim - Bungalow On The Beach
userCmt: We had a great stay. Staff were great, food was great, lovely atmoshpere. Would stay there again.

hotelName: Phu Quoc Kim - Bungalow On The Beach
userCmt: The beach is beautiful and swimming was great. The property is right on the beach and was perfectly located for our purposes. There were a number of restaurants along the beach that suited our need so we never left the beach area. The staff are very friendly and helpful. Our taxi picked us up as scheduled with no difficulty. We booked a stay for 5 nights in a superior room. The wifi didn t not work in the room - we had to go outside and the bed was hard. After 3 days, the management moved us (without extra charge) to a beachfront room which was great. A more comfortable bed and wifi was good. If you can afford the extra for the beachfront, you will enjoy it.

hotelName: Phu Quoc Kim - Bungalow On The Beach
userCmt: Fin service, bra frukost, stranden utmärkt. Lugnt område med restauranger av alla prisklasser men alla med färsk seafood. Lite hårda sängar.

hotelName: Phu Quoc Kim - Bungalow On The Beach
userCmt: Schmales grundstück zum strand hin, selbst der letzte bungalow ist nur ein paar meter vom strand weg, alles sehr sauber und natürlich gehalten. Man hat ein gutes gefühl beim aufenthalt, man kommt sich nicht vor wie in einer 0815 urlaubsabsteige welche auch auf mallorca sein könnte, sondern wie in asien inkl. Der vietnamesischen gastfreundlichkeit.

hotelName: Phu Quoc Kim - Bungalow On The Beach
userCmt: This hotel is an awesome little find for the price! beachfront bungalow is directly on the beach with a private patio where hotel staff will serve breakfast just for you. The accommodations are clean and have everything you need - including a small refrigerator for storing cold drinks to grab while you lounge on the beach just outside your door. Hotel staff were very kind and accommodating.

hotelName: Phu Quoc Kim - Bungalow On The Beach
userCmt: It was ok. What you pay is what you get.

hotelName: Phu Quoc Kim - Bungalow On The Beach
userCmt: Accueil sympa, chambres au bord de la mer, proches des restaurants et bar, calme

hotelName: Phu Quoc Kim - Bungalow On The Beach
userCmt: When wind and surf strong, we got nervous because 15 feet from front door to ocean is too close, but when a nice day, less wind, and ocean calm, we got the front seat, with a glass of wine and food, the best room we got on the entire beach. This is a rainy season, we got 3 days of rain and lucky we also got 3days of very nice days, enjoy it.

hotelName: Phu Quoc Kim - Bungalow On The Beach
userCmt: This is a family run group of beach bungalows. They are very friendly. Keep in mind this is a beach bungalow. The room was clean and comfortable. Tiled floor. Air conditioning (keep the bathroom door closed to maximize the ac) and fan. Comfortable bed with mosquito net. Mini-fridge. Clothes washing service available. They have a restaurant/bar from 7 am to early evening. The free breakfast was very good. We ate dinner at the lively dinh cau night market. There are bodega stores just outside the entrance. It is a 5-10 minute taxi to dinh cau. There are beach restaurants/bars within a short walk along the beach. We were there 2 days. One day they arranged for an excellent snorkeling trip to the islands to the south of phu quoc. The second day we spent on the beach in front of our bungalow. Massages and pedicures on the beach. Don t miss the amazing sunsets.

hotelName: Phu Quoc Kim - Bungalow On The Beach
userCmt: Superbra läge!

hotelName: Phu Quoc Kim - Bungalow On The Beach
userCmt: On the beach. Naturally beautiful , breakfast is good ( i had a plater of fresh fruits every day)the sea food noddle was excellent . The properly owner kim and staffs are so nice
I would stay here again. My only complaints, bed kinda hard and the white wall in the room was dirty, kinda gross. The pool was really nice, breakfast was good, location was great.

Nous sommes arrivés à l hôtel océan pearl avec beaucoup d attente... Les commentaires que j avais lu à son sujet était super bien. Sûrement qu il y a un an, cet hôtel devait être au top! malheureusement elle a perdu beaucoup de sa superbe. À notre arrivée, nous avons attendu plus de 20 minutes au comptoir de réception pour être servis. C est un gentil gardien qui est venu nous porter un rafraîchissement en attendant. Nous avions payé un supplément de 55 /2 nuits pour une troisième personne. En arrivant à notre chambre, surprise un lit de camp est collé au notre pour ma nièce de quasi 6 pieds! hyper inconfortable, nous avons passé la deuxième nuit à 3 dans 2 lits simples. Et je ne vous parle pas du nombre de cheveux trouvés dans le lit... Hôtel très, très décevante. Ils devront revoir leur service à la clientèle et la propreté des lieux.

Nice and well maintained hotel at the busiest part of phu quoc. Lots of noisy restaurants nearby, but inside rooms the noise level is tolerable. Exceptionally good service at reception, english speaking was fluent compared to other services around the island. Skye bar on the top roof was one of the nicest night spending places of the island.
It was ok! hard beds!

Nice hotel on a good place. Many restaurants nearby. There was many choices at the breakfast. We loved especially the fresh fruits. The swimming pool is refreshing. The minus part was the nightclub skye on the roof of the front building we could hear the music pretty loud to our room even though we were in a different building and because of that we had some trouble to sleep. The nightclub is open until 2 am. We visit skye one evening. There is a nice view, but unprofessional service and bad drinks. A petty.
このホテルは2度目の宿泊で設備やスタッフは問題なく快適です ただ今回はホテル前のお店が朝方まで営業しており大音量でうるさかったです 奥の方の建物だったからまだマシですが表の建物に泊まっていたらかなりのものだったと思います なんとかなりませんかね

Läget är bra, mitt i staden. Men hotellet är väldigt lyhört och man hör folk som stänger dörrar och möbler som flyttas runt. Det var väldigt svårt att sova när alla andra i huset började gå upp. Poolen är bra men det finns inte så många solsängar, kanske 20-30st bara.

Overall the room was clean. Staffs are friendly. Check in very fast not wait for too long. Although check in time at 2 but they let us check in as early as 12pm. Please call check in with them to see if they have room available to check in early... Do not wait till check in time
Reasonable price in the middle of dong duong town. Where most of the restaurants and activities are around. The staff was nice and friendly
The staff are fine but the hotel is not 4 star , maybe 3 at best and that goes for breakfast if your quick enough b4 it runs out

This is a super clean friendly hotel great check in good english speaking receptionists which was good as i speak no vietnamese i m trying but it s hard the staff are super friendly and the breakfast was faultless i highly recommend this place if in phu quoc and it s literally 2 or 3 min walk too beach

This hotel is a good value and is 20 minute walk to the night market. The rooms are clean, but we had no hot water and a broken phone on our second stay. Overall, the breakfast is good (soup especially) and the staff is very nice.

Fantastic place to stay. Centrally located. Staff are attentive, friendly and courteous. Amenities are fantastic and breakfast is above standard. I would recommend a family to stay here as we thoroughly enjoyed our stay.
Some staff very unhelpful and rude. Hotel adequate but needing some maintenance.
Très bien mise à part la douche qui a pas d eau chaude sinon mise à part sa parfait
Convenience location for shopping and dining. But the hotel needs a big improvement on customer services
Friendly staff..but hitel is not 4 star for me..rather a 3 star...
Thanks
Everything is excellent, staff were very nice.

フーコックの海沿いの大型リゾートホテル 主要観光地のナイトマーケット迄は約1.3kmで徒歩では厳しいが タクシーで3万ドン程度で行ける 私たちはバイクをホテル近くのレストランでレンタルした 海は道路を隔てた向こう側のためビーチサイドのホテルではない 私たちは本館からさらに奥側にある別館に宿泊 本館が邪魔になって海はあまり見えない 部屋はしっかり清掃されていてシャワーの水圧も高く施設的な問題は特になし スタッフも終止にこやかで親切 朝食も品数が多くまずますおいしい 宿泊費用からしたらコスパはかなり高いと思われる 唯一難点を挙げるとすればホテル本館最上階のバー のディスコライトが深夜まで部屋の中に差し込み安眠の妨害になること ホテル横のナイトクラブの重低音がうるさいことがあげられる 音や光が気になる方や小さい子供連れは注意が必要かと
真ん中にプールを挟んで前後に宿泊棟があります 海が見えるのは前の方の海側の部屋だけだと思います ベトナムの連休中でしたので家族連れを多く見かけました 部屋や朝食は並だと思います ただwifiは快適でした
ホテルのフロントスタッフは いつも笑顔で対応してくれるので心地良い気分になる 朝食ビュッフェも味は悪くないと思う 但し 夜はカクテルbarの音楽が大音量で鳴り響くので 神経質な人は寝れないかも知れない

Great pool! nice breakfast restaurant, friendly and helpful service (although the staff didn t really speak much english) everything was fine really except hard pillows and kind of loud music from a nearby disco. Wi-fi connection was poor in the room but better in the lobby and restaurant. Close to beach and restaurants.
우선 숙소 직원들이 친절하다. 깔끔한 숙소였고, 넓었다. 욕조에 샤워기 수압이 약한 점은 아쉽다. 바다로 접근성도 좋다. 수영장도 있어 수영을 즐길수 있다. 가격 대비 훌륭하다 생각한다.
Breakfast is very good. The menu changes everyday. Food is excellent. The hotel is centrally located worn walking distances to many shops, cafe, restaurants, spas etc.
Safe and easy to transportation around city

The property for the most part was good. The front desk staff doesn t speak english so come prepare with a translator. The beds are extremely hard it feels like you are sleeping on wood pallets. I think the room price should be under 80 a night. The location is great!

Good location close to bars and restaurants. Hotel has very good facilities-pool is excellent. The staff are extremely helpful and friendly. One thing to note is that there is a rooftop bar on the front building which plays music until 2am. If you are a light sleeper i would recommend getting a room at the back of building beach access is approximately 200 meter walk.
Chúng tôi đã có kỳ nghỉ tốt, thoải mái tại phú quốc ocean peal hotel
Prime location modern amenities, and natural beauty make ocean pearl the perfect retreat on phu quoc. A seamless blend of comfort and tranquility.
Cô chủ thân thiện, phòng ở rộng rãi sạch sẽ thoáng mát . Cảm ơn cô chủ. Hẹn gặp lại phú quốc

hotelName: Premier Village Phu Quoc Resort - Được quản lý bởi Accor
userCmt: 最高 スタッフの皆さんはどこで会っても気持ち良くあいさつをしてくれます お部屋も清潔かつ 充分満足な広さでした 3泊だけの滞在でしたが また何度でも訪れたいホテルです

hotelName: Premier Village Phu Quoc Resort - Được quản lý bởi Accor
userCmt: Everything

hotelName: Premier Village Phu Quoc Resort - Được quản lý bởi Accor
userCmt: The place is very isolate, good for relaxing trip.

hotelName: Premier Village Phu Quoc Resort - Được quản lý bởi Accor
userCmt: 체크인 시 호텔패스와 호텔 간 교신 문제로 지급완료된 조식을 추가로 현장에서 지급하고 환급받게 하였으나 이를 손님이랑 해결하겠다고 체크인을 지연시키는등의 행위 잡화점에서 산 음식을 사전에 개봉되어 있었으나 이를 클레임하자 왜 미리 확인하지 않았는지 따짐 잘못된 음식을 팔고 이를 클레임하고 건들지도 않은 음식을 반품하였으나 이에 대한 추가적인 조치 없이 음식값만 지불하고 끝냄 시설, 분위기 등은 좋음

hotelName: Premier Village Phu Quoc Resort - Được quản lý bởi Accor
userCmt: Here is the best resort i have ever been! they are very kind and professional.

hotelName: Premier Village Phu Quoc Resort - Được quản lý bởi Accor
userCmt: Excellent customer service. Helpful staff, great food

hotelName: Premier Village Phu Quoc Resort - Được quản lý bởi Accor
userCmt: 너무너무 좋았고 날씨 습도 온도 수영장 모든 것이 완벽했어요. 더럽 the love....

hotelName: Premier Village Phu Quoc Resort - Được quản lý bởi Accor
userCmt: Beautiful clean property with amazing genuine service. Highly recommend!

hotelName: Premier Village Phu Quoc Resort - Được quản lý bởi Accor
userCmt: Our expectations for the price paid had a huge disparity, but we can see them trying.

hotelName: Premier Village Phu Quoc Resort - Được quản lý bởi Accor
userCmt: 8월1일부터 3박 4일 머물렀습니다. 태풍으로 해변에서 할수 있는 레저가 금지되어 아쉬웠습니다. 전체적인 시설은 깨끗했고, 조경이 잘되어 있어 좋았습니다. 체크인시 직원 응대는 실망이었습니다. 약간 불친절하였고, 묻는 질문에 응대가 불편하게 했습니다. 조식은 보통 수준.. 향후 재방문의사 있습니다.

hotelName: Premier Village Phu Quoc Resort - Được quản lý bởi Accor
userCmt: Best resort ever!

hotelName: Premier Village Phu Quoc Resort - Được quản lý bởi Accor
userCmt: Breakfast was so poor for a 5-star resort. On the last day, we called a shuttle to go to lobby for checking out (we need to leave at 10) at 9 25. They committed to pick us in 15 minutes but actually no one came until many cars passed by our villa but no one stopped. At the lobby, we complained about this service and their answer was they had to pick the other guests for their breakfast (?!?!). Even we were very rush, the driver still stopped on the way to serve other guests (when the other staff ignored us). I really don t know what they were thinking.

hotelName: Premier Village Phu Quoc Resort - Được quản lý bởi Accor
userCmt: Nice hotel, friendly staff

hotelName: Premier Village Phu Quoc Resort - Được quản lý bởi Accor
userCmt: Fantastiska rymliga villor med egen pool. Lite livligt och hög ljudnivå vid frukost. Ligger lite avsides men vi har inga problem med det. Lite konstigt upplägg med att man måste lämna en relativt hög deposition (6000 kr) på ett kreditkort för att kunna sätta upp något på rummet. Aldrig varit med om detta tidigare.

hotelName: Premier Village Phu Quoc Resort - Được quản lý bởi Accor
userCmt: Beautiful resort. We were supposed to share our beachfront villa with another couple but unfortunately they had to cancel due to flight cancellation from coronavirus. We felt that the property management could have been more understanding by applying their credit towards food and beverages but only 25, but that wasn t enough. We also had a personal assistant during our stay

hotelName: Premier Village Phu Quoc Resort - Được quản lý bởi Accor
userCmt: 너무 좋았어요

hotelName: Premier Village Phu Quoc Resort - Được quản lý bởi Accor
userCmt: 너무 좋았어요 대 만족 입니다

hotelName: Premier Village Phu Quoc Resort - Được quản lý bởi Accor
userCmt: It was perfect days. Someday i will come here again

hotelName: Premier Village Phu Quoc Resort - Được quản lý bởi Accor
userCmt: Accor hotels needs to properly train its hard working staff, especially in the restaurants.

hotelName: Premier Village Phu Quoc Resort - Được quản lý bởi Accor
userCmt: The location is great, nice view and beach!!! staffs are nice, but they still need improvement. Everything is so slow here and often communication in english is mistaken and frustrating.

hotelName: Premier Village Phu Quoc Resort - Được quản lý bởi Accor
userCmt: Excellent customer service, beautiful beachfront villa. Staff very helpful, family friendly.

hotelName: Premier Village Phu Quoc Resort - Được quản lý bởi Accor
userCmt: Väldigt fint hotell

hotelName: Premier Village Phu Quoc Resort - Được quản lý bởi Accor
userCmt: 酒店设计非常舒适 娱乐活动很多 员工十分友善 尤其是管家给我们提供了很多建议和服务帮助 非常休闲和愉快的度假体验 如果可以还想多住几天

hotelName: Premier Village Phu Quoc Resort - Được quản lý bởi Accor
userCmt: 메인비치 앞의 바다가 정말 좋습니다. 리조트가 너무 커서 버기카를 부르는게 조금은 불편할수도 있겠지만 그것또한 재미있습니다.

hotelName: Premier Village Phu Quoc Resort - Được quản lý bởi Accor
userCmt: 很舒適的度假村 早餐豐富,不過味道一般,由其越南湯粉淡而無味,在渡假村記得要關門窗,因有猴子搵食

hotelName: Premier Village Phu Quoc Resort - Được quản lý bởi Accor
userCmt: Ideal place for families with kids. The beach is clean and safe. The entire resort is full of trees, plants and very well maintained throughout. However, buffet breakfast and in-house services still have room for further improvement.

hotelName: Premier Village Phu Quoc Resort - Được quản lý bởi Accor
userCmt: コテージは清潔に保たれ 室内は裸足で過ごせました プールの水質も満足です スタッフはすれ違う度 皆笑顔で挨拶してくれます レストランではシーフードと肉の盛り合わせを食べましたが 火の入れ方が絶妙で美味でした 滞在中 幸せな気持ちで過ごせて とても満足しました 再訪するつもりです

hotelName: Premier Village Phu Quoc Resort - Được quản lý bởi Accor
userCmt: We had the most fantastick stay. The villa was superp. The service from the reception (miss nga le phu who is the assistant manager) was outstanding. But housekeeping has room for improvement re. Cleaning of the villa. Pool and beach areas are fine, but lacking sunbeds and cozyness. A major plus would be a pool heater in the private pools. In villa dining as also superp.

hotelName: Premier Village Phu Quoc Resort - Được quản lý bởi Accor
userCmt: 部屋のインテリア 夕陽 食事 プール ビーチ 全て良かったですが 訪問時風が強くて 私達が滞在したビラは位置的にも特に風が強く プライベートプールは落ち葉だらけでそもそも寒いし一度も利用出来ませんでした それだけが残念でした

hotelName: Premier Village Phu Quoc Resort - Được quản lý bởi Accor
userCmt: Excellent hotel for family

hotelName: Premier Village Phu Quoc Resort - Được quản lý bởi Accor
userCmt: 특히 체크인시 응대하던 남성은 매우 불친절하며, 방 안내 없이 문앞에 하차후 알아서 찾아가도록 하였습니다.(버기에 여러 투숙객을 한번에 이동). 며칠간의 투숙중 청소요청에도 생수와 수건 교체 외에는 청소가 않딥니다. 어플로 버기를 신청하면 도착했다는 문자 받고도, 밖에서 15 30분 기다리는건 흔한 일어었습니다.

hotelName: Premier Village Phu Quoc Resort - Được quản lý bởi Accor
userCmt: T is our first time to experience the villa type, we are glad to be here, everything is so nice and unreal (awesome), the people here are so friendly and full of passion. We are lucky to have the cute lady thu for helping and arranging all the demands for us. You will really own the money when you spend them, this place is the best one for this

hotelName: Premier Village Phu Quoc Resort - Được quản lý bởi Accor
userCmt: Good

hotelName: Premier Village Phu Quoc Resort - Được quản lý bởi Accor
userCmt: We love and enjoy this hotel and would highly recommend to our friends and family.

hotelName: Premier Village Phu Quoc Resort - Được quản lý bởi Accor
userCmt: オーシャンビュー６０５号室に家族で滞在しました お部屋は広く 綺麗でした 部屋から見える景色は絶景 毎日 サンセットを見ることが出来ました スタッフ皆さん気さくで 会うとxin chao!と笑顔で挨拶してくれます リゾート内の移動はバギーが必須ですが アプリのチャットで呼ぶことが出来ます バギーを呼ぶ以外でもスパの予約 部屋の備品補充 なんでもチャットで要求できます(入力は日本語でok) 200室くらいあるリゾートだと思いますが 何日かしたらレストランのスタッフも私たちの顔を覚えてくれました このリゾートはダウンタウンから離れているので あちこち出歩くのには適していないです リゾート内でのんびり過ごすのがいいでしょう 近場の観光地はケムビーチ サンセットタウン ホントムケーブルカーでしょうか サンセットタウンのkiss of the seaは花火が素晴らしいです 目の前で上げる花火はまさに圧巻 ホテルからタクシーで15分 20分で行かれます ちなみにホテルスタッフは皆さん英語で一生懸命に説明してくれますが 訛りが少し強いです そこは翻訳アプリの併用をした方がいいかも

hotelName: Premier Village Phu Quoc Resort - Được quản lý bởi Accor
userCmt: 조용히 휴가 즐기기에 최고입니다,

hotelName: Premier Village Phu Quoc Resort - Được quản lý bởi Accor
userCmt: 我們五天都住這間飯店 雖然飯店地理位置遠了點 不過整體上我們都很喜歡 滿意 下次有去富國島會再考量住這間的

hotelName: Premier Village Phu Quoc Resort - Được quản lý bởi Accor
userCmt: The wifi connection had major problems inside the room.

hotelName: Premier Village Phu Quoc Resort - Được quản lý bởi Accor
userCmt: Highly recommended, such a beautiful place to spend time with family and friends.

hotelName: Premier Village Phu Quoc Resort - Được quản lý bởi Accor
userCmt: It was a very quiet and nice vacation

hotelName: Premier Village Phu Quoc Resort - Được quản lý bởi Accor
userCmt: Absolutely amazing, top service and great secluded location!

hotelName: Premier Village Phu Quoc Resort - Được quản lý bởi Accor
userCmt: The water was beautiful, but the beachside villa we rented had some trash in the water. The villa is very very old. It doesn t feel clean. The staff are great.

hotelName: Premier Village Phu Quoc Resort - Được quản lý bởi Accor
userCmt: Nydelig sted, stille, pent og behagelig store områder med strand og bassenger buggyer som kjørte og hentet oss, når vi ikke ville gå eller sykle villaen var stor og fin, deilig med privat basseng harde senger litt for dårlig housekeeping til å være ett så flott sted. De kom kl 17 noen dager, vi måtte purre på toalettpapir, og at de skulle fylle opp minibaren som var inkludert flere av dagene. Når de kom med toalettpapir, ble dette bare satt på kjøkkenbordet. De kostet ikke rundt bassengområdet, selv om det var masse som falt ned fra trærne. Dette gjorde vi selv

hotelName: Premier Village Phu Quoc Resort - Được quản lý bởi Accor
userCmt: The property is absolute paradise. Beautifully maintained. Views of crystal blue water from all the room and luxury at its finest. The staff are all extremely friendly and helpful.

hotelName: Premier Village Phu Quoc Resort - Được quản lý bởi Accor
userCmt: 자연과 함께 함께 좋은시간을 보냈습니다 workcation 쉬고 일하는 시간 잘보냈습니다.

hotelName: Premier Village Phu Quoc Resort - Được quản lý bởi Accor
userCmt: If i can give premier village phu quoc 6 stars, i would. From check in to check out, everything exceeded our expectations. A shout to all the staffs with a 10/5 services, especially chloe (qc manager), vinh (buggy driver), hannah (the market breakfast). Their patients, attentiveness, warmth hospitality made us feel like vips. This resort is so stunning, with a private white sand beach for guest to snorkel, kayaking, swimming. They also offer free ticket to kiss of the sea water show, it is so spectacular. I have seen many show in united states and vegas, but this show is by far so much better. I also travel to the north shore, but the vibes is too busy and vegas vibe for us. Thank you premier village phu quoc for an unforgettable family vacation, from villa 801!

hotelName: Premier Village Phu Quoc Resort - Được quản lý bởi Accor
userCmt: Great place, very remote and spacious, and a very large resort/pool villas. Near the ocean and nature. Recommend to visit before rainy season ))) because the weather is amazing!!!

hotelName: Premier Village Phu Quoc Resort - Được quản lý bởi Accor
userCmt: 숙소 위치가 산속이라 서비스 구역 가기위해 버기카 호출 대기시간이 많이 지체되어 불편했음 차라리 숙소에 전용버기카 지급이 좋을거라 건의함

hotelName: Premier Village Phu Quoc Resort - Được quản lý bởi Accor
userCmt: 가성비 너무 좋아요. 객실과 서비스 모두 만족했습니다. 다만 요청에 대한 피드백이 조금 느렸습니다.

hotelName: Premier Village Phu Quoc Resort - Được quản lý bởi Accor
userCmt: Direkt amstrand mit eigenem pool und eigener haegematte am strand. Die zimmer waren alle super mit eigenem badezimmer.

hotelName: Premier Village Phu Quoc Resort - Được quản lý bởi Accor
userCmt: 위치가 애매한 점 말고는 완벽함.

hotelName: Premier Village Phu Quoc Resort - Được quản lý bởi Accor
userCmt: I was stay 10 days at room 223, it was an amazing resort, the beach was nice and clean, nice view, the room was so clean and absolutely spacious and comfortable with every single thing. The staff was so friendly and respectful, even mr. Patrice laudrein who is the general manager of premier village came to the market restaurant breakfast buffet) every morning to say hi ad care about every customers, the food was good. I would love to recommend to everyone for someone who would like to to enjoy the lovely resort and beautiful beach, and i would love to say thanks premier village staff for all.

hotelName: Premier Village Phu Quoc Resort - Được quản lý bởi Accor
userCmt: Super nice staffs with excellent services. We booked a beachfront villa which has an amazing view and jst a few steps to a very clear crystal beach. Our family stayed the whole time in the villa to enjoy and relax. We canceled trips to visit elsewhere since we really love everything in the village. Highly recommend

hotelName: Premier Village Phu Quoc Resort - Được quản lý bởi Accor
userCmt: 숙소가격은 많이 비싼데 일하는 분들의 일처리 능력이 전문가 적이지는 않았음. 로비에서 일하는 mai 라는 사람만 정확하게 일처리해주었음

hotelName: Premier Village Phu Quoc Resort - Được quản lý bởi Accor
userCmt: ビーチフロントヴィラに3泊しました ゆっくり過ごすことはできましたが 二度と泊まることはないと思います 良かった点 海水浴を楽しむには良い環境 シュノーケリングなど無料のアクティビティもあった 広大な敷地の割には手入れが行き届いている プールやビーチも綺麗だった 毎日数多くの従業員と顔を合わせたが ほとんどの人が笑顔で挨拶をしてくれた 専属のコンシェルジュとlineでやり取りができる 良くなかった点 空港からの送迎がなかった 昨年6月まであったサービスが廃止になったとのこと 無料送迎を見込んで予約をしたため 残念だった チェックインの際 部屋になかなかスーツケースが届かなかった 専属コンシェルジュやレセプションに度々リクエストをしたが バギーが遅いからとの理由(レセプションから部屋までは歩ける距離)で 1時間半ほど待たされた 部屋のソファでダニに刺された 室内でも虫除けを使用した方がいいかもしれません 飲食物の価格が高い 日本のリゾート並みの価格 隔離された場所にあるため 気軽に外食/買い出しにも行けない 事前に調べて覚悟はしていたが 味の割に高いと思う 設備が不十分 ①ドライヤーが使いにくい ②シャワーのお湯が一定時間で水になる ③電話機が故障している など 設備面での不便さが気になった レセプションやコンシェルジュがあまり協力的ではなかった 個人差があるとは思うが 専属コンシェルジュの意味がなかった バギーの数が少ない 宿泊者数に対してバギーの数が足りていないため 敷地内の移動は徒歩の方が早いくらいだった

hotelName: Premier Village Phu Quoc Resort - Được quản lý bởi Accor
userCmt: Clean nice stay. Big beautiful villa. All the staff are very friendly. Very windy in december with the wind blowing all day to include at night making it hard to sleep. My son enjoyed the kids zone. The sunset beach was disappointing as there is no public bathroom available and we continually found pieces of glass in the sand. The water was cloudy, not like the photos.

hotelName: Premier Village Phu Quoc Resort - Được quản lý bởi Accor
userCmt: Lovely resort! it was a fantastic stay in all ways!

hotelName: Premier Village Phu Quoc Resort - Được quản lý bởi Accor
userCmt: 屋内のアリの多さが目立ち 対策を立てて欲しい

hotelName: Premier Village Phu Quoc Resort - Được quản lý bởi Accor
userCmt: 버기카 부르면 30분 정도 걸리는것 빼곤 다 좋았습니다

hotelName: Premier Village Phu Quoc Resort - Được quản lý bởi Accor
userCmt: Very pleasant holiday. Beautiful resort and lovely facilities. Very friendly staff.

hotelName: Premier Village Phu Quoc Resort - Được quản lý bởi Accor
userCmt: 특별한건 없고 아직 공사중인곳이 있는곳과 다낭프리미어빌리지 에 비교하면 식사메뉴 종류 및 음식맛이 많이떨어짐

hotelName: Premier Village Phu Quoc Resort - Được quản lý bởi Accor
userCmt: 가족 단위로 묵기에는 아주 좋은 장소입니다. 단지 단지가 넒어서 매번 번지카를 타고 가기에 불편함이 있네요. 3박4일동안 식당 2곳을 이용했는데..메뉴가 공통된게 많아서 밖으로 나가서 먹고 싶을때가 있는데 메뉴를 비슷하게 말고 완전히 다른 컨셉으로 바꿔주면 좋겠습니다. 맛이 없다가 아니라, 메뉴가 비슷비슷해서.

hotelName: Premier Village Phu Quoc Resort - Được quản lý bởi Accor
userCmt: 2룸 예약했고 방 1개는 닫혀있었어요. 계단 이용이 힘들어 1,2층 사용했는데 1층방에 곰팡이냄새나요. 나중에 3층으로 바꿔달라고 했는데 여긴 넘 뭐든 넘 느리고 의사소통이 잘안되서 힘들었어요.

hotelName: Premier Village Phu Quoc Resort - Được quản lý bởi Accor
userCmt: コンビニの品数が少ない

hotelName: Premier Village Phu Quoc Resort - Được quản lý bởi Accor
userCmt: 방에 뱀이 들어와서 너무 놀라고 무서웠다ㅠㅠ

hotelName: Premier Village Phu Quoc Resort - Được quản lý bởi Accor
userCmt: Where should i start? i guess i should let the people know about the dangerous, 1 lane road leading into the resort. See photos below. This 5 stars resort charges guests over 600 us ( around 14mil in vn dong) a night, but not willing to spend the money to make the necessary needed improvement of the single lane road leading into the resort. We were scare to dead when big trucks approached uphill as our hired driver were driving us downhill to go into town. The only way for the other truck to pass was for our driver to back his van up against the barrier. One mishap and our van could go down on the embankment. I prayed the entire time for the driver his assistant to maneuver safety. I saw ppl on the ground using their bare hand made repairs with red rock. That road needs to be closed proper repairs need to be done to secure the foundation underneath before someone or an entire family could get hurt. The front desk staff including the manager vic (i think), was not the most helpful staff that i had seen during my trip. There were 4 staffs seating at their desks doing not much, but only 1 staff could help with check out. The mgr wouldn t allow us to exchange more than 200us a day so we could go into town spend some money to help the local economy. Where are the tourists supposed to go? if it is your policy, you should post on your website so ppl who choose to stay at your resort know ahead of time to exchange the currency elsewhere or stay elsewhere.

hotelName: Premier Village Phu Quoc Resort - Được quản lý bởi Accor
userCmt: We thoroughly enjoyed our stay! the staff were very friendly and the food was quite good. Being one of the few or only americans at the resort, we felt completely comfortable asking questions and understanding everything. While we did enjoy the beach only a few steps away from our villa, we spent most of the time enjoying our private pool. The villas and pools are in excellent condition and felt very luxurious. We went to the spa for a message and also had an excellent experience there. I highly recommend this property. The only downfall is that it is far away from the main town so you will need to take a taxi to experience real vietnamese life.

hotelName: Premier Village Phu Quoc Resort - Được quản lý bởi Accor
userCmt: Love the villa on the beach very private. The water sup they are all broken need desperately new ones. The coffee shop and market should be open longer hour.

hotelName: Premier Village Phu Quoc Resort - Được quản lý bởi Accor
userCmt: 창문이 약해서 바람이많이 불어 밤새 삐거덕 소리에 힘들었어요 나머지 전체 사용하기는 너무좋았어요 저녁 디너 뷔페는 랍스타가 반마리씩 줍니다. 너무 넓어서 카트타고 다녀야해요 금방옵니다.

hotelName: Premier Village Phu Quoc Resort - Được quản lý bởi Accor
userCmt: Superbe vue et belle piscine. Villas spacieuses et modernes. Nous avons séjounés 3 nuits avec deux enfants et avons bien profité de la piscine privée. Manon a fait en sorte que les enfants se sentent spécials et on a apprécié l endroit en général. On a pris des taxis pour faire des activités à l extérieur et c était bien.

hotelName: Premier Village Phu Quoc Resort - Được quản lý bởi Accor
userCmt: Likes beautiful landscape, very comfortable and relaxing atmospheres throughout. Nice villa. Dislikes too slow check in (4pm villa still not available), insufficient buggies services and staff not well trained.

hotelName: Premier Village Phu Quoc Resort - Được quản lý bởi Accor
userCmt: コテージ プール スタッフが素晴らしかったです 休暇をのんびりと過ごすことができました また来たいです

hotelName: Premier Village Phu Quoc Resort - Được quản lý bởi Accor
userCmt: 청소 상태가.....정말 아가 발바닥이 새까매짐! 버기 부르면 20분 오션뷰였는데 걍 저렴한 아일랜드로 할걸 후회했음

hotelName: Premier Village Phu Quoc Resort - Được quản lý bởi Accor
userCmt: Everything was perfect here the foods, staffs, environment have a pleasant stay with my family

hotelName: Premier Village Phu Quoc Resort - Được quản lý bởi Accor
userCmt: 宿泊したヴァラは綺麗で快適でした レストランは２つありますが メニューのバリエーションが少なく1週間の滞在では飽きてしまいました レストランや敷地内の移動に使うバギーの予約が出来るアプリをチェックイン時にダウンロードするように勧められましたが アプリに不備が多く混乱しました
Beautiful hotel and great service

Cũng ok nhưng do mình ở khu sân vườn nên hơi có nhiều côn trùng, nhân viên cũng có xịt khử côn trùng nên cũng thông cảm. Hì. Xe điện thì đợi hơi lâu, nhiều khi mình đi bộ ra thì xe mới cbi đi. Gần với có xe đưa đón sân bay nên không lo trễ giờ. View với bãi biển sạch đẹp, 2 cháu nhà mình thích hồ bơi nhưng cần quan tâm vệ sinh hơn. Nhân viên lịch sự nhiệt tình. Nhìn chung khá hài lòng.

Beautiful property, great service. Breakfast buffet was amazing, pool and beach were both great with lots of amenities. Our room was very comfortable and spacious, however i didn t feel like it was cleaned very well while we were there. It was also cleaned very late, we never got enough towels, always had to call for me and felt like the floor wasn t cleaned properly as it had sand on the ground. But overall really great resort and definitely recommend staying there while in phu quoc.
Great hotel
비슷한 가격대면 더 좋은 대안이 많을 것이라 확신합니다. 아코르 계열 호텔임에도 리조트임에도 서비스 시설 모두 좋다고 하기 어렵습니다. 리조트 위치 마저도 도보로 갈 수 있는 곳이 사실상 없어서 이 리조트의 장점이 무엇일까? 고민해봤지만, 어차피 제가 운영하는 리조트가 아니니 의미는 없었네요.

The property is big and lovely the room is good (we had one overlooking the ocean view) the sunset was beautiful. The hotel has no activities that you can do within except for bike ride but it rained everyday so it was not possible. It was raining season. The hotel has one restaurant upstairs (very pricey and very small serves) and a breakfast restaurant downstairs. Breakfast options were great. Very small convenience store with the bare minimum. The staff barely speak english and the locals don t speak english at all which made it difficult. We had to use google translate app to navigate our way.
We really enjoy our stay. This place was exactly what we needed, a relaxing resort with excellent food and all amenities needed to spend a full day without getting bored.
Great hotel at a very nice location
가족과 함께 휴가를 보내기에 좋은 곳이네요. 수영장이 크고 하루 종일 놀 수 있어요.

Un peu éloignée de la ville. Mais pour se reposer impeccable. Très bons restaurant. Petit déjeuner formidable. On a pas envie de quitter l hôtel. Disque jockey sur le bar de la plage. Très bonne ambiance. Le personnel impeccable et serviable.
Tolles hotel und sehr schöner strandabschnitt. Direkte umgebung keine ausgehmöglichkeiten. Jedoch mit grab und hotelshuttle als im radius von 20 minuten schnell erreichbar.
Grate resort.
망고스틴,잭푸르트가 금지여서 별로였습니다. 소음때문에시끄러웠습니다
Very nice property and the staff were all amazing. Super helpful and super friendly!
Best breakfast experiêncie in phu quoc island. The options cover out different ásia culture. Amaizing oportunity to discover new tastes and recepies. My congratularions to f b team
Beautiful property. Your money can t have any marks on it if you want to exchange currency. You have to be on time with the shuttles.

Arrived at hotel around 10pm, got the free airport shuttle which was quick and convenient. Check-in was fast and simple, staff quickly made us feel very comfortable and immediately in vacation-mode. Bellhop gave us ride in a golf cart with bags through the beautiful grounds to our room. Stunning. We were hungry and were told they offer 24/7 room service. After some trial and error we found the digital room service menu and were slightly disappointed to find the options limited to only 6 items. We ordered three of them. Without going into too much detail, let s just say two of them were not up to standard, which was disappointing due to the hefty price of the late night menu. We informed the desk and they collected the food. The next morning at breakfast a staff member approached us and offered her apologies about the food service incident the previous night. She even offered us a complimentary bottle of champagne to make up for the issue. She was beyond excellent. My girlfriend and i decided to extend our stay an additional night based soley on how that one staff member went above and beyond to make things right. She was the gold standard for hospitality. The hotel is beautiful, pool closes at 8pm which seemed a little early for such a beautiful resort. Hot tub would be nice for a late night romantic soak. Not much bad to say other than that one incident. Everything else was premium. Staff was exceptional. Highly recommend just maybe stick to the normal restaurant menu )

Quarto muito confortável porém o sofá estava todo manchado , funcionários extremamente gentis e prestativos , estrutura do hotel excelente porém a área da praia em frente ao hotel estava imunda , um contraste com a limpeza dos demais ambientes
Great service
Excellent services

The team that worked there were really good, a bit of detail needed in some rooms from wear and tear. Nothing major just detailing and a bit more training with the team on how to handle situations. I.e we asked for a certain meal but we got an augomagic response that the kitchen was busy and wouldn t be able to. Bug the previous it was ok.
適合度假的地方
Jättefint och bra hotell, servicen va top och maten god på hotellet. Hade gärna åkt tillbaka.
Memg best, everything was perfect

At the outset- pullman phu quoc has a wonderful staff i cannot remember all names ( but all the staff are kind empathetic and accommodating) to name a few an, nhi,hong than at the restaurant , nhi at reception, the manager himself and also the nurse our kid fell ill during the trip the nurse came to the room and also came with us to the clinic outside the resort for more than 4-5 hours . Stayed and helped us all the way during our stay the staff sent the breakfast to our room as we could not go to breakfast ( freshly prepared vegetarian food ) the manager even sent our kid a get well soon with fresh fruits the facilities are also good ( we could not do justice) the beach swimming pool the splash area for kids , the kids club , free bicycle , i might have missed out something but will definitely recommend and also come back in the future
조식은 종류다 많고 맛도 좋았습니다. 풀장도 넓고 깨끗했으며 선베드에서 주문하고 받는 시스템도 좋았습니다.
海灘比較髒亂 有煙蒂 垃圾等漂浮物
너무 행복했습니다. 룸컨디션도 좋고 수영장도 넓고 조식도 훌륭하고 셔틀이나 기타 서비스들도 만족스러웠네요. 저는 갠적으로 가족여행이시라면 옆에있는 노보텔보다는 풀먼을 추천해요. 한적한곳이라 리조트안에서 해결하기에 좋은곳이에요. 즈엉동야시장을 자주가실꺼라면 조금 멀순있지만 그랩으로 20분정도면 갑니다. 숙박전 메시지에도 성실하게 답변해주셨어요.
풀장도 넓고, 조식도 깔끔하고 전반적으로 만족한 경험이었습니다.
좋아요 시설도 좋고 깨끗하고

Although there were some misunderstandings on our way to check in, the bellboy solved it quickly and sincerely. It makes us feel valued. And the most important thing is that every staff at the resort is welcoming to the guests. We had a perfect experience during our honeymoon.
Fabulous stay, wonderful clean hotel with very friendly and helpful staff. Highly recommend.
Overall quality was not bad. But bathtub was terrible. There was someone s body hair on tub and shower head was leak...
Great hospitality !! highly recommended
美美的泳池 乾淨且緩坡的白色沙灘 房間漂亮 稍微美中不足就是走廊的聲音容易傳入房間

Although there were some misunderstandings on our way to check in, the bellboy solved it quickly and sincerely. It makes us feel valued. And the most important thing is that every staff at the resort is welcoming to the guests. We had a perfect experience during our honeymoon.
모든 직원들에게 친절함이 몸에 배여있음!

This is very nice hotel. The location is on the mid of island. And there is nothing in outside that you can buy (no store and market). The nearest market is the night market of sonaset. The grab to there around 30k vnd. And you can have lunch/dinner on the market will be better.
리조트 분위기는 대체적으로 조용하면 직원들은 친절하고 불편함없는 서비스가 좋습니다. 시설은 깔끔하고 특히 수영장은 휴양에 가장 중요한 부분입니다. 좋은 시설이라고 생각합니다 레스토랑 음식은 다양하고 맛있습니다.

Stayed 3 nights here was a beautiful hotel. Great staff and food was to a great standard. Its closer to the south of the island so trips to cable car and sunset town are not far but its around an hour from grandworld and vinwonders in the north of the island. I like getting around on moped and didnt mind the journey. Would recommend.
신축이라 청결상태는 좋으나 한국인이 많음에도 한국인에 대한 배려는 조금 부족한 호텔인듯 합니다. 5박7일 동안 김치는 하루밖에 보지못했고 음식도 전반적으로 서양식단이라 비추천 합니다.

Pullman phu quoc is an immaculate luxury resort in the south of phu island. I stayed in one of their ocean facing premium rooms on the 8th floor where i enjoyed beautiful sunsets from near the top floor. The room itself had modern amenities and the staff and room service were impeccable. The hotel itself was the same beautiful grounds with plenty of pools and a private beach area. There are two restaurants salt pepper, which was great, and mad cow, which had excellent staff and views but rather mediocre food, especially for the price. I highly recommend this resort but consider that it is pretty remote, as much of the shopping and entertainment are in phu city and the north of the island. But there is a free shuttle around the island that stops at the resort and the resort s shuttle is very accommodating.

Amazing, loved every moment of my stay. Great room, superb amenities, pool was great and even better just a minute walk to the beautiful beach. Restaurants were good, the staff were all great and the weather superb!
The resort is spacious and garden is well maintained. Swimming pool is also large and clean. Staffs are friendly. Food is great.
매우 마음에 들었어요. 숙소 상태, 경관, 프라이빗 롱비치, 음식 등 전반적으로 매우 좋았어요. 일정을 취소하고 안에만 있어도 충분히 힐링할 수 있습니다. 저희는 풀사이드로 업그레이드 해주어 바로 풀과 연결돼 너무 좋았어요.

The staff was very nice and polite. It was clean and the beach , pool was nice too. The bicycle was a little old and rusty. The brake was not working properly. Breakfeast at 9th floor was good and the service also. Check in went smoothly.

Outstanding stay. The rooms and amenities were great and the staff really goes out of their way to make you feel welcome. Decent variety of food, even if the prices seem high, but reasonable for a resort of this quality. Breakfast buffet was great and had a large selection. Highly recommend staying here

First time staying at a pullman hotel so i m not sure if how much they had for families was normal, but this pullman hotel was very good for families with small children. We could easily let our almost three year old explore the pool while we stood from a distance. Multiple levels of water height and lots of room for the little ones to play. They even had a bubble machine that blew massive bubbles into the water. The beach also catered to families with kids by allowing strollers to access the ocean by way of a board walk to the water, to the beach chairs, to grassy areas. The staff were so kind and curious. It made up for some of the issues with cleanliness. Welcome drinks were dirty when we arrived, it was hard to get our room cleaned, called three times one day just to have them come clean the room. Cigarette butts in the chair on the patio never cleaned up. The floor to our room made your feet black for the first three days until we came in from the pool or out of the shower where we had to mop up the floor. All in all, i would return with small kids. Just a few issues with room cleanliness.
Great hotel, excellent staff, excellent perks with accor plus. Rooms were very nice and spacious but pillows slightly too soft
대체로 좋은 리조트 이지만 수영장 물이 너무 뜨거웠슴.
夜のご飯用のレストランが近くにないのでホテルご飯だけど あまり選べないかな
Modern hotel with nice amenities. Excellent breakfasts and top-rated staffs.
プールサイドでお水を配るかウォーターサーバーがあればよかった
Huy was very helpful to us on several occasions. The breakfast and pool are probably the best. The beach area could use a little attention.
Service was great. Han, who helped me check-in was very friendly, thorough and informative.

Nơi tốt. Vị trí trung tâm trên đảo. Tôi đã ở đó cho các hoạt động ngoài trời nên không quan tâm nhiều đến chỗ ở. Chủ nhà lạnh lùng đảm bảo với tôi về sự an toàn của khu phố vì không có bãi đậu xe trong nhà. Nước trong phòng tắm có áp lực yếu một cách kỳ lạ. Ngoài ra, bạn không thể đánh bại giá cả!
Chị chủ nhà tử tế lắm nha quý vị và rất tôn trọng sự riêng tư của khách
Phòng xinh đẹp, sạch sẽ, rộng rãi, thoáng mát. Host rất thân thiện, nhiệt tình, thoải mái. Giá cả hợp lý. Muốn quay lại đây nhiều lần.
Sạch sẽ, tiện nghi và rất nhiệt tình

Mình book 2 phòng 1 đêm và 2 đêm, lúc đến nhân viên đón tiếp nhiệt tình, nhận phòng sạch và thoáng mát, view hồ bơi, monhf chỉ hỏi xin băng cá nhân vì luc đi giày cao gót nhiều và bị bong da thi 2 anh nhân viên xách cả túi y tế đên hoi xem mình có sao ko. Rất bất ngờ khi nhân viên chu đáo đến như vậy, mình và ôngxã cùng mn thật sự hài lòng và hy vọng có dịp khác sẽ đến pq và ở lại ks.
Phòng rộng, hồ bơi rộng, bãi biển bình thường, dịch vụ tốt, khuôn viên rộng nhiều cây xanh.
Tuyệt vời, bãi biển rông, sạch

Cơ sở vật chất tốt, lễ tân rất tốt, tuy nhiên cần phải cải thiện nhiều hơn. 1) khách vào sảnh để check in không có ai ra giúp kéo hành lý. Có bạn bellboy đứng ở cửa nhưng chỉ nhìn rồi thôi không làm gì cả? 2) khăn tắm và khăn lót chân không có. Báo thì housekeeping nói phơi chưa kịp? 3) bãi biển tương đối sạch nhưng khách đang tắm thì có 1 miếng băng vệ sinh trôi trong nước? có 1 điểm nữa là đi bộ từ phòng khách sạn đến bãi biển khá xa.
Resort ổn, có bãi biển đẹp, nhân viên dễ thương, phục vụ nhiệt tình
Nhân viên xử lý tình huống không tinh tế, đồ ăn ở buffet hết không thêm vào, bắt khách phải đứng đợi rất lâu. Phở thì lại trộn nước lèo với thức ăn của bún cá.
Nhân việt nhiệt tình và chuyên nghiệp, view và bãi biển rất đẹp. Sẽ quay lại vào chuyến đi tiếp theo.
Nhân viên cực kì dễ thương, phòng trải nghiệm rất tốt, mọi thứ đều quan tâm chất lượng cho khách hàng
Nhân viên thân thiện, phòng rộng sạch sẽ, đầy đủ tiện nghi. Đi ngày mưa, nhưng dịch vụ chu đáo. Sát bên grandworld có xe điện đưa đón.
Phòng rộng rãi, tuyệt đẹp. Vị trí đẹp. Xứng đáng khách sạn 5 sao.
Khach san radison đat tiêu chuẩn năm sao va nhân viên rất lịch sự va dễ thương ok
Hồ bơi đẹp. Buffet cho bữa sáng là rất tốt
Phòng rộng rãi sạch sẽ, sát bên vinpearl, nói chung là ưng
Rất tuyệt vời. Mọi thứ. Mình sẽ quay trở lại
Khách sạn này đặt chuẩn 5 , dịch vụ rất tốt, nhân viên rất nhiệt tình, có bãi biển riêng rất sạch và đẹp

Tôi và gia đình đã có một kỳ nghỉ thật tuyệt tại radisson blu resort. Không gian và dịch vụ tốt, nhân viên cực kỳ thân thiện và vui vẻ. Tôi và gia đình sẽ tiếp tục chọn radisson blu resort cho kỳ nghỉ tiếp theo của gia đình
Mọi thứ đều tuyệt vời. Tôi sẽ trả lại một chuyến thăm ở đây.

Khách sạn đẹp, nhân viên khách sạn rất nhiệt tình và lịch sự. Phòng rộng, smart tv, tiện nghi đầy đủ. Nhà hàng bán giá phải chăng, buổi sáng tráng miệng ngon. Điều tuyệt vời là khách sạn linh động cho check out trễ lúc 13 00.
Hài lòng , lúc đầu phòng không được ok lắm , nhưng sau quản lí rất vui vẻ đổi .
Phục vụ rất chu đáo tận tình, vui vẻ lịch sự, tiện nghi đầy đủ. Nhưng phòng ở có vấn đề là nhà tắm bị bốc mùi hôi do bị hở xi phông, số phòng thức ăn được chế biến quá lâu.
Mọi thứ đều rất tuyệt vời, tôi hoàn toàn hài lòng.
Kì nghỉ rất tuyệt và rất hài lòng ở nơi nay, đây là nơi chọn lựa chuẩn cho kì nghỉ
Chúng tôi đến với resort rất tuyệt vời, từ nhân viên đến các dịch vụ thật sự rất hài lòng, là nơi đáng để nghĩ dưỡng

Mặc dù tôi và chồng tôi sử dụng dịch vụ của khách sạn cho chuyến công tác, nhưng cũng trên cả tuyệt vời nhé. Khách sạn hỗ trợ nhân phòng sớm 2 tiếng so với bình thường, có xe đưa đón sân bay và xe điện đưa đón sang vinwonder. Ngoài ra xe đưa đón ra thị trấn dương đông rất đúng giờ, xe êm, mới, tài xế rất lịch sự. Các trang thiết bị tại phòng khách sạn rất ổn, view tốt (mặc dù view của phòng mình là garden view). Buffet sáng khá đủ món, từ tây sang á

Mình đã có một kì nghỉ rất tuyệt vời tại radisson phú quốc. Ấn tượng đầu tiên của mình là về hai bạn nhân viên đón mình từ sân bay, hai bạn quá chu đáo và nhiệt tình. Dường như sự nhiệt tình đó cũng là văn hóa ở radisson vì tất cả mọi nhân viên mà mình gặp ai cũng rất rất lịch thiệp, nhẹ nhàng và ân cần. Nhân đây mình cũng nuốn gửi lời cảm ơn đến anh vương ở khu vực bãi biển hồ bơi vì nhờ có sự hỗ trợ nhiệt tình của anh mà chuyến đi của mình đáng nhớ hơn rất nhiều. Điểm cộng tiếp theo là ở resort có rất nhiều dịch vụ kèm theo miễn phí như đưa đón sân bay, xe bus đưa đón khách ra khu vực trung tâm (dương đông), xe điện đưa đón khách qua các khu vực lân cận almaz, grandworld, kayak (30p) và chèo sup... Làm cho trải nghiệm nghỉ dưỡng không còn nhàm chán. Bãi biển riêng trong khuôn viên resort rất sạch, cạn và ít sóng, cực kì an toàn cho trẻ em. Ngoài ra smart tv riêng trong phòng cũng rất xịn với nhiều kênh đủ để giải trí tại phòng. Hai điểm duy nhất mình chưa hài lòng lắm là buffet sáng, dù đa dạng món nhưng chưa ngon lắm. Điểm còn lại là tốc độ wifi, trong ngày đầu tiên mình ở thì rất ok, các ngày còn lại tốc độ chậm đi trông thấy, không rõ do khách đông hay thế nào mong khách sạn khắc phục. Nhìn chung radisson là một nơi lưu trú rất chất lượng, có dịp đến phúquốc lần nữa mình chắc chắn sẽ quay lại.

My family and i have fun here. The food is great, landscape is impressive, lots of activities available for kids. Inside the room, furniture is bit old and air-conditioner in living room is not cool enough. Staff is helpful and welcoming, minor complaint on the shuttle from airport didn t pick us up because 10 minutes late of our flight and we were not allowed to shift to the next trip. Hope it can be more flexible next time, it created our 1st bad impression when we start the holidays.
Tuyệt vời! khách sang phòng ốc tốt nhân viên rất nhiệt tình!

Gia đình có 1 kỳ nghỉ tuyệt vời tại đây ăn sáng ngon nhiều món, time tới 11h, vị trí tuyêt vời sát biển, grand world, vinwonder ,,, nhân viên thân thiện dễ thương. Ấn tượng nhất là bạn mẫn bạn đạt (điều xe 22/8/22) xử lý tình huống khéo léo, điềm tĩnh thông minh, nhiệt tình dễ mến
Hài lòng, có dịch vụ xe đạp free đi vòng quanh khu vin bên cạnh ..
Sạch sẽ, đồ ăn ngon, nhân viên hỗ trợ rất nhiệt tình, mình đến sớm nhưng được check in luôn, check out cũng nhanh, có xe đưa đón, không có gì để chê cả!
Phòng sạch, rộng. Có bữa sáng buffet từ 6-11h, rất tiện, đồ ăn trong nhà hàng cũng khá ngon so với giá.
Very good
Khách sạn tuyệt vời, nhân viên rất tốt. Tôi rất vui vì tôi ở lại đây. Sẽ quay lại khi chúng tôi có cơ hội. Tận tâm, chu đáo. Cảm ơn tất cả!
Khách sạn view đẹp, bữa sáng ngon, nhân viên ở đây hỗ trợ rất nhiệt tình và thân thiện. Rất hài lòng.
Trải nghiệm rất tuyệt, phục vụ tận tình và chu đáo.

1 trải nghiệm khá tuyệt vời, resort view rất đẹp, sạch sẽ thoáng mát, buffet sáng ngon, lễ tân hoa loan bao trường rất thân thiện, làm thủ tục nhanh gọn, bell và tài xế điều trí an giang rất nhiệt tình phục vụ tốt, nhất định sẽ giới thiệu mn đến đây

Thật sự quá tuyệt vời. Resort không phải kiểu hoành tráng để khiến phải wow nhưng thực sự từng chi tiết khiến tôi vô cùng hài lòng. Phòng đẹp, sạch sẽ, nhân viên vô cùng thân thiện. Bạn vy lễ tân vô cùng thân thiện dễ thương. Ăn sáng ngon, tôi vô cùng hài lòng. Resort có xe đưa đón đi grand world 24/24, vị trí hoàn hảo nếu muốn chơi ở grandworld, cũng rất gần vin wonder hay safari. Bể bơi to sạch, bãi biển có chèo thuyền kayak miễn phí. Sẽ quay lại đây nếu đến phú quốc lần nữa. Một kỳ nghỉ tuyệt vời với gia đình. Cám ơn resort.

Mọi thứ rất bình thường. Không đáng 5 sao. Hỏi đến dịch vụ gì cũng trục trặc mặc dù nhân viên khá dễ thương. Nhà mình ăn 1 bữa tối tại nhà hàng và nó rất tệ. Đợi lâu rồi phục vụ sườn cừu nguội tanh. Nói chung là không quay lại

Resort có khuôn viên và bãi biển đẹp, có xe đạp để dạo vòng khá thư giãn. Phòng mới, đẹp đủ tiện nghi, không có hoa quả mời ngày đầu đến. Hôm nhà mình ở phòng family gần công trường, có vẻ cách âm cửa không tốt nên khá ồn, họ làm liên tục từ 8h sáng đến 12h trưa và chiều cũng làm muộn đến 6h tối, ảnh hưởng việc nghỉ ngơi. Nhân viên thân thiện, luôn tươi cười với khách, nhân viên lễ tân và điều xe điện nhanh nhẹn. Nhân viên sảnh đón chưa bao quát, khách ngồi đợi làm thủ tục check-in đến 10 nhưng không mang nước ra mời, không kéo vali cho khách khi khách đến. Với resort tiêu chuẩn cỡ 4 , 5 như vậy thì chưa oke lắm
